        public void onRowPopupMenuLoad(BaseActionEventPopupMenuLoad event)
        {
            updatePopupMenu(this);
        }
    }

    protected FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> m_grid = new FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem>();
    protected DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_popupContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    int m_maxItemsCounter = 2;

    public DemoDynamicMenu(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);    
        for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
        {
            GridItem gi = new GridItem();
            gi.setFirstName("First " + i);
            gi.setLastName("Last " + i);
            m_grid.getItems().add(gi);
        }
    }

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getPopupContent() { return m_popupContent; }
    public FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> getGrid() { return m_grid; }
    
    public void updatePopupMenu(GridItem gi)
    {
        int colIndex = m_grid.getColumnIndexOfLastSelection();
        String colName = null;
        if (colIndex == 0) 
            colName = "Column: firstName";
        else if (colIndex == 1)
            colName = "Column: lastName";
        List<ComponentNode> cns = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        m_maxItemsCounter++;
        if (m_maxItemsCounter > 10) m_maxItemsCounter = 2;
        for (int i=0; i<m_maxItemsCounter; i++)
        {
            MENUITEMNode min = new MENUITEMNode()
                    .setId(""+i)
                    .setText(gi.getFirstName() + " " + gi.getLastName() + " / " + colName + " / " + i)
                    .setCommand("COMMAND_"+i);
            cns.add(min);
        }
        m_popupContent.setContentNodes(cns);
    }
}

Cascading popup menu

Check the content of the popup menu on various components of the screen by right clicking them - first with "cascading" being switched on, then with "cascading" being switched off. You will see that the menus contain more items if switched on.

Popup menus can be defined on any component level.

When clicking the right mouse button then by default only this popup menu shown that is defined on the lowest level.

By setting POPUPMENU-CASCADEPARENTMENU to "true" you can define that a popup menu will also embed the parent level's popup menu.

This is especially useful in a grid where you have popup menu definitions on item level and you have popup menu definitions on the grid level. If not using the cascade-feature then it's difficult for the user to reach the whole grid's popup menu once the grid is filled with items.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.onBodyAction}" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade}" popupmenu="BODY" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_60" >
<t:checkbox id="g_5" flush="true" labeltext="Cascading" selected="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.withCascading}" text="Switch on/off the cascading of popup menus" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_50" >
<t:textpane id="g_2" text="The whole body of the dialog is providing popup menu &#34;BODY&#34; with the menu item &#34;Check and save data&#34;." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_42" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.onAreaAction}" border="#c0c0c0" popupmenu="AREA" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" text="Some area" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_52" >
<t:textpane id="g_53" text="The whole area is providing popup menu &#34;AREA&#34; with the menu item &#34;Clear all fields in area&#34;. - Each single field is providing popup menu &#34;FIELD&#34; with the menu items &#34;Clear content&#34; and &#34;Double content&#34;." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:field id="g_61" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.onField1Action}" labeltext="Field 1" popupmenu="FIELD" text="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.field1}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:field id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.onField2Action}" labeltext="Field 2" popupmenu="FIELD" text="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.field2}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_58" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_55" >
<t:textpane id="g_56" text="In the grid there is a poup menu &#34;GRID&#34; for the whole grid - providing the items &#34;Add new item&#34; and &#34;Select all itesm&#34;. In addition there is a popup menu &#34;GRIDROW&#34; providing the menu item &#34;Delete&#34;." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_43" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_44" height="100%" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.grid}" popupmenu="GRID" rowpopupmenu="GRIDROW" width="100%" >
<t:gridcol id="g_45" text="First name" width="100%" >
<t:field id="g_46" text=".{firstName}" width="100" />
</t:gridcol>
<t:gridcol id="g_47" text="First name" width="100%" >
<t:field id="g_48" text=".{lastName}" width="100" />
</t:gridcol>
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="BODY" >
<t:menuitem id="g_36" command="SAVE" hotkey="ctrl-83" text="Check and save data" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="AREA" cascadeparentmenu="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.withCascading}" >
<t:menuitem id="g_40" command="CLEARAREA" text="Clear all fields in area" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="FIELD" cascadeparentmenu="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.withCascading}" >
<t:menuitem id="g_15" command="CLEAR" text="Clear content" />
<t:menuitem id="g_16" command="DOUBLE" text="Double content" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="GRID" cascadeparentmenu="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.withCascading}" >
<t:menuitem id="g_30" command="ADDNEW" text="Add new item" />
<t:menuitem id="g_31" command="SELECTALL" text="Select all items" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="GRIDROW" cascadeparentmenu="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade.withCascading}" >
<t:menuitem id="g_32" command="DELETE" text="Delete" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade}")

public class DemoPopupMenuCascade
    extends PageBean     
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class GridItem extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        String i_lastName;
        String i_firstName;
        public String getLastName() { return i_lastName; }
        public void setLastName(String value) { this.i_lastName = value; }
        public String getFirstName() { return i_firstName; }
        public void setFirstName(String value) { this.i_firstName = value; }
        public void onRowSelect()
        {
        }
        public void onRowExecute()
        {
        }
        @Override
        public void onRowPopupMenuItem(BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem event)
        {
            if ("DELETE".equals(event.getCommand()))
            {
                m_grid.getItems().remove(this);
            }
        }
    }
    
    public class MyGrid extends FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem>
    {
        @Override
        protected void onPopupMenuItem(BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem popupMenuItemEvent)
        {
            if ("ADDNEW".equals(popupMenuItemEvent.getCommand()))
            {
                GridItem gi = new GridItem();
                m_grid.getItems().add(0,gi);
                m_grid.deselectCurrentSelection();
                m_grid.selectAndFocusItem(gi);
            }
            else if ("SELECTALL".equals(popupMenuItemEvent.getCommand()))
            {
                m_grid.deselectCurrentSelection();
                for (GridItem gi: m_grid.getItems())
                    m_grid.selectItem(gi);
            }
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    MyGrid m_grid = new MyGrid();
    String m_field2 = "Test";
    String m_field1 = "Test";
    boolean m_withCascading = true;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPopupMenuCascade(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);      
        for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
        {
            GridItem gi = new GridItem();
            gi.setLastName("Last " + i);
            gi.setFirstName("First " + i);
            m_grid.getItems().add(gi);
        }
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopopupmenucascade.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPopupMenuCascade}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getField2() { return m_field2; }
    public void setField2(String value) { this.m_field2 = value; }

    public String getField1() { return m_field1; }
    public void setField1(String value) { this.m_field1 = value; }

    public FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> getGrid() { return m_grid; }
    
    public void onBodyAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("SAVE".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                Statusbar.outputSuccess("Data was saved");
            }
        }
    }

    public void onAreaAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("CLEARAREA".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                m_field1 = null;
                m_field2 = null;
            }
        }
    }

    public void onField2Action(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("CLEAR".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                m_field2 = "";
            }
            else if ("DOUBLE".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                m_field2 += m_field2;
            }
        }
    }

    public void onField1Action(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("CLEAR".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                m_field1 = "";
            }
            else if ("DOUBLE".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                m_field1 += m_field1;
            }
        }
    }

    public boolean getWithCascading() { return m_withCascading; }
    public void setWithCascading(boolean value) { this.m_withCascading = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Button Menu

Click onto one of the buttons and a menu will show up directly below.

In the example the menu is statically built - i.e. the menu items are part of the layout definition. Of course you can - as anywhere else - use the attribute COMPONENTBINDING to build the menu dynamically within your server side application.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonMenu}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_3" rowdistance="10" text="Menu only" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_5" text="Menu below" >
<t:menuitem id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="This is Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_7" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_8" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_10" />
<t:menuitem id="g_11" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_13" align="right" image="/images/icons/find.png" text="Menu below" width="200" popupborder="top:3;left:3;right:3;bottom:3;color:#808080" >
<t:menuitem id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" hotkey="ctrl-49" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_15" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_16" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_17" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" hotkey="ctrl-50" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_18" />
<t:menuitem id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" hotkey="ctrl-51" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_21" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/find.png" text="Menu below" popupborder="top:3;left:3;right:3;bottom:3;color:#808080" >
<t:menuitem id="g_22" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" hotkey="ctrl-49" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_23" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_24" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_25" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" hotkey="ctrl-50" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_26" />
<t:menuitem id="g_27" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" hotkey="ctrl-51" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_29" rowdistance="10" text="Button and Menu" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_31" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onButtonAction}" buttonmenumode="buttonandmenu" text="Menu below" >
<t:menuitem id="g_32" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="This is Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_33" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_34" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_35" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_36" />
<t:menuitem id="g_37" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_38" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_39" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onButtonAction}" buttonmenumode="buttonandmenu" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/find.png" text="Menu below" popupborder="top:3;left:3;right:3;bottom:3;color:#808080" >
<t:menuitem id="g_40" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" hotkey="ctrl-49" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_41" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_42" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_43" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" hotkey="ctrl-50" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_44" />
<t:menuitem id="g_45" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" hotkey="ctrl-51" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_46" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_47" rowdistance="10" text="Position" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_48" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_49" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onButtonAction}" buttonmenumode="menuwithicon" menuposition="top" text="Menu on top" width="150+" >
<t:menuitem id="g_50" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="This is Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_51" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_52" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_53" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_54" />
<t:menuitem id="g_55" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_57" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onButtonAction}" buttonmenumode="menuwithicon" menuposition="side" text="Menu aside" width="150+" >
<t:menuitem id="g_58" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu1Action}" image="/images/icons/car.png" text="This is Menu 1" />
<t:menu id="g_59" text="Folder" >
<t:menuitem id="g_60" text="Folded 1" />
</t:menu>
<t:menuitem id="g_61" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu2Action}" image="/images/icons/disk.png" text="Menu 2" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_62" />
<t:menuitem id="g_63" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonMenu.onMenu3Action}" image="/images/icons/magnifier.png" text="Menu 3" />
</t:buttonmenu>
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModalPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.OKPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.DefaultModalPopupListener;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonMenu}")

public class DemoButtonMenu 
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoButtonMenu(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("buttonmenu");
    }

    public void onMenu1Action(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Menu 1 was pressed");
    }

    public void onMenu2Action(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Menu 2 was pressed");
    }

    public void onMenu3Action(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Menu 3 was pressed");
        // open popup
        ModalPopup mp = getOwningDispatcher().createModalPopup();
        mp.open("/workplace/demohelloworld.jsp","Hello world!",600,400,new DefaultModalPopupListener(mp));
    }

    public void onButtonAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Button was pressed!");
    }
}

Button Popup

The BUTTONPOPUP component allows to open up a content area when the user presses the button. Within the content area a pane can be placed - holding any additional content.

The content area is opened within a popup menu: the popup menu is closed automatically when the user pressed the mouse outside the content area. There is no notification on this event.

In addition it is not possibile to use components within the content area that themselves open up a dialog window, e.g.: combo boxes, or right mouse button menus.

Use the BUTTONPOPUP component for "menu like" purposes. Do not use it as replacement for modal or modeless dialogs - because you do not have the programmatic control on opening and closing the area.

Please pay attention: The BUTTONPOPUP component is internally implemented as Menu. It is only possible to open one menu at one time, so you cannot use the component for opening complex screens containing menus itself, or containing any other component that internally opens up a menu-popup. This includes all COMBOBOX components (COMBOBOX, AUTOCOMPLETE). Use the normal modeless popup (with options: "undecorated", "close on click outside") to open up complex screens.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowheader id="g_1" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_2" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/style.png" text="Text Style" >
<t:pane id="g_3" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#FFFFFF,#E0E0E0,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="200" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:icon id="g_5" image="/images/icons/text_align_left.png" />
<t:icon id="g_6" image="/images/icons/text_align_center.png" />
<t:icon id="g_7" image="/images/icons/text_align_right.png" />
<t:icon id="g_8" image="/images/icons/text_align_justify.png" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_9" height="5" />
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:label id="g_11" text="Font" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_12" group="TEST" refvalue="Courier" text="Courier" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:coldistance id="g_14" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_15" group="TEST" refvalue="Times Roman" text="Times Roman" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_16" >
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_18" group="TEST" refvalue="Arial" text="Arial" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:rowheader>
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_19" objectbinding="#{d.demoButtonpopup}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:label id="g_21" text="Default" width="120" />
<t:buttonpopup id="g_22" activateonmouseover="true" image="/images/icons/style.png" text="Text Style" >
<t:pane id="g_23" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="200" >
<t:row id="g_24" >
<t:icon id="g_25" image="/images/icons/text_align_left.png" />
<t:icon id="g_26" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonpopup.onAlignCenter}" image="/images/icons/text_align_center.png" />
<t:icon id="g_27" image="/images/icons/text_align_right.png" />
<t:icon id="g_28" image="/images/icons/text_align_justify.png" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_29" height="5" />
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:label id="g_31" text="Font" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_32" group="TEST" refvalue="Courier" text="Courier" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_33" >
<t:coldistance id="g_34" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_35" group="TEST" refvalue="Times Roman" text="Times Roman" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_36" >
<t:coldistance id="g_37" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_38" group="TEST" refvalue="Arial" text="Arial" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_39" >
<t:label id="g_40" text="No background" width="120" />
<t:buttonpopup id="g_41" activateonmouseover="true" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/style.png" text="Text Style" >
<t:pane id="g_42" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="200" >
<t:row id="g_43" >
<t:icon id="g_44" image="/images/icons/text_align_left.png" />
<t:icon id="g_45" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonpopup.onAlignCenter}" image="/images/icons/text_align_center.png" />
<t:icon id="g_46" image="/images/icons/text_align_right.png" />

</t:row>

</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_58" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_59" >
<t:label id="g_60" text="No border" width="120" />
<t:buttonpopup id="g_61" activateonmouseover="true" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/style.png" text="Text Style" popupborder="top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0" >

</t:row>
</t:pane>

<t:rowdistance id="g_97" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_98" >

<t:radiobutton id="g_110" group="TEST" refvalue="Courier" text="Courier" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_111" >
<t:coldistance id="g_112" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_113" group="TEST" refvalue="Times Roman" text="Times Roman" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_114" >
<t:coldistance id="g_115" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_116" group="TEST" refvalue="Arial" text="Arial" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_117" >
<t:label id="g_118" text="Aside" width="120" />
<t:buttonpopup id="g_119" activateonmouseover="true" closeonroundtrip="false" contentareafilled="false" image="/images/icons/style.png" menuposition="side" text="Text Style" >
<t:pane id="g_120" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="200" >
<t:row id="g_121" >
<t:icon id="g_122" image="/images/icons/text_align_left.png" />
<t:icon id="g_123" image="/images/icons/text_align_center.png" />
<t:icon id="g_124" image="/images/icons/text_align_right.png" />
<t:icon id="g_125" image="/images/icons/text_align_justify.png" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_126" height="5" />
<t:row id="g_127" >
<t:label id="g_128" text="Font" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_129" group="TEST" refvalue="Courier" text="Courier" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_130" >
<t:coldistance id="g_131" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_132" group="TEST" refvalue="Times Roman" text="Times Roman" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_133" >
<t:coldistance id="g_134" width="50" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_135" group="TEST" refvalue="Arial" text="Arial" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.OKPopup;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

public class DemoButtonpopup extends PageBean
{
    public DemoButtonpopup(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("buttonpopup");
    }
    
    public void onAlignCenter(ActionEvent event)
    {
        OKPopup op = OKPopup.createInstance("Align Center","The icon >align,center< was pressed.");
    }
    
}

Button Popup Menu

The component BUTTONPOPUPMENU is a simple button that opens its popup menu when the user clicks the button.

Main purpose: for touch screens (phone, tablet, ...) the starting of a popup menu is not such obvious - there is no right mouse button and alternative gestures (such as "long touch") are not really user-friendly.

So you can add a popup menu for direct clicking - and the popup menu management is the same as with normal popup menus.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:buttonpopupmenu id="g_7" popupmenu="DEMO" text="(1) Popup menu &#34;DEMO&#34;" width="200+" />
<t:coldistance id="g_9" width="20" />
<t:label id="g_10" text="As icon:" width="50" />
<t:buttonpopupmenu id="g_31" contentareafilled="false" image="/images.iconssvg.bars_16x16.@backgroundColorDarkGray@.16x16.ccsvg" popupmenu="DEMO" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:textpane id="g_20" text="The &#34;DEMO&#34; popup menu is completely defined within the layout definition." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_8" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:buttonpopupmenu id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu.onButton2Action}" popupmenu="DEMODYN" popupmenuloadroundtrip="true" text="(2) Popup menu &#34;DEMODYN&#34;" width="200+" />
<t:coldistance id="g_32" width="20" />
<t:label id="g_33" text="As icon:" width="50" />
<t:buttonpopupmenu id="g_27" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu.onButton2Action}" contentareafilled="false" image="/images.iconssvg.bars_16x16.@backgroundColorDarkGray@.16x16.ccsvg" popupmenu="DEMODYN" popupmenuloadroundtrip="true" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:textpane id="g_23" text="The anchor for the &#34;DEMODYN&#34; popup menu is defined in the layout definition. But: the content itself is dynamically generated by some random logic. - By setting POPUPMENULOADROUNDTRIP to &#34;true&#34;, the server side processing is called before optically opening the popup menu on client side." width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="DEMO" >
<t:menuitem id="g_25" command="DEMO1" text="Demo 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_29" command="DEMO2" text="Demo 2" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="DEMODYN" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_5" contentbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu.dynMenuContent}" />
</t:popupmenu>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Random;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.MENUITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuLoad;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu}")

public class DemoButtonPopupMenu
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynMenuContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoButtonPopupMenu(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demobuttonpopupmenu.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoButtonPopupMenu}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynMenuContent() { return m_dynMenuContent; }

    public void onButton1Action(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Menut item selected: " + e.getCommand());
        }
    }

    public void onButton2Action(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuLoad)
        {
            int maxi = new Random().nextInt(10) + 2;
            List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
            for (int i=0; i<maxi; i++)
            {
                MENUITEMNode min = new MENUITEMNode()
                        .setText("Dyn Demo " + i)
                        .setCommand("DYNDEMO"+i);
                nodes.add(min);
            }
            m_dynMenuContent.setContentNodes(nodes);
            Statusbar.outputMessage("Number of menu items created: " + maxi);
        }
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Menut item selected: " + e.getCommand());
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Button Popup - Explicit closing/opening

The dialog popup which is managed by the BUTTONMENU component an be directly controlled by using triggers.

BUTTONPOPUP-CLOSETRIGGER will close the dialog (if openend).
BUTTONPOPUP-OPENTRIGGER will opene the dialog (if not yet opened).

Despite the fact that this is some simple way of opening/ closing small dialogs we do recommend to use real popups (ModalPopup, ModelessPopup) in general. Only there you have full control about the life cycle of the popup dialog!

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:label id="g_2" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Control BUTTONPOPUP" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_21" closeonroundtrip="false" closetrigger="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.closeTrigger}" opentrigger="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.openTrigger}" text="Show some info" width="150+" >
<t:box id="g_3" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:field id="g_5" labeltext="Some field" text="Some field" width="300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:field id="g_11" labeltext="Some field" text="Some field" width="300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:coldistance id="g_13" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_7" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onCloseAction}" text="Close" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:buttonpopup>
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="200" />
<t:link id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onOpenAction}" text="Open" />
<t:link id="g_15" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onCloseAction}" text="Close" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:label id="g_24" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Control BUTTONMENU" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_26" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:buttonmenu id="g_40" closetrigger="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.closeTriggerMenu}" opentrigger="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.openTriggerMenu}" text="Show some menu" width="150+" >
<t:menuitem id="g_42" text="Menut item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_44" text="Menut item 2" />
<t:menuitem id="g_46" text="Menut item 3" />
<t:menuseparator id="g_48" />
<t:menu id="g_50" text="Sub menu" >
<t:menuitem id="g_52" text="Menut item 3" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_54" padding="10" >
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:button id="g_58" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onCloseMenuAction}" text="Close" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
</t:menu>
</t:buttonmenu>
<t:coldistance id="g_36" width="200" />
<t:link id="g_37" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onOpenMenuAction}" text="Open" />
<t:link id="g_38" actionListener="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose.onCloseMenuAction}" text="Close" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose}")

public class DemoButtonPopupOpenClose
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Trigger m_openTrigger = new Trigger();
    Trigger m_closeTrigger = new Trigger();

    Trigger m_openTriggerMenu = new Trigger();
    Trigger m_closeTriggerMenu = new Trigger();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoButtonPopupOpenClose(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demobuttonpopupopenclose.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoButtonPopupOpenClose}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public Trigger getOpenTrigger() { return m_openTrigger; }
    public Trigger getCloseTrigger() { return m_closeTrigger; }
    public Trigger getOpenTriggerMenu() { return m_openTriggerMenu; } 
    public Trigger getCloseTriggerMenu() { return m_closeTriggerMenu; }

    public void onCloseAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_closeTrigger.trigger();
    }

    public void onOpenAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_openTrigger.trigger();
    }

    public void onCloseMenuAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_closeTriggerMenu.trigger();
    }

    public void onOpenMenuAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_openTriggerMenu.trigger();
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Button Popup - Mini popups in mouse over

This demo shows the usage of a BUTTONPOPUP component so that popup dialogs are shown on mouse over - opening from the left, right, top, bottom.

The features used in this demo are:

1. Usage of OVERLAYARE component in order to position the 4 side areas on top of the "base area"

2. Usage of BUTTONPOPUP with the following attributes
a. attribute ACTIVATEONMOUSEOVER set to true - so that not only a click invokes the popup but also moving the mouse on top
b. attribute MENUPOSITION set to some "overlay*" value so that the popup opens on top of the BUTTONMENU component
c. attribute CLOSEONMOUSEEXIT set to true so that popup closes when moving the mouse outside of its area
d. usage of BORDER AND ROUNDING so that the component optically is nicely arranged

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMouseOver}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMouseOver}" >
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_2" border="left:1;right:1;top:1;bottom:1;color:#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@containerBorderColor@&#39;]}" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_3" >
<t:pane id="g_6" padding="100" >
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:box id="g_5" height="100%" padding="20" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_85" >
<t:label id="g_10" align="center" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Move the mouse over the 4 &#34;side areas&#34;" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_11" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_82" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_83" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_12" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_15" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_16" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_18" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_19" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_21" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_22" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_23" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_24" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_25" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_26" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_27" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:field id="g_28" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
<t:field id="g_29" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;100" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareabaseitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_86" boundsanchor="leftmiddle" x="0" y="50%" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_41" activateonmouseover="true" background="#00000010" border="left:0;right:1;top:1;bottom:1;color:#00000020" closeonmouseexit="true" height="50" menuposition="overlayright" rounding="0;10;10;0" stylevariant="ccasicon" width="13" >
<t:pane id="g_43" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_44" >
<t:button id="g_45" text="Some function 1" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_47" >
<t:button id="g_48" text="Some function 2" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_49" >
<t:button id="g_50" text="Some function 3" width="150" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_52" boundsanchor="rightmiddle" x="100%" y="50%" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_53" activateonmouseover="true" background="#00000010" border="left:1;right:0;top:1;bottom:1;color:#00000020" closeonmouseexit="true" height="50" menuposition="overlayleft" rounding="10;0;0;10" stylevariant="ccasicon" width="13" >
<t:pane id="g_54" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_55" >
<t:button id="g_56" text="Some function 1" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_57" >
<t:button id="g_58" text="Some function 2" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_59" >
<t:button id="g_60" text="Some function 3" width="150" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_62" boundsanchor="centertop" x="50%" y="0" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_63" activateonmouseover="true" background="#00000010" border="left:1;right:1;top:0;bottom:1;color:#00000020" closeonmouseexit="true" height="13" menuposition="overlaybottom" rounding="0;0;10;10" stylevariant="ccasicon" width="50" >
<t:pane id="g_64" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_65" >
<t:button id="g_66" text="Some function 1" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_67" >
<t:button id="g_68" text="Some function 2" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_69" >
<t:button id="g_70" text="Some function 3" width="150" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_72" boundsanchor="centerbottom" x="50%" y="100%" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_73" activateonmouseover="true" background="#00000010" border="left:1;right:1;top:1;bottom:0;color:#00000020" closeonmouseexit="true" height="13" menuposition="overlaytop" rounding="10;10;0;0" stylevariant="ccasicon" width="50" >
<t:pane id="g_74" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_75" >
<t:button id="g_76" text="Some function 1" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_77" >
<t:button id="g_78" text="Some function 2" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_79" >
<t:button id="g_80" text="Some function 3" width="150" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonPopupMouseOver}")

public class DemoButtonPopupMouseOver
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoButtonPopupMouseOver(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demobuttonpopupmouseover.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoButtonPopupMouseOver}"; }
}

Button Popup - Positioning aside...

You can explicitly pass some style to the popup dialog that is opened by the BUTTONPOPUP component.

There are pre-defined style variants doing this for you. Both BUTTONPOPUP components of the example use the style to open a transparent dialog. In the dialog content there is some space on the left and on the right - so that the popup content does not hide the original button/icon that opens the dialog.

We now have the definition:
1. popup opens to the left or the right (MENUPOSITION)
2. popup automatically opens on mouse over (ACTIVATEONMOUSEOVER)
3. popup automatically closes on mouse out (CLOSONMOUSEEXIT)
4. overlapping but invisible content to show the originating button/icon

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft}" rowdistance="20" >
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:textpane id="g_18" text="Thera are two little images on the left and the right side of the split pane divider... Move the mouse on top of them and/or touch the images on mobile devices." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:splitpane id="g_2" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:splitpanesplit id="g_3" >
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_6" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_7" />
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_8" boundsanchor="rightmiddle" x="100%" y="50%" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_9" activateonmouseover="true" closeonmouseexit="true" image="/images.iconssvg.orgtree.#606060.16x16.ccsvg" menuposition="overlayleft" stylevariant="ccasicon_transparentdialog" >
<t:pane id="g_10" >
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:pane id="g_12" background="#FF0000" height="180" rounding="10" width="140" >
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:label id="g_16" align="center" height="100%" text="Some content..." width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
<t:pane id="g_14" height="100%" width="25" >
<t:row id="g_35" />
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:splitpanesplit>
<t:splitpanesplit id="g_20" >
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_23" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_24" />
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_25" boundsanchor="leftmiddle" x="0" y="50%" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_26" activateonmouseover="true" closeonmouseexit="true" image="/images.iconssvg.orgtree.#606060.16x16.ccsvg" menuposition="overlayright" stylevariant="ccasicon_transparentdialog" >
<t:pane id="g_27" >
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:pane id="g_32" height="100%" width="25" >
<t:row id="g_33" />
</t:pane>
<t:pane id="g_29" background="#FF0000" height="180" rounding="10" width="140" >
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:label id="g_31" align="center" height="100%" text="Some content..." width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:splitpanesplit>
</t:splitpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft}")

public class DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demobuttonpopupspecialleft.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoButtonPopupSpecialLeft}"; }
}

Button Popup - Explicitly controlling animations

The dialog that is shown when pressing/activating the BUTTONPOPUP control can be animated.

As with "normal" popup dialogs there are two animation types that are applied:

. POPUPSIZENIMATIONTYPE defines the size animation - by default the animation type is resolved automatically
. POPUPANIMATIONTYPE defines the content animation - by default there is no explicit content animation

In the examples the size animation was set to "noanimation", so that the popup dialog appears with its full size immediately. As result the content animations are "fully visible". - You may of course also combine size animation and content animations.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupAnimation}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoButtonPopupAnimation}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Content animation: fading..." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_8" popupanimationtype="foglight" popupsizeanimationtype="noanimation" stylevariant="default_transparentdialog" text="Open popup pane" >
<t:pane id="g_10" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@popupBackground@&#39;]}" border="#c0c0c0" padding="20" rounding="10" rowdistance="5" >
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:button id="g_5" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:button id="g_14" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_16" >
<t:button id="g_17" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
<t:buttonpopup id="g_21" popupanimationtype="fogred" popupsizeanimationtype="noanimation" stylevariant="default_transparentdialog" text="Open popup pane" >
<t:pane id="g_22" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@popupBackground@&#39;]}" border="#c0c0c0" padding="20" rounding="10" rowdistance="5" >
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:button id="g_24" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_25" >
<t:button id="g_26" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_27" >
<t:button id="g_28" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_48" >
<t:label id="g_49" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Content animation:  shader hiding..." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_30" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_31" popupanimationtype="hidetotop" popupsizeanimationtype="noanimation" stylevariant="default_transparentdialog" text="Open popup pane" >
<t:pane id="g_32" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@popupBackground@&#39;]}" border="#c0c0c0" padding="20" rounding="10" rowdistance="5" >
<t:row id="g_33" >
<t:button id="g_34" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_35" >
<t:button id="g_36" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_37" >
<t:button id="g_38" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
<t:buttonpopup id="g_39" popupanimationtype="hidetobottom" popupsizeanimationtype="noanimation" stylevariant="default_transparentdialog" text="Open popup pane" >
<t:pane id="g_40" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@popupBackground@&#39;]}" border="#c0c0c0" padding="20" rounding="10" rowdistance="5" >
<t:row id="g_41" >
<t:button id="g_42" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_43" >
<t:button id="g_44" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_45" >
<t:button id="g_46" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_51" >
<t:label id="g_52" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Content animation:  Shaking" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_53" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:buttonpopup id="g_54" popupanimationtype="shake" popupsizeanimationtype="noanimation" stylevariant="default_transparentdialog" text="Open popup pane" >
<t:pane id="g_55" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@popupBackground@&#39;]}" border="#c0c0c0" padding="20" rounding="10" rowdistance="5" >
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:button id="g_57" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_58" >
<t:button id="g_59" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_60" >
<t:button id="g_61" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:buttonpopup>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoButtonPopupAnimation}")

public class DemoButtonPopupAnimation
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoButtonPopupAnimation(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demobuttonpopupanimation.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoButtonPopupAnimation}"; }
}

Client side copy&paste (Java Client only)

There are special menu items that you can add to either the MENUBAR-menus or to the POPUPMENU-menus:

The so called SYSTEMMENUITEM-components are executing a client command - i.e. they do not communitcate to the server side as normal MENUITEM-components.

Currently there are three commands:
(.) copy
(.) cut
(.) paste
The three commands are operating with the client side clipboard and are linked to the text-input-components (FIELD, FORMATTEDFIELD, ...) within your page.

You need to define the command within the attribute CLIENTSYSTEMCOMMAND.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:row id="g_1" >
<t:menubar id="g_2" width="100%" >
<t:menu id="g_3" text="System Menu" >
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_4" clientsystemcommand="cut" text="Cut" />
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_5" clientsystemcommand="copy" text="Copy" />
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_6" clientsystemcommand="paste" text="Paste" />
</t:menu>
</t:menubar>
</t:row>
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_7" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand}" popupmenu="COPYPASTE" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_9" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_10" actionListener="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.onSynchronize}" flush="true" text="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.firstName}" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_12" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_13" actionListener="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.onSynchronize}" enabled="false" flush="true" text="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.lastName}" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:label id="g_15" text="Comment" width="100" />
<t:textarea id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.onSynchronize}" flush="true" height="100" text="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.comment}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:coldistance id="g_18" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand.onSynchronize}" text="Synchronize" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="COPYPASTE" >
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_20" clientsystemcommand="cut" text="Cut" />
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_21" clientsystemcommand="copy" text="Copy" />
<t:systemmenuitem id="g_22" clientsystemcommand="paste" text="Paste" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.ClientTestLog;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.IClientLogAware;
import org.eclnt.util.log.CLog;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoMenuClientSystemCommand}")

public class DemoMenuClientSystemCommand 
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable, IClientLogAware
{
    protected String m_comment = "Comment on CaptainCasa.";
    protected String m_lastName = "Casa";
    protected String m_firstName = "Captain";
    
    public DemoMenuClientSystemCommand(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("systemmenuitem");
    }
    
    public String getComment() { return m_comment; }
    public void setComment(String value) { m_comment = value; }

    public String getLastName() { return m_lastName; }
    public void setLastName(String value) { m_lastName = value; }

    public String getFirstName() { return m_firstName; }
    public void setFirstName(String value) { m_firstName = value; }

    public void onSynchronize(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        CLog.L.log(CLog.LL_INF,"***** First Name = " + m_firstName);
        CLog.L.log(CLog.LL_INF,"***** Last Name = " + m_lastName);
        CLog.L.log(CLog.LL_INF,"***** Comment = " + m_lastName);
        Statusbar.outputSuccess(m_firstName + " / " + m_lastName + " / " + m_comment);
    }
    
    public boolean onCreateClientTestLogMessage()
    {
        ClientTestLog.addClientTestLogMessage(m_firstName + "/" + m_lastName + "/" + m_comment);
        return false;
    }
    
    
}

Flexible Menu Item Container

You can insert the component MENUITEMCONTAINER into menus. Inside the MENUITEMCONTAINER you can arrange - in principal - any content.

But: you should only use this component for simple content - e.g. if you want to integrate an up/download link into a menu. Definitely do not use this component for complex form scenario! The menu may close any time (e.g. if losing the focus)!

And: it is only possible to define one menu level - i.e. it's not possible to open a second menu within the menu.

Please note: MENUITEMCONTAINER items cannot be disabled, you need to explicitly disable their content components.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer}" popupmenu="ALLPOPUP" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Button Menu" width="100" />
<t:buttonmenu id="g_4" buttonmenumode="buttonandmenu" text="Buton Menu" >
<t:menuitem id="g_5" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_6" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_7" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_9" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_10" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_12" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_13" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_14" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_15" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
</t:buttonmenu>
<t:coldistance id="g_16" width="60" />
<t:checkbox id="g_17" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Items enabled" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:label id="g_19" text="Menu Bar" width="100" />
<t:menubar id="g_20" width="100%" >
<t:menu id="g_21" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_22" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_23" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_24" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_25" >
<t:label id="g_26" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_27" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:label id="g_29" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_30" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_31" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_32" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
<t:menu id="g_33" text="Sub Menu" >
<t:menuitem id="g_34" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_35" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_36" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_37" >
<t:label id="g_38" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_39" flush="true" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_40" >
<t:label id="g_41" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_42" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_43" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_44" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
</t:menu>
</t:menu>
<t:menu id="g_45" text="Menu Bar Item 2" >
<t:menuitem id="g_46" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_47" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_48" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_49" >
<t:label id="g_50" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_51" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_52" >
<t:label id="g_53" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_54" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_55" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_56" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
<t:menu id="g_57" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_58" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_59" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_60" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_61" >
<t:label id="g_62" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_63" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_64" >
<t:label id="g_65" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_66" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_67" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_68" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
</t:menu>
<t:menu id="g_69" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_70" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_71" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_72" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_73" >
<t:label id="g_74" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_75" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_76" >
<t:label id="g_77" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_78" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_79" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_80" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
<t:menu id="g_81" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_82" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_83" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_84" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_85" >
<t:label id="g_86" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_87" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_88" >
<t:label id="g_89" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_90" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_91" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_92" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
</t:menu>
</t:menu>
<t:menu id="g_93" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_94" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_95" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_96" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_97" >
<t:label id="g_98" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_99" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_100" >
<t:label id="g_101" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_102" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_103" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_104" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
<t:menu id="g_105" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_106" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_107" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_108" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_109" >

<t:field id="g_111" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_112" >
<t:label id="g_113" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_114" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_115" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_116" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
</t:menu>
<t:menu id="g_117" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
<t:menuitem id="g_118" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_119" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 2" />
<t:menuitemcontainer id="g_120" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000008,vertical)" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_121" >
<t:label id="g_122" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_123" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_124" >
<t:label id="g_125" text="A field" width="60" />
<t:field id="g_126" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:menuitemcontainer>
<t:menuitem id="g_127" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 3" />
<t:menuitem id="g_128" enabled="#{d.DemoMenuItemContainer.itemsEnabled}" text="Normal Item 4" />
<t:menu id="g_129" text="Menu Bar Item 1" >
