The SCHEDULE component represents one schedule line. You can place SCHEDULEITEM components inside, each item representing a bar within the SCHEDULE line.

The sizing logic is: in the schedule line there is a SCHEDULEMAX property. This is an integer value which represents the "most right" coordinate in the schedule (the most left one is represented by "0"). Each SCHEDULEITEM component defines a SCHEDULELEFT and a SCHEDULERIGHT attribute - defining its position in the SCHEDULE. If there are overlapping items then the height of the items is automatically adjusted, so that they are shown as parallel items.

Each SCHEDULEITEM has a text which is displayed - and there are attributes to define the colouring etc.

Both SCHEDULE and SCHEDULEITEM provide the drag & drop interface - please check the schedule grid demo to see how they can be used.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoSchedule}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Horizontal" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_4" border="#8080FF" height="50" numberofblocks="4" padding="3" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection1}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" invokeevent="doubleclick" scheduleleft="0" schedulewidth="14" text="Production" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection2}" align="center" background="#FF000080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" font="weight:bold" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="10" text="Break" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_7" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection3}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" scheduleleft="30" schedulewidth="25" text="Production" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_8" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection3}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" scheduleleft="40" schedulewidth="25" text="Production" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:label id="g_10" text="Vertical" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_11" border="#8080FF" height="200" numberofblocks="4" orientation="vertical" padding="3" schedulemax="100" width="100" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_12" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection1}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" scheduleleft="0" schedulewidth="14" text="Production" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_13" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection2}" align="center" background="#FF000080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" font="weight:bold" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="10" text="Break" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection3}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" scheduleleft="40" schedulewidth="25" text="Production" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_15" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onSelection3}" background="#00FF0080" border="#80808010" flushonselect="true" scheduleleft="30" schedulewidth="25" text="Production" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_16" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" text="Schedule Grid" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoSchedule.onStartScheduleGrid}" text="Start!" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModalPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoSchedule}")

public class DemoSchedule
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    ModalPopup m_popup;
    
    public DemoSchedule(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("schedule");
    }

    public void onStartScheduleGrid(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_popup = ModalPopup.createInstance();
        m_popup.open("/workplace/demoschedulegrid.jsp","Scheduling Grid",800,600,new ModalPopup.IModalPopupListener()
        {
            public void reactOnPopupClosedByUser()
            {
                m_popup.close();
            }
        });
    }
    
    public void onSelection1(ActionEvent ae)
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Selected first schedule. " + ae.getClass().getName());
    }
    
    public void onSelection2(ActionEvent ae)
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Selected second schedule " + ae.getClass().getName());
    }
    
    public void onSelection3(ActionEvent ae)
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Selected third schedule. " + ae.getClass().getName());
    }
}

Schedule Grid

This demo shows how to use the components SCHEDULE and SCHEDULEITEM in order to build complex scheduling scenarios. The story behind is very simple:

Each grid row contains one SCHEDULE component. The SCHEDULEITEMS components within the SCHEDUL are created dynamically - dependent on the scheduling situation.

There is a drag & drop management - and there is the possibility to create new items by right mouse button click. In both cases the mouse position that is transferred as percentage value into the server side processing is used to properly position the SCHEDULE component.

For drawing background information (here: break times ) a DRAWAREA can be nicely used.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleGrid}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_3" height="100%" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleGrid.rows}" rowheight="50" sbvisibleamount="10" width="100%" >
<t:gridheader id="g_4" >
<t:label id="g_5" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorBlue@&#39;]}" />
<t:schedule id="g_6" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorBlue@&#39;]}" border="0" numberofblocks="8" schedulemax="480" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_7" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="0" schedulewidth="60" text="08:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_8" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="60" schedulewidth="60" text="09:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_9" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="120" schedulewidth="60" text="10:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_10" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="180" schedulewidth="60" text="11:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_11" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="240" schedulewidth="60" text="12:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_12" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="300" schedulewidth="60" text="13:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_13" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="360" schedulewidth="60" text="14:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_14" align="left" font="weight:bold;size:9" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="420" schedulewidth="60" text="15:00" textwithlinewrap="false" />
</t:schedule>
</t:gridheader>
<t:gridcol id="g_15" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@titlebarBackground@&#39;]}" font="weight:bold" foreground="#F0F0F0" text="Machine" width="80" >
<t:label id="g_16" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorBlue@&#39;]}" text=".{machine}" />
</t:gridcol>
<t:gridcol id="g_17" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@titlebarBackground@&#39;]}" foreground="#F0F0F0" text="Orders" width="100%" >
<t:drawarea id="g_18" drawcommands="rectangle(12.5%,0,6.25%,100%,#ff000020);write(13.5%,1,Breakf.,10,#FF000080,lefttop);rectangle(43.75%,0,18.75%,100%,#ff000020);write(44.75%,1,Lunch,10,#FF000080,lefttop)" >
<t:schedule id="g_19" actionListener=".{onScheduleAction}" border="0" dropreceive="order" height="100%" numberofblocks="8" padding="5" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" schedulemax="480" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_20" contentbinding=".{content}" />
</t:schedule>
</t:drawarea>
</t:gridcol>
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="SCHEDULE" >
<t:menuitem id="g_21" command="cmdCreateNewOrder" text="Create new Order" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.Set;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCHEDULEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventDrop;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.valuemgmt.IActionListenerDelegation;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.valuemgmt.impl.LongDelegation;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoScheduleGrid}")

public class DemoScheduleGrid
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public class MyOrder implements Serializable
    {
        String i_key = "id"+(s_orderId++) + "";
        String i_name;
        long i_start; // 0 == 8:00, then in minutes
        long i_duration; // in minutes
        MyRow i_assignedRow;
        public MyOrder(String name, long start, long duration, MyRow assignedRow)
        {
            super();
            i_name = name;
            i_start = start;
            i_duration = duration;
            m_orders.put(i_key,this);
            i_assignedRow = assignedRow;
        }
        public long getStart() { return i_start; }
        public void setStart(long start) { i_start = start; }
        public void setDuration(long value) { i_duration = value; }
        public long getDuration() { return i_duration; }
//        public void onInvoke(ActionEvent ae)
//        {
//            if (ae instanceof BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)
//            {
//                BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged sscEvent = (BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)ae;
//                i_start = sscEvent.getScheduleLeft();
//                i_duration = sscEvent.getScheduleWidth();
//            }
//        }
    }
    
    public class MyRow extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        Set<MyOrder> i_orders = new HashSet<MyOrder>(); 
        String m_machine;
        DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_content = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
        
        
        public String getMachine() { return m_machine; }
        public void setMachine(String value) { m_machine = value; }
        public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getContent() { return m_content; }
        
        private void updateSchedule()
        {
            // update of the components within the schedule row
            StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
            List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
            for (final MyOrder order: i_orders)
            {
                String expression = "#{d.DemoScheduleGrid.orders."+order.i_key+".onInvoke}";
                String background = null;
                if (order.i_name != null && order.i_name.contains("New"))
                    background = "#8da8d0c0";
                else
                    background = "#a8d08dc0";
                SCHEDULEITEMNode node = new SCHEDULEITEMNode()
                    .setScheduleleft(""+ order.i_start)
                    // .setSchedulewidth("#{d.DemoScheduleGrid.orders."+order.i_key+".duration}")
                    .bindSchedulewidth(new LongDelegation()
                    {
                        @Override
                        public void setValue(Long value) { order.setDuration(value); }
                        @Override
                        public Long getValue() { return order.getDuration(); }
                    })
                    .setStylevariant("ccgantt2")
                    .setText(order.i_name + "/" + order.i_start +"/" + order.i_duration)
                    .setValign("middle")
                    .setTooltip(order.i_name + "/" + order.i_start +"/" + order.i_duration)
                    .setBackground(background)
                    .setDragsend("order:"+order.i_key)
                    .setTextwithlinewrap("false")
                    // .setActionListener("#{d.DemoScheduleGrid.orders."+order.i_key+".onInvoke}")
                    .bindActionListener(new IActionListenerDelegation()
                    {
                        @Override
                        public void onAction(ActionEvent event) 
                        { 
                            if (event instanceof BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)
                            {
                                BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged sscEvent = (BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)event;
                                order.setStart(sscEvent.getScheduleLeft());
                                order.setDuration(sscEvent.getScheduleWidth());
                            }
                        }
                    })
                    .setSizeratbothsides("true")
                    .setDragsticktocursor("false")
                    .setFocusable("true");
                nodes.add(node);
            }
            m_content.setContentNodes(nodes);
        }
        
        public void addOrder(MyOrder order)
        {
            i_orders.add(order);
            order.i_assignedRow = this;
            updateSchedule();
        }
        
        public void removeOrder(MyOrder order)
        {
            i_orders.remove(order);
            updateSchedule();
        }
        
        public void onScheduleAction(ActionEvent ae)
        {
            if (ae instanceof BaseActionEventDrop)
            {
                BaseActionEventDrop baed = (BaseActionEventDrop)ae;
                String dropInfo = baed.getDragInfo();
                String orderKey = dropInfo.substring("order:".length());
                MyOrder order = m_orders.get(orderKey);
                // new start
                float percX = baed.getPercentageHorizontaAsFloat() + baed.getPercentageDeltaX();
                order.i_start = Math.round(percX / 100f * 480f);
                order.i_start = ((order.i_start+7) / 15) * 15;
                // reassign to new row
                order.i_assignedRow.removeOrder(order);
                addOrder(order);
            }
            else if (ae instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
            {
                BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem bae = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)ae;
                int start = Math.round((float)bae.getPercentageHorizontal() / 100f * 480f);  
                start = ((start+7) / 15) * 15;
                int duration = s_random.nextInt(100);
                MyOrder o = new MyOrder("New Order",start,duration,this);
                addOrder(o);
            }
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    static Random s_random = new Random();
    static int s_orderId = 0;
    
    FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> m_rows = new FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow>();
    Map<String,MyOrder> m_orders = new HashMap<String,MyOrder>();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DemoScheduleGrid(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("schedule");
        for (int i=0; i<20; i++)
        {
            MyRow r = new MyRow();
            r.setMachine("Machine " +  i);
            m_rows.getItems().add(r);
            r.addOrder(new MyOrder("WO",s_random.nextInt(100),s_random.nextInt(100)+20,r));
            r.addOrder(new MyOrder("WO",250+s_random.nextInt(100),s_random.nextInt(120)+20,r));
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> getRows() { return m_rows; }
    public Map<String,MyOrder> getOrders() { return m_orders; }

}

Light weight schedule items

The SCHEDULEITEMAREA component is a simple variant of the SCHEDULEITEM component.

It is just representing a container area that is positioned inside a SCHEDULE - without any further function. You can place any type of component inside.

It's purpose is to serve as much more lightweight component (compared to SCHEDULEITEM) in scenarios, in which e.g. sizing of schedule items is not required.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleItemArea}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleItemArea}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_5" stylevariant="ccbig" text="The &#34;simple&#34; variant: SCHEDULEITEMAREA" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_10" text="Just a container" width="120" />
<t:schedule id="g_7" background="#F0F0F0" height="50" schedulemax="100" width="200" >
<t:scheduleitemarea id="g_18" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:label id="g_20" text="Some content" width="120" />
<t:schedule id="g_14" background="#F0F0F0" height="50" schedulemax="100" width="200" >
<t:scheduleitemarea id="g_15" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" >
<t:label id="g_16" align="center" text="Hello!" />
</t:scheduleitemarea>
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_22" text="Dynamic creation" width="120" />
<t:schedule id="g_2" background="#F0F0F0" height="40" numberofblocks="10" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_3" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleItemArea.dynContentSimple}" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCHEDULEITEMAREANode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoScheduleItemArea}")

public class DemoScheduleItemArea
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContentSimple = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoScheduleItemArea(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        renderContentSimple();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoscheduleitemarea.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoScheduleItemArea}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContentSimple() { return m_dynContentSimple; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void renderContentSimple()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<25; i++)
        {
            String background;
            if (i%2 == 0)
                background = "#FFFFFF";
            else
                background = "#800000";
            SCHEDULEITEMAREANode sia = new SCHEDULEITEMAREANode()
                    .setScheduleleft(i*5)
                    .setSchedulewidth(4)
                    .setBackground(background);
            l.add(sia);
        }
        m_dynContentSimple.setContentNodes(l);
    }

}

Schedule item variants

There are pre-configured style variants available that render the schedule item with a certain clipping area.

Check the corresponding style class definitions (e.g. "riscscheduleitem_gantt1"): in the style class there the definition of a clip-path using polygons:

clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, calc(100% - 5px) calc(100% - 5px), 5px calc(100% - 5px), 0px 100%, 0px 0px)

Of course you may add own style classes with own clip-path definitions.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleItemVariants}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleItemVariants}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:label id="g_5" stylevariant="ccbig" text="SCHEDULEITEM" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_9" text="&#34;ccgantt1&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_2" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_3" align="center" background="#808080C0" foreground="#FFFFFF" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt1" text="Hello" valign="middle" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_24" text="&#34;ccgantt2&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_14" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_38" align="center" background="#800000C0" foreground="#FFFFFF" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt2" text="Hello" valign="middle" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_29" >
<t:label id="g_30" text="&#34;ccgantt3&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_31" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_40" align="center" background="#008000C0" foreground="#FFFFFF" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt3" text="Hello" valign="middle" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:label id="g_16" stylevariant="ccbig" text="SCHEDULEITEMAREA" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_26" text="&#34;ccgantt1&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_18" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitemarea id="g_19" background="#808080C0" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt1" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:label id="g_27" text="&#34;ccgantt2&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_21" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitemarea id="g_22" background="#800000C0" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt2" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_33" >
<t:label id="g_34" text="&#34;ccgantt3&#34;" width="100" />
<t:schedule id="g_35" height="40" numberofblocks="5" schedulemax="100" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitemarea id="g_36" background="#008000C0" scheduleleft="25" schedulewidth="50" stylevariant="ccgantt3" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoScheduleItemVariants}")

public class DemoScheduleItemVariants
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoScheduleItemVariants(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoscheduleitemvariants.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoScheduleItemVariants}"; }
}

Time Range Selection

This demo shows a time selection.

Drag and drop the coloured icons on the top right of each area into the schedule area. In the schedule area you can manipulat the size of and you can drag & drop.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoTimeSelectionGrid}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_3" background="#00000010" border="left:0;right:0;top:0;bottom:0" enabled="false" horizontalscrollmode="autowithresize" objectbinding="#{d.DemoTimeSelectionGrid.grid}" rowheight="102" sbvisibleamount="4" showemptyrows="false" suppressheadline="true" width="100%" >
<t:gridcol id="g_4" text="Column" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_5" >
<t:rowpagebeaninclude id="g_6" pagebeanbinding=".{ts}" />
</t:pane>
</t:gridcol>
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_7" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:button id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoTimeSelectionGrid.onAddTimeSelection}" text="Add Time Selection" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoTimeSelectionGrid}")

public class DemoTimeSelectionGrid
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public class GridItem extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        DemoTimeSelection i_ts = new DemoTimeSelection();
        public DemoTimeSelection getTs() { return i_ts; }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    protected FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> m_grid = new FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem>();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DemoTimeSelectionGrid(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);   
        onAddTimeSelection(null);
    }
    
    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demotimeselectiongrid.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoTimeSelectionGrid}"; }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> getGrid() { return m_grid; }
    
    public void onAddTimeSelection(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        GridItem gi = new GridItem();
        m_grid.getItems().add(gi);
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    

}

Week Schedule

This demo shows the usage of SCHEDULE and SCHEDULEITEM in the scenario of a week planner.

Quite a lot of issues are contained in the example:

1. dynamic generation of content (DNYAMICCONTENT)
2. Drag and Drop
3. Popup Menu Management

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:coldistance id="g_3" width="45" />
<t:label id="g_4" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Mon" width="16%" />
<t:label id="g_5" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Tue" width="16%" />
<t:label id="g_6" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Wed" width="16%" />
<t:label id="g_7" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Thu" width="16%" />
<t:label id="g_8" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Fri" width="16%" />
<t:label id="g_9" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Sat" width="10%" />
<t:label id="g_10" align="center" background="#c0c0c0" cutwidth="true" text="Sun" width="10%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:schedule id="g_12" background="#e0e0e0" height="100%" numberofblocks="0" orientation="vertical" schedulemax="24" width="45" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_13" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="0" schedulewidth="1" text="00:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_14" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="2" schedulewidth="1" text="02:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_15" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="4" schedulewidth="1" text="04:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_16" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="6" schedulewidth="1" text="06:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_17" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="8" schedulewidth="1" text="08:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_18" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="9" schedulewidth="1" text="09:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_19" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="10" schedulewidth="1" text="10:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_20" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="11" schedulewidth="1" text="11:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_21" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="12" schedulewidth="1" text="12:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_22" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="13" schedulewidth="1" text="13:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_23" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="14" schedulewidth="1" text="14:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_24" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="15" schedulewidth="1" text="15:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_25" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="16" schedulewidth="1" text="16:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_26" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="17" schedulewidth="1" text="17:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_27" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="18" schedulewidth="1" text="18:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_28" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="20" schedulewidth="1" text="20:00" />
<t:scheduleitem id="g_29" resizingenabled="false" scheduleleft="22" schedulewidth="1" text="22:00" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_30" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_31" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#f0f0f0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="0" schedulemax="1440" width="16%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_32" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[0]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_33" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_34" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#f0f0f0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="1" schedulemax="1440" width="16%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_35" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[1]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_36" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_37" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#f0f0f0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="2" schedulemax="1440" width="16%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_38" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[2]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_39" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_40" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#f0f0f0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="3" schedulemax="1440" width="16%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_41" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[3]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_42" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_43" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#f0f0f0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="4" schedulemax="1440" width="16%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_44" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[4]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_45" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_46" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#e0e0e0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="5" schedulemax="1440" width="10%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_47" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[5]}" />
</t:schedule>
<t:colline id="g_48" height="100%" />
<t:schedule id="g_49" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onScheduleAction}" background="#e0e0e0" dropreceive="OCC" focusable="false" height="100%" numberofblocks="24" orientation="vertical" popupmenu="SCHEDULE" reference="6" schedulemax="1440" width="10%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_50" contentbinding="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.dyns[6]}" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_51" height="10" />
<t:row id="g_52" >
<t:label id="g_53" text="Text" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_54" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onSelectedDocTextAction}" enabled="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.selectedDocAvailable}" flush="true" flushtimer="1000" text="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.selectedOcc.text}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_55" height="3" />
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:label id="g_57" text="Duration" width="100" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_58" actionListener="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.onSelectedDocDurationAction}" enabled="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.selectedDocAvailable}" flush="true" flushtimer="1000" format="int" value="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek.selectedOcc.duration}" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="SCHEDULE" >
<t:menuitem id="g_59" command="CREATENEWOCCUPATION" text="Create new Occupation" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:popupmenu id="SCHEDULEITEM" >
<t:menuitem id="g_60" command="REMOVE" text="Remove" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.BaseActionEvent;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCHEDULEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventDrop;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventInvoke;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedBean;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoScheduleWeek}")

public class DemoScheduleWeek
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public class Day
    {
        int i_index;
        public Day(int index)
        {
            i_index = index;
        }
        Map<Integer,Occupation> i_occupations = new HashMap<Integer,Occupation>();
        public Occupation createOccupation(String text, int from, int duration)
        {
            Occupation occ = new Occupation();
            occ.i_day = this;
            occ.i_text = text;
            occ.i_from = from;
            occ.i_duration = duration;
            i_occupations.put(occ.i_id,occ);
            m_allOccs.put(occ.i_id,occ);
            return occ;
        }
    }
    
    public class Occupation
    {
        int i_id = s_idCounter++;
        Day i_day;
        long i_from; // in minutes of day
        long i_duration; // in minutes
        String i_text;
        public String getText() { return i_text; }
        public void setText(String text) { i_text = text; }
        public long getDuration() { return i_duration; }
        public void setDuration(long duration) { i_duration = duration; }
        public void moveTo(Day day, int from)
        {
            i_day.i_occupations.remove(i_id);
            i_day = day;
            i_day.i_occupations.put(i_id,this);
            i_from = from;
        }
        public void remove()
        {
            i_day.i_occupations.remove(i_id);
            m_allOccs.remove(i_id);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    static int s_idCounter = 0;
    
    Map<Integer,Occupation> m_allOccs = new HashMap<Integer,Occupation>();
    Day[] m_days = new Day[] {new Day(0),new Day(1),new Day(2),new Day(3),new Day(4),new Day(5),new Day(6)};
    
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding[] m_dyns = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding[] 
        {new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),
         new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding(),
         new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding()};
    
    Occupation m_selectedOcc = null;
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoScheduleWeek(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        // put some occupations
        m_days[0].createOccupation("Weekly Meeting",600,120);
        m_days[2].createOccupation("Review",900,240);
        m_days[4].createOccupation("Clean up",1080,120);
        // render
        render();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoscheduleweek.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoScheduleWeek}"; }
    public Map<Integer,Occupation> getAllOccs() { return m_allOccs; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding[] getDyns() { return m_dyns; }
    public Occupation getSelectedOcc() { return m_selectedOcc; }
    public boolean isSelectedDocAvailable() { return m_selectedOcc != null; }
    
    public void onScheduleItemAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        String reference = ((BaseActionEvent)event).getSourceReference();
        int occId = ValueManager.decodeInt(reference,-1);
        if (occId < 0)
            throw new Error("Should never happen...");
        m_selectedOcc = m_allOccs.get(occId);
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventInvoke)
        {
            // no special activities here...
        }
        else if (event instanceof BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)
        {
            BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged e = (BaseActionEventScheduleSizeChanged)event;
            m_selectedOcc.i_from = e.getScheduleLeft();
            m_selectedOcc.i_duration = e.getScheduleWidth();
        }
        else if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("REMOVE".equals(e.getCommand()))
            {
                int dayIndex = m_selectedOcc.i_day.i_index;
                m_selectedOcc.remove();
                m_selectedOcc = null;
                renderDay(dayIndex);
            }
        }
    }

    public void onSelectedDocTextAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
    }

    public void onSelectedDocDurationAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
    }

    public void onScheduleAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        String reference = ((BaseActionEvent)event).getSourceReference();
        int dayId = ValueManager.decodeInt(reference,-1);
        if (dayId < 0 || dayId > 6)
            throw new Error("Should never happen...");
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventDrop)
        {
            BaseActionEventDrop e = (BaseActionEventDrop)event;
            String dragInfo = e.getDragInfo();
            if (dragInfo.startsWith("OCC:"))
            {
                int occId = ValueManager.decodeInt(dragInfo.substring(4),-1);
                Occupation occ = m_allOccs.get(occId);
                int newFrom = Math.round((e.getPercentageVerticalAsFloat() + e.getPercentageDeltaY()) * (float)1440 / (float) 100);
                occ.moveTo(m_days[dayId],newFrom);
                render();
            }
        }
        else if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem e = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            if ("CREATENEWOCCUPATION".equals(e.getCommand()));
            {
                int newFrom = Math.round(e.getPercentageVerticalAsFloat() * (float)1440 / (float) 100);
                Occupation occ = m_days[dayId].createOccupation("New",newFrom,120);
                m_selectedOcc = occ;
                renderDay(dayId);
            }
        }
    }

    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void render()
    {
        for (int i=0; i<7; i++)
            renderDay(i);
    }
    
    private void renderDay(int dayIndex)
    {
        Day day = m_days[dayIndex];
        List<ComponentNode> lcns = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (Occupation occ: day.i_occupations.values())
        {
            SCHEDULEITEMNode sin = new SCHEDULEITEMNode();
            lcns.add(sin);
            sin.setText(getRootExpressionUsedInPage().replace("}",".allOccs["+occ.i_id+"].text}"));
            sin.setScheduleleft(""+occ.i_from);
            sin.setSchedulewidth(getRootExpressionUsedInPage().replace("}",".allOccs["+occ.i_id+"].duration}"));
            sin.setBackground("#FFFFC0");
            sin.setReference(""+occ.i_id);
            sin.setInvokeevent("click");
            sin.setSizeratbothsides(true);
            sin.setDragsend("OCC:"+occ.i_id);
            sin.setPopupmenu("SCHEDULEITEM");
            sin.setActionListener(getRootExpressionUsedInPage().replace("}",".onScheduleItemAction}"));
        }
        m_dyns[dayIndex].setContentNodes(lcns);
    }
    
}

Padding definition

You can define a padding on SCHEDULE level that defines the distance that is kept to contained SCHEDULEITEM instances.

You may either define one value, which is applied to the top and the bottom, or you can explicitly define the top and the bottom padding.

In case the SCHEDULE is oriented vertically (attribute ORIENTATION) then you may use the left and the right padding for assigning two different padding values.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoSchedulePadding}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Padding undefined" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_4" height="40" numberofblocks="10" schedulemax="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_5" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" text="Padding 0" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_8" height="40" numberofblocks="10" padding="0" schedulemax="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_9" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:label id="g_11" text="Padding 5" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_12" height="40" numberofblocks="10" padding="5" schedulemax="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_13" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:label id="g_15" text="Padding 10;0" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_16" height="40" numberofblocks="10" padding="top:10;bottom:0" schedulemax="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_17" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:label id="g_19" text="Padding 0;10" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_20" height="40" numberofblocks="10" padding="top:0;bottom:10" schedulemax="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_21" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:label id="g_23" text="Padding 0;10" width="150" />
<t:schedule id="g_24" height="200" numberofblocks="10" orientation="vertical" padding="left:0;right:10" schedulemax="10" width="200" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_25" align="center" background="#27a3dd" foreground="#F0F0F0" scheduleleft="5" schedulewidth="2" text="Some text" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoSchedulePadding}")

public class DemoSchedulePadding
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoSchedulePadding(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoschedulepadding.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoSchedulePadding}"; }
}

Gantt-type diagram (PBC)

The page bean component CCMultiLineSchedule2 supports the definition of dependencies between schedule items. They are shown if clicking onto an item.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_26" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2}" >
<t:row id="g_22" rendered="false" >
<t:schedule id="g_2" height="30" numberofblocks="10" width="100%" >
<t:scheduleitem id="g_3" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@baseColor@&#39;]}" scheduleleft="20" schedulewidth="40" stylevariant="ccgantt1" />
</t:schedule>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:pagebeancomponent id="g_10" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.mlSchedule}" />
</t:row>
<t:rowfooter id="g_4" coldistance="10" >
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="30" />
<t:coldistance id="g_18" width="30" />
<t:coldistance id="g_12" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_13" actionListener="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.onPreviousAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" text="&lt;" width="100+" />
<t:button id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.onNextAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" text="&gt;" width="100+" />
<t:calendarfield id="g_24" actionListener="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.onLeftTimeAction}" exacttime="true" flush="true" timezone="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.timeZone}" value="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.leftTime}" width="100" />
<t:coldistance id="g_15" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.onZoomOutAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" text="-" width="30+" />
<t:button id="g_20" actionListener="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2.onZoomInAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" text="+" width="30+" />
</t:rowfooter>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.HashSet;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.TimeZone;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCScheduleItemInfo;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.multilineschedule2.CCMultiLineSchedule2;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.multilineschedule2.ScheduleItem;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.multilineschedule2.ScheduleObject;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.DYNAMICCONTENTNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.FIXGRIDNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.GRIDHEADERNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.LABELNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PANENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.ROWNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCHEDULEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCHEDULENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SLIDECONTAINERNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventSlideContainer;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.StyleManager;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.valuemgmt.impl.IntegerDelegationLambda;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.valuemgmt.impl.StringDelegationLambda;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2}")

public class DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class Machine
    {
        String i_id;
        String i_text;
        Set<Order> i_orders = new HashSet<Order>();
    }
    
    public class Order
    {
        String i_id;
        Date i_from;
        Date i_to;
        long i_duration; // seconds
        Machine i_machine;
        Set<String> i_dependentOrders = new HashSet<String>();
    }
    
    public class ColorArea
    {
        String i_background;
        int i_fromHour;
        int i_toHour;
        public ColorArea(String background, int fromHour, int toHour)
        {
            i_background = background;
            i_fromHour = fromHour;
            i_toHour = toHour;
        }
    }

    /*
     * Top schedule showing the day. 
     */
    public class DayColumnInfo
    {
        Date i_date;
        int i_scheduleLeft;
        int i_scheduleDuration;
        public Date getDate() { return i_date; }
        public int getScheduleDuration() { return i_scheduleDuration; }
        public int getScheduleLeft() { return i_scheduleLeft; }
        public String getText()
        {
            if (i_date == null)
                return "";
            else
                return m_dayFormatter.format(i_date);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Map<String,Machine> m_machines = new HashMap<String,Machine>();
    Map<String,Order> m_orders = new HashMap<String,Order>();
    List<ColorArea> m_colorAreas = new ArrayList<ColorArea>();
    
    CCMultiLineSchedule2 m_mls = new CCMultiLineSchedule2();

    List<ScheduleObject> m_sos = new ArrayList<ScheduleObject>();
    List<ScheduleItem> m_sis = new ArrayList<ScheduleItem>();
    
    TimeZone m_timeZone = TimeZone.getDefault();
    DateFormat m_dayFormatter = DateFormat.getDateInstance();
    Date m_leftTime;
    int m_timeSpanShownInMinutes = 24 * 60;
    
    List<String> m_columnTitles = new ArrayList<String>();
    List<DayColumnInfo> m_dayInfos = new ArrayList<DayColumnInfo>();
    List<String> m_columnBackgrounds = new ArrayList<String>();
    
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_hourScheduleContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dayScheduleContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    
    int m_daySchedulePixelShift = 0;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPBCCCMultilineschedule2(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        Random r = new Random();
        m_leftTime = findInitialLeftTime();
        readShifts();
        readMachineOrders();
        transferMachines();
        transferOrders();
        updateScheduleObjectsBgpaint();
        updateColumnTitleStructure();
        updateColumnTitles();
        m_mls.prepare
        (
            this,
            new CCMultiLineSchedule2.IListener()
            {
                public void renderStructureUpdateGridLeftBeforeAddingGRIDCOL(FIXGRIDNode node) 
                {
                    renderHeadlineLeft(node);
                }
                public void renderStructureUpdateGridRightBeforeAddingGRIDCOL(FIXGRIDNode node) 
                {
                    renderHeadlineRight(node);
                }
                public void reactOnScheduleItemSelection(String scheduleItemId) 
                {
                }
                public void reactOnScheduleItemDoubleClickSelection(String scheduleItemId)
                {
                }
                public void renderStructureUpdateGridLeftAfterAddingGRIDCOL(FIXGRIDNode node) 
                {
                }
                public void renderStructureUpdateGridRightAfterAddingGRIDCOL(FIXGRIDNode node) 
                {
                }
                public void reactOnScheduleItemInternalDragDrop(ScheduleItem si, ScheduleObject so, long schedulePos, String command, boolean asCopy)
                {
                    si.setScheduleObjectId(so.getId());
                    si.setScheduleLeft(schedulePos);
                    m_mls.setScheduleItems(m_sis);
                    // update orders
                    Order o = m_orders.get(si.getItemId());
                    Machine m = m_machines.get(so.getId());
                    o.i_machine = m;
                    o.i_from = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() + schedulePos*1000);
                }
                public void reactOnScheduleDropFromOutside(String dragId, ScheduleObject so, long schedulePos, String command, boolean asCopy)
                {
                    Statusbar.outputAlert("Drop from outside " + schedulePos);
                }
                public void reactOnScheduleObjectExecute(ScheduleObject so)
                {
                }
                @Override
                public void reactOnGridColWidthScheduleObjectChanged(String width)
                {
                }
                @Override
                public IPageBean createPageBeanForScheduleItem(ScheduleItem si)
                {
                    CCScheduleItemInfo result = new CCScheduleItemInfo();
                    result.prepare(si.getText(),null);
                    result.setTextColor("#FFFFFF");
                    return result;
                }
            }
        );
        m_mls.setGridRowheight(33);
        m_mls.setScheduleMax(24*3600);
        m_mls.setScheduleNumberOfBlocks(12);
        m_mls.setMultilineMode(true);
        m_mls.setGridColWidthScheduleObject("200");
        m_mls.setGridSuppressHeadline(true);
    }

    private Date findInitialLeftTime()
    {
        Calendar cal = createCalendar();
        cal.setTime(new Date());
        cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.SECOND,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND,0);
        return cal.getTime();
    }

    private void transferOrders()
    {
        Date rightTime = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() + m_timeSpanShownInMinutes*60*1000);
        m_sis.clear();
        for (Order order: m_orders.values())
        {
            if (order.i_to.before(m_leftTime)) continue;
            if (order.i_from.after(rightTime)) continue;
            ScheduleItem si = new ScheduleItem();
            si.setItemId(order.i_id);
            si.setScheduleObjectId(order.i_machine.i_id);
            long durSeconds = (order.i_from.getTime() - m_leftTime.getTime()) / 1000l;
            si.setScheduleLeft(durSeconds);
            si.setScheduleWidth(order.i_duration);
            si.setText(order.i_id);
            si.getDependentScheduleItemIds().addAll(order.i_dependentOrders);
            si.setBackground(StyleManager.getStyleValue("@baseColor@"));
            m_sis.add(si);
        }
        m_mls.setScheduleItems(m_sis);
    }

    private void transferMachines()
    {
        m_sos.clear();
        List<String> machineIds = new ArrayList<String>(m_machines.keySet());
        Collections.sort(machineIds);
        for (String machineId: machineIds)
        {
            Machine m = m_machines.get(machineId);
            ScheduleObject so = new ScheduleObject();
            so.setId(m.i_id);
            so.setText(m.i_text);
            so.setBackground(StyleManager.getStyleValue("@backgroundColorBlue@"));
            m_sos.add(so);
        }
        m_mls.setScheduleObjects(m_sos);
    }
    
    private void updateHourColumnTitleStructure()
    {
        int numberOfHours = m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60;
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i = 0; i < 3 * numberOfHours; i++)
        {
            SCHEDULEITEMNode sin = new SCHEDULEITEMNode()
                    .setScheduleleft(i)
                    .setSchedulewidth(1)
                    .setText(pbx("columnTitles[" + i + "]"))
                    .setBackground(pbx("columnBackgrounds[" + i + "]"))
                    .setAlign("left")
                    .setValign("middle")
                    .setResizingenabled(false);
            nodes.add(sin);
        }
        m_hourScheduleContent.setContentNodes(nodes);
    }
    
    private void updateColumnTitleStructure()
    {
        updateDayColumnTitleStructure();
        updateHourColumnTitleStructure();
    }
    
    private void updateDayColumnTitleStructure()
    {
        int numberOfHours = m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60;
        int numberOfDays = (3* numberOfHours / 24) + 2;
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i = 0; i < numberOfDays; i++)
        {
            final int index = i;
            SCHEDULEITEMNode sin = new SCHEDULEITEMNode()
                    .bindScheduleleft(new IntegerDelegationLambda(() -> { return m_dayInfos.get(index).getScheduleLeft(); }))
                    .bindSchedulewidth(new IntegerDelegationLambda(() -> { return m_dayInfos.get(index).getScheduleDuration(); }))
                    .bindText(new StringDelegationLambda(() -> { return m_dayInfos.get(index).getText(); }))
                    .setAlign("left")
                    .setValign("middle")
                    .setResizingenabled(false)
                    .setBorder("left:1;color:#00000020");
            nodes.add(sin);
        }
        m_dayScheduleContent.setContentNodes(nodes);
    }
    
    private void updateColumnTitles()
    {
        updateDayColumnTitles();
        updateHourColumnTitles();
    }
    
    private void updateDayColumnTitles()
    {
        int numberOfHours = m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60;
        Date veryLeft = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() - numberOfHours*3600*1000);
        m_dayInfos.clear();
        for (int i=0; i<3*numberOfHours; i++)
        {
            DayColumnInfo dci = new DayColumnInfo();
            dci.i_date = findMidnightDate(veryLeft);
            dci.i_scheduleLeft = i;
            dci.i_scheduleDuration = 1;
            veryLeft = new Date(veryLeft.getTime() + 3600*1000);
            m_dayInfos.add(dci);
        }
        // merge
        for (int i=m_dayInfos.size()-1; i>=1; i--)
        {
            DayColumnInfo dci1 = m_dayInfos.get(i);
            DayColumnInfo dci0 = m_dayInfos.get(i-1);
            if (dci1.i_date.equals(dci0.i_date))
            {
                m_dayInfos.remove(i);
                dci0.i_scheduleDuration += dci1.i_scheduleDuration;
            }
        }
        // fill missing ones
        for (int i=0; i<3; i++)
        {
            DayColumnInfo dci = new DayColumnInfo();
            dci.i_scheduleLeft = -1;
            dci.i_scheduleDuration = 0;
            m_dayInfos.add(dci);
        }
    }
    
    private Date findMidnightDate(Date date)
    {
        Calendar cal = createCalendar();
        cal.setTime(date);
        cal.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.MINUTE,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.SECOND,0);
        cal.set(Calendar.MILLISECOND,0);
        return cal.getTime();
    }

    private void updateHourColumnTitles()
    {
        m_columnTitles.clear();
        m_columnBackgrounds.clear();
        Date veryLeft = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() - m_timeSpanShownInMinutes*60*1000);
        Calendar cal = createCalendar();
        int numberOfHours = m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60;
        for (int i=0; i<3*numberOfHours; i++)
        {
            cal.setTime(veryLeft);
            int hour = cal.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY);
            if (numberOfHours <= 24)
                m_columnTitles.add(hour+":00");
            else
                m_columnTitles.add(hour+"");
            ColorArea ca = findColorAreaForHour(hour);
            if (ca != null)
                m_columnBackgrounds.add(ca.i_background+"50");
            else
                m_columnBackgrounds.add("#00000000");
            veryLeft = new Date(veryLeft.getTime()+3600*1000);
        }
    }
    
    private int findHourOfDate(Date date)
    {
        Calendar cal = createCalendar();
        cal.setTime(date);
        return cal.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY);
    }
    
    private void updateScheduleObjectsBgpaint()
    {
        int durationInHours = m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60;
        List<Integer> durations = new ArrayList<Integer>();
        List<String> colorAreas = new ArrayList<String>();
        Date currentDate = m_leftTime;
        for (int i=0; i<durationInHours; i++)
        {
            int hour = findHourOfDate(currentDate);
            ColorArea ca = findColorAreaForHour(hour);
            durations.add(1);
            if (ca != null)
                colorAreas.add(ca.i_background);
            else
                colorAreas.add(null);
            currentDate = new Date(currentDate.getTime() + 3600*1000);
        }
        for (int i=durationInHours-1; i>=1; i--)
        {
            String ca1 = colorAreas.get(i);
            String ca0 = colorAreas.get(i-1);
            if (ValueManager.checkIfStringsAreEqual(ca0, ca1))
            {
                int duration = durations.get(i-1) + durations.get(i);
                durations.set(i-1,duration);
                durations.remove(i);
                colorAreas.remove(i);
            }
        }
        StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
        String template = "rectangle(${left}%,0,${width}%,100%,${color})";
        int currentHour = 0;
        double addon = 2d / (double)m_timeSpanShownInMinutes;
        for (int i=0; i<durations.size(); i++)
        {
            if (colorAreas.get(i) != null)
            {
                double percentageLeft = 100d * (double)currentHour / (double)durationInHours;
                double percentageWidth = 100d * (addon + (double)durations.get(i) / (double)durationInHours);
                String percentageLeftString = ValueManager.convertObject2ValueString(percentageLeft);
                String percentageWidthString = ValueManager.convertObject2ValueString(percentageWidth);
                String command = template.replace("${left}",percentageLeftString)
                                         .replace("${width}",percentageWidthString)
                                         .replace("${color}",colorAreas.get(i));
                if (sb.length() > 0)
                    sb.append(";");
                sb.append(command);
            }
            currentHour += durations.get(i);
        }
        String bgpaint = sb.toString();
        for (ScheduleObject so : m_sos)
        {
            so.setDrawCommands(bgpaint);
        }
    }
    
    private ColorArea findColorAreaForHour(int hour)
    {
        for (ColorArea ca: m_colorAreas)
        {
            if (ca.i_fromHour <= hour && ca.i_toHour > hour)
                return ca;
        }
        return null;
    }

    private void readMachineOrders()
    {
        Random r = new Random();
        Date now = new Date();
        int MAX_MACHINES = 15;
        int MAX_ORDERS = 25;
        int MAX_DAYS = 5;
        int orderCounter = 1000;
        Calendar cal = createCalendar();
        for (int i=0; i<MAX_MACHINES; i++)
        {
            Machine m = new Machine();
            m.i_id = "M"+i;
            m.i_text = "Machine " + i;
            m_machines.put(m.i_id,m);
            for (int j=0; j<MAX_ORDERS; j++)
            {
                cal.setTime(now);
                int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
                int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
                int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
                int hour = r.nextInt(24);
                int minute = r.nextInt(60);
                Order o = new Order();
                o.i_id = "O"+orderCounter;
                cal.clear();
                cal.set(year,month,day,hour,minute);
                cal.add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH,r.nextInt(MAX_DAYS));
                o.i_from = cal.getTime();
                o.i_duration = (r.nextInt(160) + 60) * 60;
                cal.add(Calendar.SECOND,(int)o.i_duration);
                o.i_to = cal.getTime();
                o.i_machine = m;
                m.i_orders.add(o);
                for (int k=0; k<3; k++)
                {
                    int linkedOrder = (1000+r.nextInt(MAX_MACHINES*MAX_ORDERS));
                    if (linkedOrder != orderCounter)
                        o.i_dependentOrders.add("O"+linkedOrder);
                }
                m_orders.put(o.i_id,o);
                orderCounter++;
            }
        }
    }

    private Calendar createCalendar()
    {
        Calendar result = Calendar.getInstance(m_timeZone);
        result.clear();
        return result;
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopbcccmultilineschedule.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.TestPBCCCMultiLineSchedule2}"; }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public Date getLeftTime() { return m_leftTime; }
    public void setLeftTime(Date leftTime) { m_leftTime = leftTime; }
    public void onLeftTimeAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        updateSchedule(false);
    }
    
    public String getTimeZone() { return m_timeZone.getID(); }
    
    public int getDaySchedulePixelShift() { return m_daySchedulePixelShift; } 
    public void setDaySchedulePixelShift(int daySchedulePixelShift) { m_daySchedulePixelShift = daySchedulePixelShift; } 
    
    public CCMultiLineSchedule2 getMlSchedule() { return m_mls; }
    
    public List<String> getColumnTitles() { return m_columnTitles; } 
    public List<String> getColumnBackgrounds() { return m_columnBackgrounds; } 

    protected void renderHeadlineLeft(FIXGRIDNode node)
    {
        {
            GRIDHEADERNode hn = new GRIDHEADERNode()
                    .setRowheight(50);
            node.addSubNode(hn);
            LABELNode ln = new LABELNode()
                    .setText("");
            hn.addSubNode(ln);
        }
    }
    
    protected void renderHeadlineRight(FIXGRIDNode node)
    {
        GRIDHEADERNode hn = new GRIDHEADERNode()
                .setRowheight(50);
        node.addSubNode(hn);
        SLIDECONTAINERNode sl = new SLIDECONTAINERNode()
                .setTriplesizecontent(true)
                .setValue(pbx("daySchedulePixelShift"))
                .bindActionListener((event) -> { processSlideEvent(event); });
        hn.addSubNode(sl);
        PANENode pa = new PANENode()
                .setWidth("100%")
                .setHeight("100%");
        sl.addSubNode(pa);
        {
            ROWNode ro = new ROWNode();
            pa.addSubNode(ro);
            SCHEDULENode sn = new SCHEDULENode()
                    .setWidth("100%")
                    .setHeight("100%")
                    .bindSchedulemax(new IntegerDelegationLambda(() -> { return 3 * m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60; }))
                    .setNumberofblocks(1)
                    .setPadding("0")
                    .setBackground("#00000020");
            ro.addSubNode(sn);
            DYNAMICCONTENTNode dn = new DYNAMICCONTENTNode()
                    .bindContentbinding(m_dayScheduleContent);
            sn.addSubNode(dn);
        }
        {
            ROWNode ro = new ROWNode();
            pa.addSubNode(ro);
            SCHEDULENode sn = new SCHEDULENode()
                    .setWidth("100%")
                    .setHeight("100%")
                    .bindSchedulemax(new IntegerDelegationLambda(() -> { return 3 * m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60; }))
                    .bindNumberofblocks(new IntegerDelegationLambda(() -> { return 3 * m_timeSpanShownInMinutes / 60; }))
                    .setPadding("0")
                    .setBackground("#00000010");
            ro.addSubNode(sn);
            DYNAMICCONTENTNode dn = new DYNAMICCONTENTNode()
                    .bindContentbinding(m_hourScheduleContent);
            sn.addSubNode(dn);
        }
    }
    
    public void onPreviousAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_leftTime = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() - 3600*1000);
        updateSchedule(false);
    }

    public void onNextAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_leftTime = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() + 3600*1000);
        updateSchedule(false);
    }
    
    public void onZoomInAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        m_timeSpanShownInMinutes -= (4 * 60);
        if (m_timeSpanShownInMinutes <= 0)
            m_timeSpanShownInMinutes = 240;
        updateSchedule(true);
    }

    public void onZoomOutAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        m_timeSpanShownInMinutes += (4 * 60);
        updateSchedule(true);
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void updateSchedule(boolean structureUpdate)
    {
        updateScheduleConfiguration();
        transferOrders();
        updateScheduleObjectsBgpaint();
        if (structureUpdate == true)
            updateColumnTitleStructure();
        updateColumnTitles();
    }

    private void updateScheduleConfiguration()
    {
        m_mls.setScheduleMax(m_timeSpanShownInMinutes*60);
        m_mls.setScheduleNumberOfBlocks((m_timeSpanShownInMinutes/60)/2);
    }

    private void readShifts()
    {
        m_colorAreas.add(new ColorArea("#EFD5BC",0,1));
        m_colorAreas.add(new ColorArea("#FFE5CC",1,6));
        m_colorAreas.add(new ColorArea("#E5FFCC",6,14));
        m_colorAreas.add(new ColorArea("#FFE5CC",22,24));
    }

    private void processSlideEvent(ActionEvent event)
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventSlideContainer)
        {
            BaseActionEventSlideContainer e = (BaseActionEventSlideContainer)event;
            double hours = ((double)m_timeSpanShownInMinutes * ((double)e.getPixelShift() / (double)e.getPixelWidth())) / 60d;
            int hourShift = (int)Math.round(hours);
            m_leftTime = new Date(m_leftTime.getTime() + hourShift*3600*1000);
            updateSchedule(false);
            m_daySchedulePixelShift = 0;
        }
    }

}

Animation & Graphics & Sound

Image Selector

The IMAGESHAKER component is a nice one! It outputs a list of images and lets the user select. There is a certain animation involved with selecting the image.

Each image selection is passed to server side so that your program can react.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoImageShaker}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:imageshaker id="g_3" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#808080,#404040,vertical)" height="200" imageheight="120" imagewidth="120" objectbinding="#{d.DemoImageShaker.shaker}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:button id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoImageShaker.shaker.onPrevious}" text="Previous" />
<t:button id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoImageShaker.shaker.onNext}" text="Next" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_7" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_9" text="Selected Index" width="100" />
<t:label id="g_10" font="weight:bold" text="#{d.DemoImageShaker.selection}" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.IMAGESHAKERBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoImageShaker}")

public class DemoImageShaker
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public class MyIMAGESHAKERBinding extends IMAGESHAKERBinding
    {
        @Override
        protected void reactOnImageSelect(int selectedIndex)
        {
            Statusbar.outputMessage("Image selection, index: " + selectedIndex);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    protected MyIMAGESHAKERBinding m_shaker = new MyIMAGESHAKERBinding();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DemoImageShaker(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("imageshaker");
        m_shaker.addImage("/images/pictures/photo0.gif","Photo 0"); // with tooltip
        m_shaker.addImage("/images/pictures/photo1.gif","Photo 1"); // with tooltip
        m_shaker.addImage("/images/pictures/photo2.gif","Photo 2"); // with tooltip
        m_shaker.addImage("/images/pictures/photo3.gif"); // without tooltip
        m_shaker.addImage("/images/pictures/photo4.gif"); // without tooltip
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public MyIMAGESHAKERBinding getShaker() { return m_shaker; }
    
    public int getSelection() 
    { 
        return m_shaker.getSelectedIndex(); 
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
}

Image Capturer & Animator (1)

The CAPTUREANIMATOR component creates an internal screenshot of the component, in which it is placed. This screenshot then is passed to an animation that e.g. hides the screenshot into a certain direction. All this happens if a trigger from the server side is activated.

There are different animation types that you can select from.

With the CPATUREANIMATOR you can create nice optical effects to tell the user that certain data has changed on the screen. Although it seems that during the animation phase, there are two page areas painted in parallel: the bottom one is the "real one", the animated top one is the internal screen shot image of the area as it was before the update.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Animation Type" width="100" />
<t:combobox id="g_4" value="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationType}" width="100" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_5" text="default" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_6" text="hidecontenttotop" value="hidecontenttotop" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_7" text="hidecontenttobottom" value="hidecontenttobottom" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_8" text="hidecontenttoleft" value="hidecontenttoleft" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_9" text="hidecontenttoright" value="hidecontenttoright" />
