<t:comboboxitem id="g_10" text="shrinkcontenttocenter" value="shrinkcontenttocenter" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_11" text="hidetotop" value="hidetotop" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_12" text="hidetobottom" value="hidetobottom" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_13" text="hidetoleft" value="hidetoleft" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_14" text="hidetoright" value="hidetoright" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_15" text="shrinktocenter" value="shrinktocenter" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_16" text="foglight" value="foglight" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_17" text="fogdark" value="fogdark" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_18" text="fogred" value="fogred" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_19" text="shake" value="shake" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_20" text="noanimation" value="noanimation" />
</t:combobox>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_21" />
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:coldistance id="g_23" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_24" actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.onAnimate}" text="Animate!" width="100+" />
<t:coldistance id="g_25" width="5" />
<t:button id="g_26" actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.onAnimateDialog}" text="Open Dialog..." width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_27" height="30" />
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:coldistance id="g_29" width="100" />
<t:pane id="g_30" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000040,vertical)" padding="10" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_31" animatestepcount="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationStepCount}" animationtype="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationType}" trigger="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationTrigger}" />
<t:row id="g_32" >
<t:tabbedpane id="g_33" >
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_34" padding="10" rowdistance="4" text="tab" >
<t:row id="g_35" >
<t:label id="g_36" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_37" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_38" >
<t:label id="g_39" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_40" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_41" >
<t:coldistance id="g_42" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_43" text="Test" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_44" >
<t:label id="g_45" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_46" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_47" >
<t:label id="g_48" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_49" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_50" >
<t:coldistance id="g_51" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_52" text="Test" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_53" text="tab" />
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_54" rendered="false" >
<t:coldistance id="g_55" width="100" />
<t:pane id="g_56" bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#00000020,#00000040,vertical)" padding="10" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_57" animationtype="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationType}" trigger="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2.animationTrigger}" />
<t:row id="g_58" >
<t:tabbedpane id="g_59" >
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_60" padding="10" rowdistance="4" text="tab" >
<t:row id="g_61" >
<t:label id="g_62" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_63" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_64" >
<t:label id="g_65" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_66" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_67" >
<t:coldistance id="g_68" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_69" text="Test" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_70" >
<t:label id="g_71" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_72" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_73" >
<t:label id="g_74" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_75" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_76" >
<t:coldistance id="g_77" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_78" text="Test" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_79" text="tab" />
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModalPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.DefaultModalPopupListener;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator2}")

public class DemoCaptureAnimator2
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoCaptureAnimator2(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("captureanimator");
    }

    protected Trigger m_animationTrigger = new Trigger();
    protected String m_animationType = "hidecontenttotop";
    int m_animationStepCount = 8;
    
    public int getAnimationStepCount() { return m_animationStepCount; }
    public void setAnimationStepCount(int value) { this.m_animationStepCount = value; }
    
    public Trigger getAnimationTrigger() { return m_animationTrigger; }
    public void setAnimationTrigger(Trigger value) { m_animationTrigger = value; }

    public String getAnimationType() { return m_animationType; }
    public void setAnimationType(String value) { m_animationType = value; }

    public void onAnimate(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_animationTrigger.trigger();
    }
    
    public void onAnimateDialog(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        final IPageBean ui = new DemoHelloWorld(getOwningDispatcher());
        ModalPopup mp = openModalPopup(ui,"Demo Hello World!",750,400,new DefaultModalPopupListener(this,ui));
        mp.setAnimationtype(m_animationType);
    }

}

Animation used in mobile scenarios

Adding animation is simple:

1. select a PANE that should be animated
2. add a CAPTUREAINMATOR component into the PANE
3. assign a trigger and some animation type - that's it

Whenever the trigger is triggered the animation will be executed. In case of animations of type "hidecontent*", a snapshow of the current dialog is internally created and preserved. This snapshot is then overlayed on top of the updated dialog.

In the example the content of the PANE is changed by using different areas, one of them being rendered by using the RENDERED attribute. Of course you can build up different content areas in any other way, too. Example: you may switch between different content pages by using ROWPAGEBEANINCLUDE.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3}" >
<t:rowdistance id="g_2" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:coldistance id="g_4" width="100%" />
<t:pane id="g_5" height="100%" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:pane id="g_7" background="#606060" height="100%" padding="left:20;right:20;top:20;bottom:50" rounding="20" shadow="hoffset:4;voffset:4;blur:2;color:#00000050" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:pane id="g_9" background="#FFFFFF" height="100%;360" rounding="10" width="360" >
<t:rowtitlebar id="g_10" text="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.title}" />
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:pane id="g_12" height="100%" padding="20" width="100%" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_13" animationtype="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.animationType}" trigger="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.trigger}" />
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_15" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_16" rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.renderedArea0}" >
<t:textpane id="g_17" font="size:25" text="Adding animations to your dialogs is very simple! Use the navigation buttons on the bottom..." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.renderedArea1}" >
<t:image id="g_19" height="100%" image="/images/pictures/adressbuch.gif" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.renderedArea2}" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_21" height="100%" objectbinding="#{tobedfined}" sbvisibleamount="35" width="100%" >
<t:gridcol id="g_22" text="First column" width="100%" />
<t:gridcol id="g_23" text="Second column" width="100%" />
<t:gridcol id="g_24" text="Third column" width="100%" />
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_25" rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.renderedArea3}" >
<t:tabbedpane id="g_26" height="10%" width="100%" >
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_27" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" text="Left tab" >
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:label id="g_29" text="Label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_30" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_31" >
<t:label id="g_32" text="Label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_33" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_34" >
<t:label id="g_35" text="Label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_36" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_37" text="Right tab" />
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowheader id="g_38" >
<t:button id="g_39" actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.onPreviousAction}" text="Previous" width="100+" />
<t:coldistance id="g_40" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_41" actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3.onNextAction}" text="Next" width="100+" />
</t:rowheader>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
<t:coldistance id="g_42" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_43" height="50" />
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3}")

public class DemoCaptureAnimator3
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    int m_areaCounter = 0;
    
    public void onNextAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_areaCounter++;
        if (m_areaCounter > 3) m_areaCounter = 0;
        m_animationType = "hidecontenttoleft";
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    public void onPreviousAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_areaCounter--;
        if (m_areaCounter < 0) m_areaCounter = 3;
        m_animationType = "hidecontenttoright";
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    String m_animationType;
    public String getAnimationType() { return m_animationType; }
    public void setAnimationType(String value) { this.m_animationType = value; }

    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }

    public boolean getRenderedArea3() { return m_areaCounter == 3; }

    public boolean getRenderedArea2() { return m_areaCounter == 2; }

    public boolean getRenderedArea1() { return m_areaCounter == 1; }

    public boolean getRenderedArea0() { return m_areaCounter == 0; }

    String m_title;
    public String getTitle() { return m_title; }
    public void setTitle(String value) { this.m_title = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private IListener m_listener;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoCaptureAnimator3(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/democaptureanimator3.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator3}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Initialization of the bean. Add any parameter that is required within your scenario. */
    public void prepare(IListener listener)
    {
        m_listener = listener;
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Image Capturer & Animator (2)

The CAPTUREANIMATOR component creates an internal screenshot of the component, in which it is placed. This screenshot then is passed to an animation that e.g. hides the screenshot into a certain direction. All this happens if a trigger from the server side is activated.

In the example there is an optical switch between a grid and a detail view. The CAPTURECOMPONENT is triggered every time the switch is done. Dependent on the switch the direction of hiding the captured image is either "to the left" or "to the right".

You see, the CAPTUREANIMATOR component is a very flexibly usable one: you can use it for "softening" any kind of "hard" changes within your screens - with very little programming effort.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator}">
                <t:row id="g_2">
<t:pane id="g_3" height="250" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}"
    width="300">
    <t:captureanimator id="g_4"
        animationtype="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.animationType}"
        trigger="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.trigger}" />
    <t:row id="g_5" rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.gridVisible}">
        <t:fixgrid id="g_6" background="#f4f4f4" border="#00000020"
            bordercolor="#00000020" borderheight="1" borderwidth="1"
            height="100%" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.rows}"
            sbvisibleamount="20" singleclickexecute="true"
            suppressheadline="true" width="100%">
            <t:gridcol id="g_7" text="First Name" width="50%">
                <t:label id="g_8"
                    bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,50%,#FFFFFF10);rectangle(0,50%,100%,50%,#00000010)"
                    text=".{firstName}" />
            </t:gridcol>
            <t:gridcol id="g_9" text="Last Name" width="50%">
                <t:label id="g_10"
                    bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,50%,#FFFFFF10);rectangle(0,50%,100%,50%,#00000010)"
                    text=".{lastName}" />
            </t:gridcol>
        </t:fixgrid>
    </t:row>
    <t:row id="g_11"
        rendered="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.detailVisible}">
        <t:pane id="g_12"
            bgpaint="rectangle(0,0,100%,100%,#FFFFFF10,#00000010,vertical)"
            height="100%" padding="10" rowdistance="3" width="100%">
            <t:row id="g_13">
                <t:coldistance id="g_14" width="100%" />
                <t:image id="g_15" height="80"
                    image="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.selRow.image}"
                    keepratio="false" width="80" />
            </t:row>
            <t:row id="g_16">
                <t:label id="g_17" text="First Name" width="80" />
                <t:field id="g_18"
                    text="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.selRow.firstName}" width="100%" />
            </t:row>
            <t:row id="g_19">
                <t:label id="g_20" text="Last Name" width="80" />
                <t:field id="g_21"
                    text="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.selRow.lastName}" width="100%" />
            </t:row>
            <t:rowdistance id="g_22" height="100%" />
            <t:row id="g_23">
                <t:button id="g_24"
                    actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.onBack}" text="List"
                    width="50" />
                <t:coldistance id="g_25" width="100%" />
                <t:button id="g_26"
                    actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.onLeft}" text="&lt;"
                    width="30" />
                <t:button id="g_27"
                    actionListener="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator.onRight}" text="&gt;"
                    width="30" />
            </t:row>
        </t:pane>
    </t:row>
</t:pane>
                </t:row>
            </t:rowdemobodypane>
            <t:pageaddons id="g_pa" />
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCaptureAnimator}")

public class DemoCaptureAnimator
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public class MyRow extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        protected String m_lastName;
        public String getLastName() { return m_lastName; }
        public void setLastName(String value) { m_lastName = value; }

        protected String m_firstName;
        public String getFirstName() { return m_firstName; }
        public void setFirstName(String value) { m_firstName = value; }
        
        protected String m_image;
        public String getImage() { return m_image; }
        
        @Override
        public void onRowExecute()
        {
            select(this);
        }

    }

    protected String m_animationType;
    protected FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> m_rows = new FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow>();
    protected boolean m_gridVisible = true;
    protected Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    MyRow m_selRow = null;
    
    public DemoCaptureAnimator(IWorkpageDispatcher owner)
    {
        super(owner);
        initRefComponent("captureanimator");
        for (int i=0; i<25; i++)
        {
            MyRow mr = new MyRow();
            mr.setFirstName("First " + i);
            mr.setLastName("Last " + i);
            mr.m_image = "/images/pictures/photo"+(i%10)+".gif";
            m_rows.getItems().add(mr);
        }
    }

    public FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> getRows() { return m_rows; }
    public boolean getGridVisible() { return m_gridVisible; }
    public boolean getDetailVisible() { return !m_gridVisible; }
    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }
    public String getAnimationType() { return m_animationType; }
    public MyRow getSelRow() { return m_selRow; }
    
    public void onBack(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_animationType = "hidecontenttoright";
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_gridVisible = true;
    }
    
    public void onLeft(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        int currentIndex = m_rows.getItems().indexOf(m_selRow);
        if (currentIndex == 0)
            return;
        select(m_rows.getItems().get(currentIndex-1),"hidecontenttoright");
    }
    
    public void onRight(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        int currentIndex = m_rows.getItems().indexOf(m_selRow);
        if (currentIndex == (m_rows.getItems().size()-1))
            return;
        select(m_rows.getItems().get(currentIndex+1),"hidecontenttoleft");
    }
    
    private void select(MyRow r)
    {
        select(r,"hidecontenttoleft");
    }
    
    private void select(MyRow r, String animationType)
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_gridVisible = false;
        m_animationType = animationType;
        m_selRow = r;
    }

}

"Shake" animation, popup animation

By using animation type "shake" within the component CAPTUREANIMATUR the content of the corresponding PANE can be animated by using some vibration effect.

You may either directly use "shake" - or you may add two configuration paramters:

1. Iterations of vibrations
2. pixel delta of vibration

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" stylevariant="ccbig" text="New animation type &#34;shake&#34;" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" coldistance="5" >
<t:button id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation.onShakeAction}" text="&#34;Shake!&#34;" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:pane id="g_7" width="100%" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_8" animationtype="shake" trigger="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation.animationTrigger}" />
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_10" text="Some content - default shaking: shake" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_12" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_13" labeltext="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:pane id="g_23" width="100%" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_24" animationtype="shake(200,3)" trigger="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation.animationTrigger}" />
<t:row id="g_25" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_26" text="Some content - tough shaking: shake(200,3)" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_27" >
<t:label id="g_28" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_29" labeltext="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_14" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:label id="g_16" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Open Popup with animation" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" coldistance="5" >
<t:button id="g_18" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation.onOpenPopupAnimated}" text="Open popup, &#34;shake&#34;" width="100+" />
<t:button id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation.onOpenPopupAnimatedPopup2}" text="Open popup, &#34;shrinktocenter&#34;" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" />
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModalPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.OKPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.DefaultModalPopupListener;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPopupAnimation}")

public class DemoPopupAnimation
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    Trigger m_animationTrigger = new Trigger();
    
    public DemoPopupAnimation(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopopupanimation.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPopupAnimation}"; }

    public Trigger getAnimationTrigger() { return m_animationTrigger; }
    
    public void onOpenPopupAnimated(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        OKPopup okp = OKPopup.createInstance("Test dialog","Test dialog.");
        okp.getModalPopup().setAnimationtype("shake");
    }

    public void onOpenPopupAnimatedPopup2(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        final IPageBean ui = new DemoHelloWorld(getOwningDispatcher());
        ModalPopup mp = openModalPopup(ui,"Demo Hello World!",750,400,new DefaultModalPopupListener(this,ui));
        mp.setAnimationtype("shrinktocenter");
    }

    public void onShakeAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_animationTrigger.trigger();
    }



}

Paint Area

Simple Usage

This is a very basic and static demo of the PAINTAREA component.

The PAINTAREA is a container holding PAINTAREAITEM components. Each component receives an explicit x;y;width;height(;z)-position by using the BOUNDS attribute. The PAINTAREAITEM may contain any "normal" component within its content area.

In addition there is the component PAINTAREALINEITEM, which is used for drawing lines.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSimple}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_3" background="#ffffff" border="#c0c0c0" height="100%" padding="10" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" background="#FFFFFF" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_6" bgpaint="bgbackground(#c0c0ff,#f0f0ff,vertical)" bounds="50;50;90;60" tooltip="Person A" >
<t:label id="g_7" align="center" text="Person A" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_8" bgpaint="bgbackground(#c0ffc0,#f0fff0,vertical)" bounds="250;150;90;60" tooltip="Person C" >
<t:label id="g_9" align="center" text="Person C" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_10" bgpaint="bgbackground(#ffb0b0,#ffe0e0,vertical)" bounds="250;50;90;60" tooltip="Person B" >
<t:label id="g_11" align="center" text="Person B" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_12" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="2" bounds="140;80;110;100" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_13" border="#a0a0a0" bounds="50;250;290;110" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_14" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" text="Some complex content" >
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:label id="g_16" text="First Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_17" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:label id="g_19" text="Last Name" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_20" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_21" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="6" bounds="95;110;0;140" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSimple}")

public class DemoPaintAreaSimple
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{

    public DemoPaintAreaSimple(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("paintarea");
    }
    
}

Line drawing
Lines

Lines can be easily drawn within a paint area. Pay attention: the bounds specifying the coordinates are defining a rectangle, i.e. you need to define in the way: x,y,width,height and not: x1,y1,x2,y2,

For each line you may define a text and an arrow for the starting and ending point.

Operations like selection (attribute INVOKEEVENT) and/or right mouse button menu (attribute POPUPMENU) are available as well. Events are delegated - just with every component - to the corresponding actionListener of the line.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_3" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" background="#FFFFFF" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="20;20;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="1" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_7" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="150;20;120;0" invokeevent="click" linedash="1;1" text="2" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_8" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="8" arrowto="8" bounds="20;35;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="8" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="8" arrowto="8" bounds="150;35;120;0" invokeevent="click" linedash="2;2" text="8" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_10" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="2" arrowto="2" bounds="20;50;120;0" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#000080" text="2" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_11" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="2" arrowto="2" bounds="150;50;120;0" foreground="#000080" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#ff0000" linedash="5;2" text="2" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_12" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="9" arrowto="9" bounds="20;65;120;0" foreground="#000080" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#ff0000" text="9" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_13" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="9" arrowto="9" bounds="150;65;120;0" foreground="#ff0000" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#000080" linedash="10;3" text="9" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="3" arrowto="3" bounds="20;80;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="3" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_15" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="4" bounds="20;110;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="4" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="5" arrowto="5" bounds="20;140;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="5" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_17" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="10" arrowto="10" bounds="20;155;120;0" invokeevent="click" text="10" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_18" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="6" arrowto="6" bounds="20;170;120;0" invokeevent="click" linesize="1" text="6" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="11" arrowto="11" bounds="20;185;120;0" invokeevent="click" linesize="1" text="11" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_20" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="7" arrowto="7" bounds="20;200;120;0" text="7" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_21" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="12" arrowto="12" bounds="20;215;120;0" text="12" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_22" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="13" arrowto="13" bounds="150;200;120;0" text="13" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_23" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="14" arrowto="14" bounds="150;215;120;0" text="14" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_24" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="1" bounds="20;230;120;80" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#808080" linesize="1" text="Some text 1" tooltip="Some tooltip" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_25" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="1" bounds="200;250;-100;-10" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#808080" linesize="1" text="Some text 2" tooltip="Some tooltip" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_26" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="1" bounds="300;230;-100;80" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#808080" text="Some text 3" tooltip="Some tooltip" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_27" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="4" arrowto="1" bounds="350;230;10;100" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#808080" text="Some text 4" tooltip="Some tooltip" popupmenu="LINES" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_28" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="70;400;50;-50" text="Size 1" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_29" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="70;400;-50;50" linesize="2" text="Size 2" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_30" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="70;400;-50;-50" linesize="1" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_31" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines.onLineAction}" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="70;400;50;50" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:popupmenu id="LINES" >
<t:menuitem id="g_32" command="opt1" text="Option 1" />
<t:menuitem id="g_33" command="opt2" text="Option 2" />
</t:popupmenu>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Date;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventInvoke;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLines}")

public class DemoPaintAreaLines
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoPaintAreaLines(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("paintarealineitem");
    }
    
    public void onLineAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventInvoke)
        {
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Line was clicked! Timestamp: " + (new Date()).getTime());
        }
        else if (event instanceof BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)
        {
            BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem baepmi = (BaseActionEventPopupMenuItem)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Popup menu was executed! Command = " + baepmi.getCommand());
        }
        else
        {
            Statusbar.outputError("Hmmm: " + event.getClass());
        }
    }
}

Line arrows

You may define arrows at three different positions of a line:

1. start ("from arrow")
2. end ("to arrow")
3. centered ("central")

There are a couple of pre-defined arrow types - each one represented by a number.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintareaLineTypes}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintareaLineTypes}" rowdistance="20" >
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:coldistance id="g_5" width="20" />
<t:label id="g_13" align="center" text="From arrow" width="100" />
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="50" />
<t:label id="g_18" align="center" text="To arrow" width="100" />
<t:coldistance id="g_20" width="50" />
<t:label id="g_21" align="center" text="Central arrow" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_15" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:paintarea id="g_7" border="#00000010" height="1200" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_9" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintareaLineTypes.dynContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREALINEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintareaLineTypes}")

public class DemoPaintareaLineTypes
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintareaLineTypes(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        render();
    }
    
    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintarealinetypes.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintareaLineTypes}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContent() { return m_dynContent; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void render()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<26; i++)
        {
            int y = i * 40 + 20;
            {
                PAINTAREALINEITEMNode ln = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                    .setBounds("20;"+y+";100;0")
                    .setArrowfrom(i)
                    .setText(i+"");
                l.add(ln);
            }
            {
                PAINTAREALINEITEMNode ln = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                    .setBounds("170;"+y+";100;0")
                    .setArrowto(i)
                    .setText(i+"");
                l.add(ln);
            }
            {
                PAINTAREALINEITEMNode ln = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                    .setBounds("320;"+y+";100;0")
                    .setArrowcentral(i)
                    .setText(i+"");
                l.add(ln);
            }
        }
        m_dynContent.setContentNodes(l);
    }
}

Line with interim points

You may define "interim points" for a line. In this case the line has some "general start and end points" which is defined via the BOUNDS attribute. And it may have any number of interim points in between that are defined via the attribute INTERIMPOINTS.

The coordinates of the INTERIMPOINTS-value are pixel values, relative to the starting point of the line.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoLineInterimPoints}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_3" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" height="100%;400" width="100%;400" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_6" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="6" bounds="100;100;200;200" interimpoints="50;0;50;200" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_7" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="100;100;0;100" interimpoints="-20;20;20;40;-20;60;20;80" invokeevent="click" linecolor="#800000" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoLineInterimPoints}")

public class DemoLineInterimPoints
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoLineInterimPoints(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demolineinterimpoints.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoLineInterimPoints}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Editing of interim points

The PAINTARAEALINEITEM allows the user to edit its interim points.

To do so you need to:

1. switch the attribute WITHEDITINGOFINTERIMPOINTS to "true"
2. provide a property to be the counterpart of the INTERIMPOINTS attribute

The interim points are now both taken and written back into the property. By setting FLUSH to "true" the value is immediately transferred to the server side.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:coldistance id="g_3" width="100" />
<t:label id="g_4" text="Pick an interim points of the line and move it to a new position:" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:coldistance id="g_6" width="100" />
<t:paintarea id="g_7" background="#FFFFFF" border="#00000030" editgridsnapto="true" height="320" width="320" editgrid="10" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_8" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="60;60;200;200" flush="true" interimpoints="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.interimPoints}" linestyle="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.lineStyle}" witheditingofinterimpoints="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.boolEditInterimPoints}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:coldistance id="g_10" width="100" />
<t:checkbox id="g_11" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.boolEditInterimPoints}" text="Edit interim points" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:label id="g_13" text="Line style" width="100" />
<t:combobox id="g_14" flush="true" value="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.lineStyle}" width="200" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_15" text="default" value="default" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_16" text="edged" value="edged" />
</t:combobox>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" text="Interim Points" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_19" enabled="false" text="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.interimPoints}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}")

public class DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_lineStyle = "default";
    public String getLineStyle() { return m_lineStyle; }
    public void setLineStyle(String value) { this.m_lineStyle = value; }

    String m_interimPoints = "200;0";
    boolean m_boolEditInterimPoints = true;

    public DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demolineinterimpointswithediting.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}"; }

    public boolean getBoolEditInterimPoints() { return m_boolEditInterimPoints; }
    public void setBoolEditInterimPoints(boolean value) { this.m_boolEditInterimPoints = value; }

    public String getInterimPoints() { return m_interimPoints; }
    public void setInterimPoints(String value) { this.m_interimPoints = value; }
    
}

Position of starting/ending points

For certain arrow types there are two variants that handle the starting/ending point in a different way.

All the lines you see have a length of 100 pixels.

Some of the starting/ending points are shifted "into" the line, so that the resulting line actually keeps the length.

Some of the starting/ending points are positioned with their center on top of the starting/ending point so that as result the line i a bit longer.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineEndings}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineEndings}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:paintarea id="g_2" height="100" width="100%" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_3" arrowfrom="5" arrowto="5" bounds="20;20;100;0" text="5" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_8" arrowfrom="15" arrowto="15" bounds="20;50;100;0" text="15" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_20" arrowfrom="10" arrowto="10" bounds="220;20;100;0" text="10" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_21" arrowfrom="18" arrowto="18" bounds="220;50;100;0" text="18" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:paintarea id="g_11" height="100" width="100%" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_12" arrowfrom="6" arrowto="6" bounds="20;20;100;0" text="6" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_13" arrowfrom="16" arrowto="16" bounds="20;50;100;0" text="16" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_23" arrowfrom="11" arrowto="11" bounds="220;20;100;0" text="11" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_24" arrowfrom="19" arrowto="19" bounds="220;50;100;0" text="19" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:paintarea id="g_16" height="100" width="100%" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_17" arrowfrom="7" arrowto="7" bounds="20;20;100;0" text="7" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_18" arrowfrom="17" arrowto="17" bounds="20;50;100;0" text="17" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_26" arrowfrom="12" arrowto="12" bounds="220;20;100;0" text="12" />
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_27" arrowfrom="20" arrowto="20" bounds="220;50;100;0" text="20" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineEndings}")

public class DemoPaintAreaLineEndings
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoPaintAreaLineEndings(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintarealineendings.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineEndings}"; }
}

Magnify Factor

The PAINTAREACOMPONENT provides an attribute MAGNIFYFACTOR.

When the user moves the mouse over a PAINTAREAITEM then this item is magnified - by the factor defined via MAGNIFYFACTOR. The value of MAGNIFYFACTOR is an integer percentage number (e.g. 25 for "25%").

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:paintarea id="g_3" height="100%" magnifyfactor="25" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_4" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage0}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph0.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;20;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage1}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph1.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;80;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage2}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph2.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;140;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_7" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage3}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph3.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;200;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_8" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage4}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph4.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;260;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage4}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph4.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="100;20;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_10" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage1}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph1.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="180;20;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_11" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage2}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph2.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="260;20;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_12" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage3}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph3.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="340;20;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_13" background="#c0c0c0" bounds="110;90;310;220" >
<t:pane id="g_14" >
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:image id="g_16" height="100%" image="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.image}" keepratio="false" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" align="right" text="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.image}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage0}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph0.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="20;320;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_20" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage4}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph4.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="100;320;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_21" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage1}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph1.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="180;320;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_22" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage2}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph2.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="260;320;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
<t:paintareaitem id="g_23" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify.onImage3}" bgpaint="image(0,0,100%,100%,/images/pictures/ph3.jpg,lefttop)" bounds="340;320;80;60" invokeevent="click" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaMagnify}")

public class DemoPaintAreaMagnify
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoPaintAreaMagnify(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("paintarea");
    }

    public void onImage3(ActionEvent event) { m_image = "/images/pictures/ph3.jpg"; }

    public void onImage4(ActionEvent event) { m_image = "/images/pictures/ph4.jpg"; }

    public void onImage2(ActionEvent event) { m_image = "/images/pictures/ph2.jpg"; }

    public void onImage1(ActionEvent event) { m_image = "/images/pictures/ph1.jpg"; }

    public void onImage0(ActionEvent event) { m_image = "/images/pictures/ph0.jpg"; }

    protected String m_image;
    public String getImage() { return m_image; }
    public void setImage(String value) { m_image = value; }

}

Shape Charts

Drag and drop items from the left to the right. You may draw arrows between the items by picking the small rectangle on the right of an item and dropping it onto another item.

This demo shows how to use PAINTAREA and PAINTAREAITEM in combination with dynamic content and drag/drop management.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_3" objectbinding="#{d.DemoShape2}" >
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:pane id="g_13" border="#00000030" height="100%" padding="1" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@headerBackground@&#39;]}" height="100%" width="140" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_6" contentbinding="#{d.DemoShape2.leftContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
<t:colline id="g_7" background="#808080" height="100%" rendered="false" width="1" />
<t:pane id="g_29" height="100%" padding="0" rowdistance="0" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_8" height="100%" scrollbydragdrop="#{d.DemoShape2.scrollByDragDrop}" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:scalepane id="g_20" flush="true" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoShape2.scale}" width="100%" withuserscaling="#{d.DemoShape2.withUserScaling}" >
<t:paintarea id="RIGHTPAINTAREA" actionListener="#{d.DemoShape2.onRightPaintAreaAction}" dropreceive="LEFTSHAPE;RIGHTSHAPE" editgrid="10" editgridsnapto="true" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_10" contentbinding="#{d.DemoShape2.rightContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:scalepane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowfooter id="g_32" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:coldistance id="g_33" width="100%" />
<t:slider id="g_34" flush="true" majortickspacing="25" maxvalue="200" minortickspacing="5" minvalue="50" value="#{d.DemoShape2.scale100}" width="250" />
<t:checkbox id="g_35" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoShape2.withUserScaling}" text="With user scaling" tooltip="Allows to scale by shift-mousewheel (desktop) or by two-finger-gesture (mobile)" />
<t:checkbox id="g_36" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoShape2.scrollByDragDrop}" text="Scroll by drag drop" tooltip="Allows to move the scroll area by drag/drop - also in desktop mode." />
</t:rowfooter>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModelessPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.LABELNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREALINEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PANENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.ROWNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventDrop;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventFlush;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventInvoke;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoShape2}")

public class DemoShape2
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    int m_scale100 = 100;
    public int getScale100() { return m_scale100; }
    public void setScale100(int value) { this.m_scale100 = value; }

    boolean m_withUserScaling;
    public boolean getWithUserScaling() { return m_withUserScaling; }
    public void setWithUserScaling(boolean value) { this.m_withUserScaling = value; }

    public float getScale() { return (float)m_scale100 / 100f; }
    public void setScale(float value) 
    { 
        m_scale100 = (int)Math.round(value * 100d);
        m_scale100 = m_scale100 - m_scale100 % 5;
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class RightShape
    {
        int i_x;
        int i_y;
        int i_width = BOXWIDTH;
        int i_height = BOXHEIGHT;
        int i_type;
        String i_text = "<undefined>";
        public RightShape(int x, int y, int type)
        {
            i_x = x;
            i_y = y;
            i_type = type;
        }
        public int getX() { return i_x; }
        public void setX(int x) { i_x = x; }
        public int getY() { return i_y; }
        public void setY(int y) { i_y = y; }
        public String getBounds() { return i_x + ";" + i_y + ";" + i_width + ";" + i_height; }
        public void setBounds(String s)
        {
            int[] coords = ValueManager.decodeStraightIntCSV(s);
            i_x = coords[0];
            i_y = coords[1];
            i_width = coords[2];
            i_height = coords[3];
        }
        public String getBoundsLinkAnchor()
        {
            return (i_x+i_width) + ";" + (i_y + i_height/2 - 4) + ";8;8";
        }
        public String getText() { return i_text; }
        public void setText(String text) { i_text = text; }
        public void onAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            if (event instanceof BaseActionEventFlush)
            {
                // update lines
                renderRightContent();
            }
            else if (event instanceof BaseActionEventDrop)
            {
                BaseActionEventDrop e = (BaseActionEventDrop)event;
                String dis = e.getDragInfo(); 
                if (dis.startsWith("RIGHTSHAPECONNECT:"))
                {
                    int index = ValueManager.decodeInt(dis.substring(18),0);
                    RightShape fromRS = m_rightShapes.get(index);
                    RightShape toRS = this;
                    addLine(fromRS,toRS);
                }
            }
        }
        public void onLabelAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            final DemoShape2Popup b = new DemoShape2Popup();
            b.prepare(i_text,new DemoShape2Popup.IListener()
            {
                public void reactOnOK()
                {
                    closePopup(b);
                    i_text = b.getText();
                }
            });
            ModelessPopup p = openModelessPopup(b,"",0,0,new ModelessPopup.IModelessPopupListener()
            {
                public void reactOnPopupClosedByUser()
                {
                    closePopup(b);
                }
            });
            p.setUndecorated(true);
            p.setCloseonclickoutside(true);
        }
    }
    
    public class RightShapeLine
    {
        public RightShapeLine(RightShape from, RightShape to)
        {
            i_from = from;
            i_to = to;
        }
        RightShape i_from;
        RightShape i_to;
        public void onAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            if (event instanceof BaseActionEventInvoke)
            {
                BaseActionEventInvoke e = (BaseActionEventInvoke)event;
                final DemoShape2PopupLine b = new DemoShape2PopupLine();
                b.prepare(new DemoShape2PopupLine.IListener()
                {
                    public void reactOnRemove()
                    {
                        removeLine();
                        closePopup(b);
                        renderRightContent();
                    }
                });
                ModelessPopup p = openModelessPopup(b,"",0,0,new ModelessPopup.IModelessPopupListener()
                {
                    public void reactOnPopupClosedByUser()
                    {
                        closePopup(b);
                    }
                });
                p.setUndecorated(true);
                p.setCloseonclickoutside(true);
                // p.setLefTopReferenceComponentId("RIGHTPAINTAREA");
                p.setTop(e.getY());
                p.setLeft(e.getX());
            }
        }
        public void removeLine()
        {
            m_rightShapeLines.remove(this);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    static String[] COLORS = new String[] {"#FFFFFF","#FFC0C0","#FFFFC0","#C0C0FF"};
    static int BOXWIDTH = 130;
    static int BOXHEIGHT = 50;
    
    boolean m_scrollByDragDrop = false;
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_leftContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_rightContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    List<RightShape> m_rightShapes = new ArrayList<RightShape>();
    List<RightShapeLine> m_rightShapeLines = new ArrayList<RightShapeLine>();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoShape2(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        renderLeftContent();
        renderRightContent();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoshape2.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoShape2}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getLeftContent() { return m_leftContent; }
    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getRightContent() { return m_rightContent; }
    public List<RightShape> getRightShapes() { return m_rightShapes; }
    public List<RightShapeLine> getRightShapeLines() { return m_rightShapeLines; }

    public void onRightPaintAreaAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventDrop)
        {
            BaseActionEventDrop e = (BaseActionEventDrop)event;
            String dis = e.getDragInfo(); 
            if (dis.startsWith("LEFTSHAPE:"))
            {
                int type = ValueManager.decodeInt(dis.substring(10),0);
                int left = e.getPixelX() + e.getDeltaX();
                int top = e.getPixelY() + e.getDeltaY();
                RightShape rs = new RightShape(left,top,type);
                m_rightShapes.add(rs);
                renderRightContent();
            }
            if (dis.startsWith("RIGHTSHAPE:"))
            {
                int index = ValueManager.decodeInt(dis.substring(11),0);
                RightShape rs = m_rightShapes.get(index);
                rs.setX(e.getPixelX());
                rs.setY(e.getPixelY());
                renderRightContent();
            }
        }
    }

    public boolean getScrollByDragDrop() { return m_scrollByDragDrop; }
    public void setScrollByDragDrop(boolean value) { this.m_scrollByDragDrop = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void renderLeftContent()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<COLORS.length; i++)
        {
            int y = 10 +(i * (BOXHEIGHT + 10));  
            PAINTAREAITEMNode n = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds("5;" + y + ";"+BOXWIDTH+";"+BOXHEIGHT)
                .setBackground(COLORS[i])
                .setBorder("#a0a0a0")
                .setDragsend("LEFTSHAPE:"+i);
            l.add(n);
        }
        m_leftContent.setContentNodes(l);
    }
    
    private void renderRightContent()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        renderRightContentShapes(l);
        renderRightContentLines(l);
        m_rightContent.setContentNodes(l);
    }
    
    private void renderRightContentShapes(List<ComponentNode> l)
    {
        int counter = 0;
        for (RightShape rs: m_rightShapes)
        {
            PAINTAREAITEMNode n = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds(pbx("rightShapes["+counter+"].bounds"))
                //.setDragsend("RIGHTSHAPE:"+counter)
                .setDropreceive("RIGHTSHAPECONNECT")
                .setMovingenabled(true)
                .setMovingwithcrosshair(true)
                .setResizingenabled(true)
                .setResizingwithcrosshair(true)
                .setFlush(true)
                .setActionListener(pbx("rightShapes["+counter+"].onAction"))
                .setFocusable(true);
            l.add(n);
            PANENode p = new PANENode();
            n.addSubNode(p);
            ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
            p.addSubNode(r);
            {
                LABELNode la = new LABELNode()
                    .setWidth("100%")
                    .setBackground(COLORS[rs.i_type])
                    .setHeight("100%")
                    .setBorder("#a0a0a0")
                    .setAlign("center")
                    .setText(pbx("rightShapes["+counter+"].text"))
                    // .setInvokeevent("leftclick")
                    .setActionListener(pbx("rightShapes["+counter+"].onLabelAction"));
                r.addSubNode(la);
            }
            PAINTAREAITEMNode n2 = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds(pbx("rightShapes["+counter+"].boundsLinkAnchor"))
                .setBackground("#FFFFFF")
                .setBorder("left:0;top:1;right:1;bottom:1;color:#00000020")
                .setDragsend("RIGHTSHAPECONNECT:"+counter);
            l.add(n2);
            counter++;
        }
    }
    
    private void renderRightContentLines(List<ComponentNode> l)
    {
        int counter = 0;
        for (RightShapeLine rsl: m_rightShapeLines)
        {
            int fromX = rsl.i_from.i_x + rsl.i_from.i_width + 5 + 4;
            int fromY = rsl.i_from.i_y + rsl.i_from.i_height / 2;
            int toX = rsl.i_to.i_x - 5;
            int toY = rsl.i_to.i_y + rsl.i_to.i_height / 2;
            int deltaX = toX - fromX;
            int deltaY = toY - fromY;
            PAINTAREALINEITEMNode n = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                .setBounds(fromX+";" +fromY+ ";"+deltaX+";"+deltaY)
                .setArrowto(1)
                .setInvokeevent("leftclick")
                .setActionListener(pbx("rightShapeLines["+counter+"].onAction"));
            l.add(n);
            counter++;
        }
    }
    
    private void addLine(RightShape from, RightShape to)
    {
        if (from == to) return;
        // check if already connected
        for (RightShapeLine rsl: m_rightShapeLines)
        {
            if (rsl.i_from == from && rsl.i_to == to)
                return;
        }
        // new connection
        m_rightShapeLines.add(new RightShapeLine(from,to));
        renderRightContent();
    }
}

Selection of items

The PAINTAREA supports the selection of contained PAINTAREAITEM instances.

You may either select by mouse-range selection or by clicking individual items. When clicking you may use the ctrl-Key in order to do multiple selections.

When selecting multiple items then all the items are moved when moving one item.

The selected-status is reflected into a corresponding attribute PAINTAREAITEM-SELECTED. The attribute must be bound to some server side expression, so that the actual selection can be passed into the server processing.

As with the position and size of a PAINTAREAITEM, the selection information is not immediately passed to the server side by default - but waits for the next synchronization to the server (e.g. due to the user pressing a button). You may set PAINTAREAITEM-FLUSH to true in order to immediately send selections to the server side.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:coldistance id="g_6" width="100%" />
<t:label id="g_7" text="Sacle (%)" />
<t:slider id="g_5" flush="true" flushtimer="300" majortickspacing="25" maxvalue="200" minortickspacing="5" minvalue="50" value="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection.scalePercent}" width="300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_11" border="#00000030" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:scalepane id="g_8" flush="true" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection.scale}" width="100%" withuserscaling="true" >
<t:paintarea id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection.onPaintAreaInvoke}" background="#FFFFFF" editgrid="10" editgridsnapto="true" height="100%" rangeselectionrequireskey="true" width="100%" withrangeselection="true" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_16" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection.content}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:scalepane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.LABELNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventRangeSelection;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection}")

public class DemoPaintAreaSelection
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class ItemInfo
    {
        String i_bounds;
        boolean i_selected;
        public String getBounds() { return i_bounds; }
        public void setBounds(String bounds) { i_bounds = bounds; }
        public boolean isSelected() { return i_selected; }
        public void setSelected(boolean selected) { i_selected = selected; }
        public String getText() { return i_bounds + "/" + i_selected; }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    float m_scale = 1f;
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_content = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    List<ItemInfo> m_itemInfos = new ArrayList<DemoPaintAreaSelection.ItemInfo>();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintAreaSelection(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);   
        createItems();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareaselection.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaSelection}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getContent() { return m_content; }
    public List<ItemInfo> getItemInfos() { return m_itemInfos; }
    
    public int getScalePercent() { return Math.round(m_scale*100f); }
    public void setScalePercent(int value) 
    { 
        m_scale = (float)value/100f; 
    }

    public float getScale() { return m_scale; }
    public void setScale(float value) { this.m_scale = value; }

    public void onPaintAreaInvoke(ActionEvent event)
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventRangeSelection)
        {
            BaseActionEventRangeSelection e = (BaseActionEventRangeSelection)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Range selection: " + 
                    e.getLeft() + ", " +
                    e.getTop() + ", " +
                    e.getWidth() + ", " +
                    e.getHeight());
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void createItems()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
        {
            for (int j=0; j<10; j++)
            {
                int iiIndex = m_itemInfos.size();
                ItemInfo ii = new ItemInfo();
                ii.setBounds((50+i*150)+";"+(50+j*50) +";130;40;10");
                m_itemInfos.add(ii);
                PAINTAREAITEMNode pain = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                    .setBounds(pbx("itemInfos["+iiIndex+"].bounds"))
                    .setSelected(pbx("itemInfos["+iiIndex+"].selected"))
                    .setBackground("#e0e0e0")
                    .setMovingenabled("true")
                    .setResizingenabled("true")
                    .setFlush(true)
                    .setBorder("#00000030")
                    .setSelectionenabled(true);
                l.add(pain);
                LABELNode la = new LABELNode()
                    .setText(pbx("itemInfos["+iiIndex+"].text"))
                    .setAlign("center");
                pain.addSubNode(la);
            }
        }
        m_content.setContentNodes(l);
    }
}

Layered Selection

If selecting items of a PAINTAREA then by default the selection follows the z-hierarchy of the items. The z-hiearchy is either explicitly defined (the BOUNDS definition may have 5 parameters: "x;y;width;height;z") or it is implicitly defined by the drawing sequence.

This means: when one item covers another item, then the covered item cannot be reach by mouse clicks.

By setting attribute PAINTAREA-WITHLAYEREDSELECTION to "true" you can overcome this: you can continue to click onto a certain point and all the items that are on top of this point are selected one after the next.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:textpane id="g_2" text="Click into the items in order to select one. Observe how the  selection is done when clicking multiple times." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_3" height="10" />
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:checkbox id="g_16" flush="true" labeltext="Layered selection" selected="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection.withLayeredSelection}" text="active" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_17" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" height="100%" width="100%" withlayeredselection="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection.withLayeredSelection}" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_6" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection.dynContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection}")

public class DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    boolean m_withLayeredSelection = true;
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);      
        render();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintarealayeredselection.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaLayeredSelection}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public boolean getWithLayeredSelection() { return m_withLayeredSelection; }
    public void setWithLayeredSelection(boolean value) { this.m_withLayeredSelection = value; }

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContent() { return m_dynContent; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void render()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
        {
            PAINTAREAITEMNode pin = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds((20+i*20)+";"+(20+i*20)+";200;200")
                .setBackground("#00000010")
                .setBorder("#C0C0C0")
                .setSelectionenabled(true)
                .setMovingenabled(true);
            l.add(pin);
        }
        m_dynContent.setContentNodes(l);
    }
}

WYSIWYG Editing

The PAINTAREA and PAINTAREAITEM components are prepared to serve as base for wysiwyg editor processing (what you see is what you get).

PAINTAREAITEM components can be defined to be move-able (MOVINGENABLED) and size-able (RESIZINGENABLED). In this case small areas are painted on top of the component - when dragging these areas the corresponding component is moved or resized.

When updating a component's position and/or size then the BOUNDS are updated accordingly. You may set FLUSH to true in order to immediately transfer these changed to the server.

...what else?

PAINTAREAITEM components may hold (exactly!) one subcomponent which is rendered to fit inside the component.

PAINTAREAITEM provides an attribute EDITGRID. When setting to a certain integer value then moving and sizing a PAINTAREAITEM will snap to the value defined. In addition a grid will be painted as background.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoWysiwyg}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Scale" width="100" />
