<t:slider id="g_4" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onScaleIntAction}" flush="true" majortickspacing="25" maxvalue="200" minortickspacing="10" minvalue="50" snaptoticks="true" value="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.scaleInt}" width="200" />
<t:coldistance id="g_5" width="20" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onScaleAction}" align="right" enabled="false" flush="true" format="double" formatmask="dec2" value="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.scale}" width="50" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:scalepane id="g_8" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.scale}" width="100%" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_9" border="#00000030" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:paintarea id="g_11" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onPaintAreaAction}" editgrid="5" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.scale}" width="100%" withrangeselection="true" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_12" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onBoundsAction}" bounds="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.boundsLabel}" flush="true" movingenabled="true" resizingenabled="true" >
<t:label id="g_13" text="Label" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_14" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onBoundsAction}" bounds="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.boundsField}" flush="true" movingenabled="true" resizingdirection="horizontal" resizingenabled="true" >
<t:field id="g_15" text="Field" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.onBoundsAction}" bounds="#{d.DemoWysiwyg.boundsButton}" flush="true" movingenabled="true" resizingenabled="true" >
<t:button id="g_17" text="Button" />
</t:paintareaitem>
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:scalepane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventRangeSelection;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoWysiwyg}")

public class DemoWysiwyg
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    int m_scaleInt = 100;
    public int getScaleInt() { return m_scaleInt; }
    public void setScaleInt(int value) { this.m_scaleInt = value; }

    double m_scale = 1d;
    
    String m_boundsLabel = "20;20;100;25";
    String m_boundsField = "120;20;100;25";
    String m_boundsButton = "260;20;80;25";
    
    public DemoWysiwyg(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getBoundsField() { return m_boundsField; }
    public void setBoundsField(String bounds) { m_boundsField = bounds; }

    public String getBoundsLabel() { return m_boundsLabel; }
    public void setBoundsLabel(String boundsLabel) { m_boundsLabel = boundsLabel; }

    public String getBoundsButton() { return m_boundsButton; }
    public void setBoundsButton(String boundsButton) { m_boundsButton = boundsButton; }

    public double getScale() { return m_scale; }
    public void setScale(double scale) { m_scale = scale; }

    public void onScaleIntAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_scale = (double)m_scaleInt / 100d;
    }

    public void onScaleAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_scaleInt = (int)Math.round(m_scale * 100d);
    }

    public void onBoundsAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputSuccess("Bounds Update: " + m_boundsField);
    }

    public void onPaintAreaAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventRangeSelection)
        {
            BaseActionEventRangeSelection e = (BaseActionEventRangeSelection)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccessWithPopup(e.getLeft() + "/" + e.getTop() + "/" + e.getWidth() + "/" + e.getHeight());
        }
    }

}

Rotating / Skewing items

The attribute TRANSFORM is available for PAINTAREAITEM components, too - and allows to rotate / skew them in a nice way!

As consequence you can e.g. rotate or skew items - with all their content.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaTransform}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaTransform}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_2" border="#00000010" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:paintarea id="g_8" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_5" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="50;50;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="rotate(-10deg)" >
<t:label id="g_10" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="rotate(-10deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_12" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="200;50;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="rotate(-20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_13" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="rotate(-20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_15" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="350;50;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="rotate(20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_16" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="rotate(20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_18" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="50;200;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewX(-10deg)" >
<t:label id="g_19" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewX(-10deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_20" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="200;200;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewX(-20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_21" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewX(-20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_22" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="350;200;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewX(20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_23" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewX(20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_25" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="50;350;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewY(-10deg)" >
<t:label id="g_26" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewY(-10deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_27" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="200;350;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewY(-20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_28" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewY(-20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_29" background="#C0C0C0" border="#00000030" bounds="350;350;140;80" shadow="hoffset:6;voffset:6;blur:3;color:#DFDFF0" transform="skewY(20deg)" >
<t:label id="g_30" align="center" height="100%" stylevariant="ccbig" text="skewY(20deg)" width="100%" />
</t:paintareaitem>
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaTransform}")

public class DemoPaintAreaTransform
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoPaintAreaTransform(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareatransform.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaTransform}"; }
}

Slide Show

This demo shows how to use the PAINTAREA component in order to create an animated change of the position of a contained PAINTAREA item.

If changing the position of a PAINTAREA item, then the change is not directly populated to the component - but waits for an explicit TRIGGER event. After firing the trigger, the component is softly animated from its former position to its next position.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" >
<t:timer id="g_2" actionListener="#{d.DemoIntro.onNext}" duration="3000" />
</t:beanprocessing>
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_3" objectbinding="#{d.DemoIntro}">
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:pane id="g_5" background="#FFFFFFA0" padding="5" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" font="weight:bold;size:20" text="Some slides..." />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_8" height="3" />
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_9" height="60%" />
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:coldistance id="g_11" width="60%" />
<t:pane id="g_12" >
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:paintarea id="g_14" bgpaint="#{d.DemoIntro.bgpaintArea}" height="475" trigger="#{d.DemoIntro.trigger}" width="650" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_15" contentbinding="#{d.DemoIntro.content}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_16" height="10" />
</t:pane>
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="40%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_18" height="40%" />
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.awt.Rectangle;
import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.BaseActionEvent;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.PAINTAREAComponent;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.PAINTAREAITEMComponentTag;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.HttpSessionAccess;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoIntro}")

public class DemoIntro 
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    static String[] DEMOIMAGES = new String[]
    {
        "/images/pictures/demoworkplace/demo1.jpg",
        "/images/pictures/demoworkplace/demo2.jpg",
        "/images/pictures/demoworkplace/demo3.jpg"
    };
    
    protected int m_imageIndex = 0;
    protected List<String> m_bounds = new ArrayList<String>();
    protected PAINTAREAComponent m_paintArea = new PAINTAREAComponent();
    protected String m_bgpaintArea;
    protected Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_content = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DemoIntro(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        buildBounds();
        m_bgpaintArea = "";
        render();
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public List<String> getBounds() { return m_bounds; }
    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getContent() { return m_content; }
    
    public String getBgpaintArea() { return m_bgpaintArea; }
    public void setBgpaintArea(String value) { m_bgpaintArea = value; }

    private void render()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<DEMOIMAGES.length; i++) 
        {
            PAINTAREAITEMNode pai = new PAINTAREAITEMNode();
            nodes.add(pai);
            pai.setBgpaint("image(0,0,"+DEMOIMAGES[i]+",lefttop)");
            pai.setInvokeevent("click");
            pai.setMovetofrontonmouseover(false);
            pai.setBounds(pbx("bounds["+i+"]"));
            pai.setActionListener(pbx("onItemAction"));
            pai.setReference(""+i);
        }
        m_content.setContentNodes(nodes);
    }
    
    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }
    
    public void onItemAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        String refStr = ((BaseActionEvent)event).getSourceReference();
        int ref = ValueManager.decodeInt(refStr,0);
        m_imageIndex = ref;
        buildBounds();
    }
    
    public void onNext(ActionEvent event)
    {
        m_imageIndex++;
        if (m_imageIndex >= DEMOIMAGES.length)
            m_imageIndex = 0;
        buildBounds();
    }
                                        
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    protected void buildBounds()
    {
        m_bounds.clear();
        String[] bounds = new String[DEMOIMAGES.length];
        for (int ii=0; ii<DEMOIMAGES.length; ii++)
        {
            int si = (ii - this.m_imageIndex + DEMOIMAGES.length) % DEMOIMAGES.length;
            Rectangle r = new Rectangle(150-si*50,99 - si*33,500,375);
            bounds[ii] = (ValueManager.encodeRectangle(r)+";"+(10-si));
        }
        for (String bound: bounds)
            m_bounds.add(bound);
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }
    
}

Organization Tree

This demo shows the usage of PAINTAREA, PAINTAREAITEM and PAINTAREALINEITEM to represent a hierarchy of some organization.

Click onto the red items in order to open up / collapse the corresponding part of the diagram.

The PAINTAREA content is dynamically defined using a DYNAMICCONTENT component.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaOrganization}" >
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_10" background="#FFFFFF" height="100%" padding="20" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_1" >
<t:paintarea id="g_11" trigger="#{d.DemoPaintAreaOrganization.renderTrigger}" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_14" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaOrganization.content}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Random;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.LABELNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREALINEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaOrganization}")

public class DemoPaintAreaOrganization
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public static class OrgNode
    {
        List<OrgNode> i_children = new ArrayList<OrgNode>();
        String i_text;
        int i_level = 0;
        boolean i_collapsed = false;
        public OrgNode(String text)
        {
            i_text = text;
        }
        public void addChild(OrgNode child)
        {
            child.i_level = i_level + 1;
            i_children.add(child);
        }
    }
    
    public class OrgNodeItem
    {
        OrgNode i_orgNode;
        int i_x;
        int i_y;
        ComponentNode i_componentNode;
        List<ComponentNode> i_lineComponentNodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        public OrgNodeItem(OrgNode orgNode)
        {
            i_orgNode = orgNode;
        }
        public void onAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            Statusbar.outputMessage(i_orgNode.i_text);
            i_orgNode.i_collapsed = !i_orgNode.i_collapsed;
            render();
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_content = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    OrgNode m_topNode;
    List<OrgNodeItem> m_onis = new ArrayList<OrgNodeItem>(); 
    Trigger m_renderTrigger = new Trigger();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintAreaOrganization(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        Random r = new Random();
        m_topNode = new OrgNode("Company xyz");
        int maxi = 5 + r.nextInt(8);
        for (int i=0; i<maxi; i++)
        {
            OrgNode locationNode = new OrgNode("Location " + i);
            m_topNode.addChild(locationNode);
            int maxj = 3 + r.nextInt(10);
            for (int j=0; j<maxj; j++)
            {
                OrgNode depNode = new OrgNode("Department " + j);
                locationNode.addChild(depNode);
            }
            locationNode.i_collapsed = true;
        }
        render();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareaorganization.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaOrganization}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getContent() { return m_content; }
    public List<OrgNodeItem> getOnis() { return m_onis; }
    public Trigger getRenderTrigger() { return m_renderTrigger; }

    private void render()
    {
        m_onis.clear();
        renderOrgNode(m_topNode,0);
        List<ComponentNode> cns = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (OrgNodeItem oni: m_onis)
        {
            cns.add(oni.i_componentNode);
            for (ComponentNode lcn: oni.i_lineComponentNodes)
                cns.add(lcn);
        }
        m_content.setContentNodes(cns);
        m_renderTrigger.trigger();
    }
    
    private class RenderResponse
    {
        int currentY;
        OrgNodeItem oni;
        public RenderResponse(int currentY, OrgNodeItem oni)
        {
            super();
            this.currentY = currentY;
            this.oni = oni;
        }
    }
    
    private RenderResponse renderOrgNode(OrgNode orgNode, int currentY)
    {
        int onisIndex = m_onis.size();
        OrgNodeItem oni = new OrgNodeItem(orgNode);
        String color = "#D0D0D0";
        if (orgNode.i_collapsed == true)
            color = "#FFC0C0";
        oni.i_x = 180*orgNode.i_level;
        oni.i_y = currentY;
        PAINTAREAITEMNode cn = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
            .setBounds(oni.i_x+";"+oni.i_y+";100;30")
            .setBackground(color)
            .setBorder("#00000030");
        if (orgNode.i_children.size() > 0)
        {
            cn.setInvokeevent("leftclick")
              .setActionListener(pbx("onis["+onisIndex+"].onAction"));
        }
        oni.i_componentNode = cn;
        String text = orgNode.i_text;
        if (orgNode.i_collapsed == true) text = text + " (+" + orgNode.i_children.size()+")";
        LABELNode ln = new LABELNode()
            .setText(text)
            .setAlign("center");
        cn.addSubNode(ln);
        m_onis.add(oni);
        if (orgNode.i_children.size() == 0 || orgNode.i_collapsed == true)
            currentY += 35;
        if (orgNode.i_collapsed == false)
        {
            int counter = 0;
            for (OrgNode childOrgNode: orgNode.i_children)
            {
                RenderResponse rr = renderOrgNode(childOrgNode,currentY);
                currentY = rr.currentY;
                int fromX = (oni.i_x+100)+4;
                int fromY =  (oni.i_y+15);
                int toY = (rr.oni.i_y+15) - fromY;
                renderLine(fromX,fromY,70,toY,oni);
                counter++;
            }
        }
        return new RenderResponse(currentY,oni);
    }
    
    private void renderLine(int fromX, int fromY, int toX, int toY, OrgNodeItem oni)
    {
        int midX = toX/2;
        {
            PAINTAREALINEITEMNode lcn = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                .setBounds(fromX+";"+fromY+";"+midX+";0")
                .setLinecolor("#808080");
            oni.i_lineComponentNodes.add(lcn);
        }
        {
            PAINTAREALINEITEMNode lcn = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                .setBounds((fromX+midX)+";"+fromY+";0;"+toY)
                .setLinecolor("#808080");
            oni.i_lineComponentNodes.add(lcn);
        }
        {
            PAINTAREALINEITEMNode lcn = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                .setBounds((fromX+midX)+";"+(fromY+toY)+";"+(toX-midX)+";0")
                .setArrowto(1)
                .setLinecolor("#808080");
            oni.i_lineComponentNodes.add(lcn);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Organization Tree via PageBeanComponent

The Page Bean Component "CCGraphicalTree" which is part of the ccaddons-package allows a simple definition of an interactive, graphical tree.

Basically you just have to pass the hierarchy of nodes - that's it. All issues like collapsing/opening of sub nodes and selection of nodes are managed internally.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPBCGraphicalTree}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_3" background="#FFFFFF" border="#c0c0c0" height="100%" padding="20" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:pagebeancomponent id="g_5" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoPBCGraphicalTree.graphicalTree}" pagebeanclass="org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCGraphicalTree" pagebeaninitdata="boxWidth:120;boxHeight:50" />
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Random;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCDiagramBox;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCGraphicalTree;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.util.GraphicalTreeNode;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPBCGraphicalTree}")

public class DemoPBCGraphicalTree
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    static String[] FIRSTNAMES = new String[] {"Joseph","Jack","Barbara","Heinz","Claus","Henry","Josephine"};
    static String[] LASTNAMES = new String[] {"Miller","Brown","Carter","Meyer","Schmitz","McDonald"};
    
    private IListener m_listener;
    CCGraphicalTree m_graphicalTree;
    GraphicalTreeNode m_topNode;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPBCGraphicalTree(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        buildUpTree();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopbcgraphicaltree.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPBCGraphicalTree}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Initialization of the bean. Add any parameter that is required within your scenario. */
    public void prepare(IListener listener)
    {
        m_listener = listener;
    }

    public CCGraphicalTree getGraphicalTree() { return m_graphicalTree; }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void buildUpTree()
    {
        Random r = new Random();
        CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText topBox = new CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText();
        topBox.setTitle("Company xyz");
        topBox.setText("Munich, Germany");
        topBox.setImage("/images/icons/package.png");
        topBox.setImageWidth(16);
        m_topNode = new GraphicalTreeNode(topBox);
        m_topNode.setCollapsed(false);
        int maxi = 4 + r.nextInt(4);
        for (int i=0; i<maxi; i++)
        {
            CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText locationBox = new CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText();
            locationBox.setTitle("Location " + i);
            locationBox.setText(r.nextInt(1000) + "employees");
            locationBox.setImage("/images/icons/chart_pie.png");
            locationBox.setImageWidth(16);
            GraphicalTreeNode locationNode = new GraphicalTreeNode(locationBox);
            locationNode.setCollapsed(true);
            m_topNode.addChildNode(locationNode);
            int maxj = r.nextInt(5) + 3;
            for (int j=0; j<maxj; j++)
            {
                CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText depBox = new CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText();
                depBox.setTitle("Department " + j);
                depBox.setText(buildName(r));
                depBox.setImage("/images/icons/person.png");
                depBox.setImageWidth(16);
                GraphicalTreeNode depNode = new GraphicalTreeNode(depBox);
                locationNode.addChildNode(depNode);
            }
        }
        m_graphicalTree = new CCGraphicalTree();
        m_graphicalTree.setTopNode(m_topNode);
        // listen to selection events
        m_graphicalTree.addListener(new CCGraphicalTree.IListener()
        {
            public void reactOnSelection(GraphicalTreeNode node, CCDiagramBox nodePageBean)
            {
                if (nodePageBean instanceof CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText)
                    Statusbar.outputSuccess("Selection of node: " + ((CCDiagramBoxTitleAndText)nodePageBean).getTitle());
            }
        });
    }
    
    private String buildName(Random r)
    {
        String firstName = FIRSTNAMES[r.nextInt(FIRSTNAMES.length)];
        String lastName = LASTNAMES[r.nextInt(LASTNAMES.length)];
        return lastName + ", " + firstName;
    }
}

Machine Overview

The status of machines is visualized by color and text. The boxes are arranged in a matrix.

By clicking onto a box, detail information is shown.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMachineOverview}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Scale" width="50" />
<t:slider id="g_4" flush="true" majortickspacing="20" maxvalue="200" minortickspacing="10" minvalue="60" value="#{d.DemoMachineOverview.sliderScale}" width="200" />
<t:coldistance id="g_5" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_6" actionListener="#{d.DemoMachineOverview.onRefreshAction}" text="Refresh Data" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_8" border="#c0c0c0" height="100%;100" padding="0" width="100%;100" >
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:scalepane id="g_10" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoMachineOverview.paintAreaScale}" width="100%" >
<t:paintarea id="g_11" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_12" background="#FFFFFF" bounds="0;0;100%;100%;1" movetofrontonmouseover="false" >
<t:pane id="g_13" >
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:image id="g_15" align="left" image="/images/pictures/buildinglayout.jpg" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_16" contentbinding="#{d.DemoMachineOverview.content}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:scalepane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Random;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.ModelessPopup;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.LABELNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PANENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.ROWDISTANCENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.ROWNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoMachineOverview}")

public class DemoMachineOverview
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class Item
    {
        Date i_date = new Date();
        String i_image;
        String i_text2;
        String i_text3;
        String i_background;
                
        public Item()
        {
            i_image = "/industry/images/machine" + m_random.nextInt(4) + ".png";
            update();
        }
        public void update()
        {
            i_text2 = STATUSTEXTS[m_random.nextInt(STATUSTEXTS.length)];
            i_text3 = MENGETEXTS[m_random.nextInt(MENGETEXTS.length)];
            i_background = COLORS[m_random.nextInt(COLORS.length)];
        }
        public String getBackground()
        {
            return i_background;
        }
        public String getText1()
        {
            return "4.4";
        }
        public String getText2()
        {
            return i_text2;
        }
        public String getText3()
        {
            return i_text3;
        }
        public Date getDate()
        {
            return i_date;
        }
        public String getImage()
        {
            return i_image;
        }
        public void onAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            final DemoMachineDetail dui = new DemoMachineDetail();
            dui.prepare(null,this);
            ModelessPopup p = openModelessPopup(dui,"",0,0,new ModelessPopup.IModelessPopupListener()
            {
                public void reactOnPopupClosedByUser()
                {
                    closePopup(dui);
                }
            });
            p.setUndecorated(true);
            p.setCloseonclickoutside(true);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    static String[] POSITIONS = new String[]
    {
        "170;300",
        "290;390",
        "465;300",
        "460;390",
        "50;100",
        "280;100",
        "535;150",
        "120;425",
        "210;165",
        
    };
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_content = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    List<Item> m_items = new ArrayList<Item>();
    Random m_random = new Random();
    
    static String[] COLORS = new String[] 
    {
        "#FFFFA0",
        "#FFA0FF",
        "#A0FFFF",
    };
    
    static String[] STATUSTEXTS = new String[]
    {
        "Maschine arbeitet",
        "Maschine nicht belegt",
        "Strung",
        "In Wartung",
    };
    
    static String[] MENGETEXTS = new String[]
    {
        "Menge:",
        "Menge: 108 St",
        "Menge: 224 St",
        "Menge: 2826 St",
        "Menge: 18 St",
        "Menge: 34 St"
    };
    
    int m_sliderScale = 100;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoMachineOverview(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        render();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demomachineoverview.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoMachineOverview}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getContent() { return m_content; }
    public List<Item> getItems() { return m_items; }
    
    public void onRefreshAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        for (Item item: m_items)
            item.update();
    }

    public double getPaintAreaScale() { return (float)m_sliderScale/100f; }

    public int getSliderScale() { return m_sliderScale; }
    public void setSliderScale(int value) { this.m_sliderScale = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void render()
    {
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<POSITIONS.length; i++)
        {
            nodes.add(renderMachine(i));
        }
        m_content.setContentNodes(nodes);
    }
    
    private ComponentNode renderMachine(int index)
    {
        Item item = new Item();
        m_items.add(item);
        String baseExpression = "items["+index+"].";
        PAINTAREAITEMNode result = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
            .setBackground(pbx(baseExpression+"background"))
            .setBorder("#808080")
            .setBounds(POSITIONS[index]+";130;70;2")
            .setInvokeevent("click")
            .setActionListener(pbx(baseExpression+"onAction"))
            .setMovetofrontonmouseover(false);
        PANENode pane = new PANENode()
            .setRowdistance(0);
        result.addSubNode(pane);
        {
            ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
            pane.addSubNode(r);
            LABELNode l = new LABELNode()
                .setStyleseq("risclabel_nopadding")
                .setText(pbx(baseExpression+"text1"))
                .setForeground("#000000")
                .setFont("weight:bold");
            r.addSubNode(l);
        }
        {
            ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
            pane.addSubNode(r);
            LABELNode l = new LABELNode()
                .setStyleseq("risclabel_nopadding")
                .setForeground("#000000")
                .setText(pbx(baseExpression+"text2"))
                .setFont("size:10");
            r.addSubNode(l);
        }
        {
            ROWDISTANCENode r = new ROWDISTANCENode()
                .setHeight("100%");
            pane.addSubNode(r);
        }
        {
            ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
            pane.addSubNode(r);
            LABELNode l = new LABELNode()
                .setStyleseq("risclabel_nopadding")
                .setForeground("#000000")
                .setText(pbx(baseExpression+"text3"));
            r.addSubNode(l);
        }
        {
            ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
            pane.addSubNode(r);
            LABELNode l = new LABELNode()
                .setStyleseq("risclabel_nopadding")
                .setForeground("#000000")
                .setText(pbx(baseExpression+"date"))
                .setFormat("datetime");
            r.addSubNode(l);
        }
        return result;
    }
}

Lines moving with shapes

This demo produces a number of PAINTAREAITEM instances - with connecting PAINTAREALINEITEMs in between.

When moving a PAINTAREAITEM instance then the lines connected with the instance are following automatically. This is done by assigning a LINEID to each PAINTAREALINEITEM instance and by referencing this instance by PAINTAREAITEM-LINEIDSSTARTING and LINEIDSENDING.

Client side redrawing of lines is done using the Canvas component. The performance of the Canvas implementation is quite different between different browsers. So please use this demo to check the performance for your scenarios.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoManyShapes}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Number of shapes" width="120" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_4" format="int" value="#{d.DemoManyShapes.numberOfShapes}" width="80" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_5" coldistance="10" >
<t:label id="g_6" text="Position range" width="110" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_7" format="int" value="#{d.DemoManyShapes.rangeX}" width="80" />
<t:label id="g_8" text="/" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_9" format="int" value="#{d.DemoManyShapes.rangeY}" width="80" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:coldistance id="g_11" width="120" />
<t:checkbox id="g_12" selected="#{d.DemoManyShapes.withDrawingOfLines}" text="With drawing of lines" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:coldistance id="g_14" width="120" />
<t:checkbox id="g_15" selected="#{d.DemoManyShapes.automLineMoving}" text="Automatic moving of lines" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_16" >
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="120" />
<t:button id="g_18" actionListener="#{d.DemoManyShapes.onCreateShapesAction}" text="Create Shapes" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_20" border="#c0c0c0" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_21" >
<t:paintarea id="g_22" height="100%" trigger="#{d.DemoManyShapes.rearrangeTrigger}" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_23" contentbinding="#{d.DemoManyShapes.dynContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_24" >
<t:label id="g_25" text="Move one of the shapes by dragging/dropping!" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Random;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREALINEITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoManyShapes}")

public class DemoManyShapes
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class ShapeInfo
    {
        String i_bounds;
        int i_x;
        int i_y;
        public String getBounds() { return i_bounds; }
        public void setBounds(String value) 
        { 
            i_bounds = value;
            int[] vs = ValueManager.decodeStraightIntCSV(i_bounds);
            i_x = vs[0];
            i_y = vs[1];
        }
        public void onShapeAction(ActionEvent event)
        {
            // called when shape was moved (flush set to true!)
            // no action required here: all coordinates are calculated within
            // the getter-implementations...
        }
    }
    
    public class LineInfo
    {
        ShapeInfo i_fromShape;
        ShapeInfo i_toShape;
        public String getBounds()
        {
            int x = i_fromShape.i_x + 30;
            int y = i_fromShape.i_y + 10;
            int w = i_toShape.i_x - i_fromShape.i_x;
            int h = i_toShape.i_y - i_fromShape.i_y;
            return x+";"+y+";"+w+";"+h;
        }
        public void setBounds(String value)
        {
            // no need for implementation - the lines are always
            // correctly calulated in the getter
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Random R = new Random();
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();
    int m_numberOfShapes = 50;
    List<ShapeInfo> m_sis = new ArrayList<ShapeInfo>();
    List<LineInfo> m_lis = new ArrayList<LineInfo>();
    boolean m_automLineMoving = true;
    int m_rangeY = 2000;
    int m_rangeX = 2000;
    boolean m_withDrawingOfLines = true;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoManyShapes(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);      
        renderContent();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demomanyshapes.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoManyShapes}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContent() { return m_dynContent; }
    public List<ShapeInfo> getSis() { return m_sis; }
    public List<LineInfo> getLis() { return m_lis; }

    public int getNumberOfShapes() { return m_numberOfShapes; }
    public void setNumberOfShapes(int value) { this.m_numberOfShapes = value; }

    public void onCreateShapesAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        renderContent();
    }

    public boolean getAutomLineMoving() { return m_automLineMoving; }
    public void setAutomLineMoving(boolean value) { this.m_automLineMoving = value; }

    public int getRangeY() { return m_rangeY; }
    public void setRangeY(int value) { this.m_rangeY = value; }

    public int getRangeX() { return m_rangeX; }
    public void setRangeX(int value) { this.m_rangeX = value; }

    public boolean getWithDrawingOfLines() { return m_withDrawingOfLines; }
    public void setWithDrawingOfLines(boolean value) { this.m_withDrawingOfLines = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void renderContent()
    {
        m_sis.clear();
        m_lis.clear();
        List<ComponentNode> l = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfShapes; i++)
        {
            ShapeInfo si = new ShapeInfo();
            si.setBounds(R.nextInt(m_rangeX) + ";" + R.nextInt(m_rangeY) + ";" + "60;20");
            m_sis.add(si);
            PAINTAREAITEMNode pin = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                    .setBounds(pbx("sis["+i+"].bounds"))
                    .setBackground("#FFFFFF")
                    .setBorder("#c0c0c0")
                    .setMovingenabled(true)
                    .setActionListener(pbx("sis["+i+"].onShapeAction"))
                    .setFlush(true);
            // define the lines ending and starting with this item
            if (m_withDrawingOfLines == true && m_automLineMoving == true)
            {
                if (i != m_numberOfShapes-1) pin.setLineidsstarting("L_"+i);
                if (i != 0) pin.setLineidsending("L_"+(i-1));
            }
            l.add(pin);
        }
        if (m_withDrawingOfLines)
        {
            for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfShapes-1; i++)
            {
                LineInfo li = new LineInfo();
                li.i_fromShape = m_sis.get(i);
                li.i_toShape = m_sis.get(i+1);
                m_lis.add(li);
                PAINTAREALINEITEMNode lin = new PAINTAREALINEITEMNode()
                        .setBounds(pbx("lis["+i+"].bounds"))
                        .setLineid("L_"+i);
                l.add(lin);
            }
        }
        m_dynContent.setContentNodes(l);
    }
}

Connected items

You may connect PAINTAREAITEM instances so that if one is moved the other ones are moved as well.

For this reason you need to assign an explicit ITEMID to each PATINAREAITEM instance. And you need defined by using attribute CONNECTEDITEMIDS which instances are connected. CONNECTEDITEMIDS contains a semicolon-separated list of ITEMID values.

In the example item 1 is connected with item 2 - and item 2 is connected with item 3. Result: when moving item 1 then item 2 is moved - and as result item 3 is moved as well.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Move item &#34;1&#34; - the other ones automatically will follow." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_5" border="#c0c0c0" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:paintarea id="g_7" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_8" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.onItem1Action}" background="#FF0000" bounds="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds1}" connecteditemids="2" flush="true" itemid="1" movingenabled="true" >
<t:label id="g_9" align="center" text="1" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_10" background="#0000FF" bounds="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds2}" connecteditemids="3" itemid="2" >
<t:label id="g_11" align="center" text="2" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_12" background="#00FF00" bounds="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds3}" itemid="3" >
<t:label id="g_13" align="center" text="3" />
</t:paintareaitem>
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:label id="g_15" text="Item 1 Bounds" width="120" />
<t:field id="g_16" enabled="false" text="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds1}" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" text="Item 2 Bounds" width="120" />
<t:field id="g_19" enabled="false" text="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds2}" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:label id="g_21" text="Item 3 Bounds" width="120" />
<t:field id="g_22" enabled="false" text="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems.bounds3}" width="200" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems}")

public class DemoPaintareaConnectedItems
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    String m_bounds1 = "100;100;200;100";
    String m_bounds2= "70;200;50;50";
    String m_bounds3= "120;200;10;10";

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintareaConnectedItems(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareaconnecteditems.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintareaConnectedItems}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getBounds1() { return m_bounds1; }
    public void setBounds1(String value) { this.m_bounds1 = value; }

    public String getBounds2() { return m_bounds2; }
    public void setBounds2(String value) { this.m_bounds2 = value; }

    public String getBounds3() { return m_bounds3; }
    public void setBounds3(String value) { this.m_bounds3 = value; }

    public void onItem1Action(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
    }
}

Editing of line points

The PAINTARAEALINEITEM allows the user to edit its interim points.

To do so you need to:

1. switch the attribute WITHEDITINGOFINTERIMPOINTS to "true"
2. provide a property to be the counterpart of the INTERIMPOINTS attribute

The interim points are now both taken and written back into the property. By setting FLUSH to "true" the value is immediately transferred to the server side.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:coldistance id="g_3" width="100" />
<t:label id="g_4" text="Pick an interim points of the line and move it to a new position:" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:coldistance id="g_6" width="100" />
<t:paintarea id="g_7" background="#FFFFFF" border="#00000030" editgridsnapto="true" height="320" width="320" editgrid="10" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_8" arrowfrom="1" arrowto="1" bounds="60;60;200;200" flush="true" interimpoints="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.interimPoints}" linestyle="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.lineStyle}" witheditingofinterimpoints="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.boolEditInterimPoints}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:coldistance id="g_10" width="100" />
<t:checkbox id="g_11" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.boolEditInterimPoints}" text="Edit interim points" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:label id="g_13" text="Line style" width="100" />
<t:combobox id="g_14" flush="true" value="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.lineStyle}" width="200" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_15" text="default" value="default" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_16" text="edged" value="edged" />
</t:combobox>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" text="Interim Points" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_19" enabled="false" text="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing.interimPoints}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}")

public class DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_lineStyle = "default";
    public String getLineStyle() { return m_lineStyle; }
    public void setLineStyle(String value) { this.m_lineStyle = value; }

    String m_interimPoints = "200;0";
    boolean m_boolEditInterimPoints = true;

    public DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demolineinterimpointswithediting.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoLineInterimPointsWithEditing}"; }

    public boolean getBoolEditInterimPoints() { return m_boolEditInterimPoints; }
    public void setBoolEditInterimPoints(boolean value) { this.m_boolEditInterimPoints = value; }

    public String getInterimPoints() { return m_interimPoints; }
    public void setInterimPoints(String value) { this.m_interimPoints = value; }
    
}

Editing of interim points - fix start/end

When editing line points there are situation in which the first and/or the last interim point of the line should be fixed - and must not be moved by the user.

By setting the attributes FIXINTERIMPOINTFIRST and FIXINTERIMPOINTLAST to "true" you can do so.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" rowdistance="10" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints}">
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_3" background="#ffffff" border="#00000030" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:paintarea id="g_5" editgrid="5" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:paintareaitem id="g_6" background="#00000030" border="#00000030" bounds="20;20;100;50" >
<t:label id="g_7" align="center" text="Some shape" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintareaitem id="g_8" background="#00000030" border="#00000030" bounds="370;270;100;50" >
<t:label id="g_9" align="center" text="Some shape" />
</t:paintareaitem>
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_10" arrowfrom="6" arrowto="1" bounds="120;45;250;250" fixinterimpointfirst="true" fixinterimpointlast="true" flush="true" interimpoints="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints.interimPoints}" linestyle="edged" witheditingofinterimpoints="true" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_12" text="Interim points" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_13" flush="true" text="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints.interimPoints}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints}")

public class DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_interimPoints = "40;0;210;250";
    
    public DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintarealinefixpoints.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaLineFixPoints}"; }

    public String getInterimPoints() { return m_interimPoints; }
    public void setInterimPoints(String value) { this.m_interimPoints = value; }
}

Process Model

Rendering the quite complex model on the left is taken over by a rendering algorithm which is part of the page bean component "LayoutProcess" (that internally uses a PAINTAREA).

Take a look into the code: you just need do define the logical dependencies between the steps (which step is following which other one) - all the arrangement will be done automatically.

You can drag/drop new steps from the left and you may drag/drop new relations by dragging the arrow images that show up when moving the mouse over one step.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.captaincasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoProcessModeller}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_21" objectbinding="#{d.DemoProcessModeller}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:splitpane id="g_9" dividerlocation="200" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:splitpanesplit id="g_4" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_7" height="100%" objectbinding="#{d.DemoProcessModeller.grid}" rowheight="40" suppressheadline="true" width="100%;200" >
<t:gridcol id="g_12" text="Column" width="100%;100" >
<t:pane id="g_15" dragsend=".{dragsend}" padding="2" >
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:label id="g_11" cutwidth="true" font="weight:bold" height="100%" text=".{text}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:label id="g_19" cutwidth="true" font="weight:normal" stylevariant="ccsmall" text=".{description}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:gridcol>
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
</t:splitpanesplit>
<t:splitpanesplit id="g_5" >
<t:row id="g_16" >
<t:pagebeancomponent id="g_13" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoProcessModeller.layoutUI}" shownullcontent="true" />
</t:row>
</t:splitpanesplit>
</t:splitpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.palayout.logic.net.NetElement;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.palayout.logic.net.NetElementMatrix;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.palayout.view.dialogs.LayoutProcess;
import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.palayout.view.dialogs.RendererStep;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventDrop;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoProcessModeller}")

public class DemoProcessModeller
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public class GridItem extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        String i_description;
        String i_text;
        public String getDescription() { return i_description; }
        public void setDescription(String value) { this.i_description = value; }
        public String getText() { return i_text; }
        public void setText(String value) { this.i_text = value; }
        public String getDragsend() { return "STEP:"+this.i_text; }
        public void onRowSelect() { }
        public void onRowExecute() { }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    LayoutProcess m_layoutUI = new LayoutProcess();
    FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> m_grid = new FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem>();
    NetElementMatrix m_matrix;
    List<NetElement> m_elements = new ArrayList<NetElement>();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoProcessModeller(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        fillGrid();
        m_matrix = buildTestMatrix();
        m_layoutUI.prepare(m_matrix,new LayoutProcess.DefaultListener()
        {
            @Override
            public IPageBean getPageBeanForElement(final NetElement element)
            {
                // each element of the process model can be drawn with some own page bean
                // here we use a default one
                RendererStep result = new RendererStep();
                result.prepare(element,new RendererStep.IListener()
                {
                    @Override
                    public void reactOnDrop(BaseActionEventDrop event)
                    {
                        if (event.getDragInfo().startsWith("STEP:") == true)
                        {
                            String newText = event.getDragInfo().substring("STEP:".length());
                            if (event.checkIfDroppedInZoneVerticalsplitBottom())
                                addNetElementAfter(element,newText);
                            else
                                addNetElementBefore(element,newText);
                        }
                        if (event.getDragInfo().startsWith("STEPDOWN:") == true)
                        {
                            String uuid = event.getDragInfo().substring("STEPDOWN:".length());
                            connectElementFromUp(element,uuid);
                        }
                        if (event.getDragInfo().startsWith("STEPUP:") == true)
                        {
                            String uuid = event.getDragInfo().substring("STEPUP:".length());
                            connectElementFromDown(element,uuid);
                        }
                    }
                });
                return result;
            }
        });
    }
    
    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoprocessmodeller.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoProcessModeller}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public LayoutProcess getLayoutUI() { return m_layoutUI; }
    public FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> getGrid() { return m_grid; }

//    public void onTest1(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
//    {
//        NetElement n1 = m_elements.get(1);
//        NetElement n4 = m_elements.get(3);
//        NetElement between = new NetElement("Between 2 and 4");
//        m_elements.add(between);
//        n1.removeToElements(n4);
//        n1.addToElements(between);
//        between.addToElements(n4);
//        m_matrix.addElements(m_elements);
//        m_layoutUI.renderMatrix();
//    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private NetElementMatrix buildTestMatrix()
    {
        NetElementMatrix matrix = new NetElementMatrix();
        m_elements = buildTestListOfNetElements();
        matrix.addElements(m_elements);
        return matrix;
    }
    
    public static List<NetElement> buildTestListOfNetElements()
    {
        // define nodes
        NetElement n1 = new NetElement("Step 1");
        NetElement n2 = new NetElement("Step 2");
        NetElement n3 = new NetElement("Step 3");
        NetElement n4 = new NetElement("Step 4");
        NetElement n5 = new NetElement("Step 5");
        NetElement n6 = new NetElement("Step 6");
        NetElement n7 = new NetElement("Step 7");
        NetElement n8 = new NetElement("Step 8");
        NetElement n9 = new NetElement("Step 9");
        NetElement n10 = new NetElement("Step 10");
        NetElement n11 = new NetElement("Step 11");
        NetElement n12 = new NetElement("Step 12");
        NetElement n13 = new NetElement("Step 13");
        // define relations
        n1.addToElements(n2,n3);
        n2.addToElements(n4);
        n3.addToElements(n11);
        n4.addToElements(n5,n6);
        n5.addToElements(n9,n10);
        n6.addToElements(n7,n8);
        n7.addToElements(n11);
        n8.addToElements(n12);
        n10.addToElements(n11);
        n11.addToElements(n11);
        n11.addToElements(n8);
        n12.addToElements(n13);
        // collect nodes
        List<NetElement> result = new ArrayList<NetElement>();
        result.add(n1);
        result.add(n2);
        result.add(n3);
        result.add(n4);
        result.add(n5);
        result.add(n6);
        result.add(n7);
        result.add(n8);
        result.add(n9);
        result.add(n10);
        result.add(n11);
        result.add(n12);
        result.add(n13);
        return result;
    }
    
    private void fillGrid()
    {
        for (int i=20; i<100; i++) 
        {
            GridItem gi = new GridItem();
            gi.setText("Step " + i);
            gi.setDescription("Some description for " +     gi.getText());
            m_grid.getItems().add(gi);
        }
    }

    private void addNetElementAfter(NetElement element, String newText)
    {
        NetElement newElement = new NetElement(newText);
        element.addToElements(newElement);
        m_elements.add(newElement);
        m_matrix.addElements(m_elements);
        m_layoutUI.renderMatrix();
        m_layoutUI.selectNetElement(newElement);
    }
    
    private void addNetElementBefore(NetElement element, String newText)
    {
        NetElement newElement = new NetElement(newText);
        newElement.addToElements(element);
        m_elements.add(newElement);
        m_matrix.addElements(m_elements);
        m_layoutUI.renderMatrix();
        m_layoutUI.selectNetElement(newElement);
    }
    
    private void connectElementFromUp(NetElement element, String uuid)
    {
        NetElement upElement = findElement(uuid);
        if (upElement != null)
        {
            upElement.addToElements(element);
            m_layoutUI.renderMatrix();
            m_layoutUI.selectNetElement(element);
        }
    }

    private void connectElementFromDown(NetElement element, String uuid)
    {
        NetElement downElement = findElement(uuid);
        if (downElement != null)
        {
            element.addToElements(downElement);
            m_layoutUI.renderMatrix();
            m_layoutUI.selectNetElement(element);
        }
    }

    private NetElement findElement(String uuid)
    {
        List<NetElement> elements = m_matrix.getAllContainedNetElements();
        for (NetElement element: elements)
            if (ValueManager.checkIfStringsAreEqual(uuid,element.getUuid()))
                return element;
        return null;
    }
    
}

Performance considerations
Creating large 1:n relations

In this example all FIELD instances are rendered within one PAINTAREA component.

This means: on client side a DOM element tree is managed in which one parent node manages a all the sub nodes as children. The performance of any operation on server and client side, which affects this 1:n relationship, as consequence linearly depends on the number of children.

Examples for such operations are:

1. adding / rearranging components
2. focus management (e.g. "tabbing" between components)

We recommend to not build up parent-child relationships with more than 500 children. ...and we recommend to test your scenarios in which a lot of nodes may be created!

The next example in the demo workplace (DemoPaintAreaManyFields2) shows a way to overcome.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_7" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_8" format="int" labeltext="Number of fields" value="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields.numberOfFields}" width="200" />
<t:button id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields.onRenderAction}" text="Render" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_11" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:paintarea id="g_2" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:dynamiccontent id="g_6" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields.dynContent}" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.FIELDNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.DYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields}")

public class DemoPaintAreaManyFields
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private Map<String,Object> m_data = new HashMap<String,Object>();
    int m_numberOfFields = 2000;
    DYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContent = new DYNAMICCONTENTBinding();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintAreaManyFields(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareamanyfields.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public Map<String, Object> getData() { return m_data; } 

    public void onRenderAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) { render(); }

    public int getNumberOfFields() { return m_numberOfFields; }
    public void setNumberOfFields(int value) { this.m_numberOfFields = value; }

    public DYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContent() { return m_dynContent; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void render()
    {
        int x = 0;
        int y = -30;
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfFields; i++)
        {
            x += 100;
            if (i%10 == 0)
            {
                x = 0;
                y += 30;
            }
            PAINTAREAITEMNode pi = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds(x+";"+y+";90;25")
                .setSelected(true)
                .setFlush(true)
                .setSelectionenabled(true);
            nodes.add(pi);
            FIELDNode f = new FIELDNode()
                .setText(pbx("data['D"+i+"']"));
            m_data.put("D"+i,"Text "+i);
            pi.addSubNode(f);
        }
        m_dynContent.setContentNodes(nodes);
    }

}

Avoiding large 1:n relations

In this EXAMPLE an explicit own PAINTAREA is arranged around 100 fields.

This means that the number of children in parent-child relationships both on server and on client side is not reaching critical levels.

For better visibility each PAINTAREA that is internally generated is colored with some background color.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_7" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_8" format="int" labeltext="Number of fields" value="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2.numberOfFields}" width="200" />
<t:button id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2.onRenderAction}" text="Render" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdynamiccontent id="g_6" contentbinding="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2.dynContent}" />
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.FIELDNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREAITEMNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.PAINTAREANode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.ROWNode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.componentnodes.SCROLLPANENode;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding.ComponentNode;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2}")

public class DemoPaintAreaManyFields2
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private Map<String,Object> m_data = new HashMap<String,Object>();
    int m_numberOfFields = 2000;
    ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding m_dynContent = new ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPaintAreaManyFields2(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopaintareamanyfields2.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPaintAreaManyFields2}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public Map<String, Object> getData() { return m_data; } 

    public void onRenderAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) { render(); }

    public int getNumberOfFields() { return m_numberOfFields; }
    public void setNumberOfFields(int value) { this.m_numberOfFields = value; }

    public ROWDYNAMICCONTENTBinding getDynContent() { return m_dynContent; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private void render()
    {
        int x = 0;
        int y = -30;
        SCROLLPANENode sp = new SCROLLPANENode()
            .setHeight("100%")
            .setWidth("100%");
        PAINTAREANode pa = null;
        List<ComponentNode> nodes = new ArrayList<ComponentNode>();
        boolean paintAreabackgroundToggle = false;
        for (int i=0; i<m_numberOfFields; i++)
        {
            x += 100;
            if (i%100 == 0)
            {
                ROWNode r = new ROWNode();
                sp.addSubNode(r);
                pa = new PAINTAREANode()
                    .setWidth("100%")
                    .setHeight(300);
                if (paintAreabackgroundToggle == true)
                    pa.setBackground("#00000010");
                r.addSubNode(pa);
                y = -30;
                paintAreabackgroundToggle = !paintAreabackgroundToggle;
            }
            if (i%10 == 0)
            {
                x = 0;
                y += 30;
            }
            PAINTAREAITEMNode pi = new PAINTAREAITEMNode()
                .setBounds(x+";"+y+";90;25");
            pa.addSubNode(pi);
            FIELDNode f = new FIELDNode()
                .setText(pbx("data['D"+i+"']"));
            m_data.put("D"+i,"Text "+i);
            pi.addSubNode(f);
        }
        m_dynContent.setContentNode(sp);
    }

}

Helper lines when moving / resizing

Draw Area

The DRAWAREA is a component that allows to draw certain 2d-commands. You can draw:

. rectangles
. ovals
. lines
. text
. images
. raster grids
. polygones

Draw commands can be concatenated with ";". Pay attention: spaces are meaningful!

x,y,width,height values can be either defined as

. direct pixel values ("20")
. percentage values ("10")
. percentage value minus pixel value ("100%-10")

Internally the DRAWAREA component takes usage of the SVG drawing.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoDrawArea}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="Images" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:drawarea id="g_5" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="image(10,10,/images/pictures/ph0.jpg,lefttop);image(100%-10,100%-10,50,50,/images/pictures/ph1.jpg,rightbottom)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" text="Rectangles" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:drawarea id="g_9" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="rectangle(20,20,100,100,#FF0000);rectangle(80,40,200,100,#00FF00);rectangle(50%-10,50%-10,50%,50%,#0000FF80)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:label id="g_11" text="Ellipses" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:drawarea id="g_13" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="oval(10,10,200,100,#FF0000);oval(50,50,200,100,#FF0000,#00FF00,horizontal)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:label id="g_15" text="Oval lines" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_16" >
