<t:drawarea id="g_17" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="ovalline(10,10,200,100);ovalline(50,50,200,100,#FF0000,5);ovalline(100,10,100,100,#0000FF,10,85);ovalline(220,10,100,100,#0000FF,10,75);ovalline(340,10,100,100,#0000FF,10,50);" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:label id="g_19" text="Rounded filled rectangles" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:drawarea id="g_21" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="filledroundedrectangle(20,20,100,100,10,#FFC0C0,#FFFFC0,vertical,3,#800000);filledroundedrectangle(140,20,100,100,25,#FFFFC0,1,#000000);filledroundedrectangle(260,20,100,100,30,#C0FFC0,10,#000000);filledroundedrectangle(50%,50%,50%,50%,10,#C0C0C0,4,#000000);" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:label id="g_23" text="Lines" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_24" >
<t:drawarea id="g_25" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="grid(20,20,#00000010);line(20,20,400,100,2,#FF0000);line(10%,10%,90%,90%,2,#008000)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_26" >
<t:label id="g_27" text="Text labels" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:drawarea id="g_29" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="write(20,10,Hello world!,8,#800000,lefttop);write(20,20,Hello world!,10,#800000,lefttop);write(20,35,Hello world!,12,#800000,lefttop);write(20,50,Hello world!,40,#800000,lefttop);write(100%-20,100%-20,Hello world!,40,#008000,rightbottom)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:label id="g_31" text="Combined with normal controls" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_32" >
<t:drawarea id="g_33" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="rectangle(20,20,100,100,#FF0000);rectangle(80,40,200,100,#00FF00);write(20,20,Hello world!,40,#800000,lefttop);write(100%-20,100%-20,Hello world!,40,#008000,rightbottom)" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_34" >
<t:row id="g_35" >
<t:pane id="g_36" background="#FFFFFF80" height="100%" padding="20" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_37" >
<t:label id="g_38" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_39" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_40" >
<t:label id="g_41" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_42" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_43" >
<t:label id="g_44" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_45" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_46" >
<t:label id="g_47" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_48" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_49" >
<t:label id="g_50" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_51" width="100" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_52" >
<t:label id="g_53" text="label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_54" width="100" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:drawarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_55" >
<t:label id="g_56" text="Raster" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_57" >
<t:drawarea id="g_58" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="grid(10,10,#c0c0c0)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_59" >
<t:label id="g_60" text="Polygons" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_61" >
<t:drawarea id="g_62" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="polygon(10,10,100%,100%,0,100%,#FF0000,#0000FF,horizontal);polygon(100,10,130,40,90,30,#FF0000,#0000FF,horizontal);polygon(80,20,100%-20,100%-20,50%,0,100,80%,#00000010,#00000050,vertical)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_63" >
<t:label id="g_64" text="Polygon lines" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_65" >
<t:drawarea id="g_66" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="polyline(10,10,100%,100%,0,100%,#FF0000,1);polyline(100,10,130,40,90,30,#000000,5);polyline(80,20,100%-20,100%-20,50%,0,100,80%,#0000FF,2)" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_67" >
<t:drawarea id="g_68" border="#c0c0c0" drawcommands="#{d.DemoDrawArea.hexImageDrawCommand}" height="160" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.WebResourceReader;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoDrawArea}")

public class DemoDrawArea
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_hexImageDrawCommand;

    public DemoDrawArea(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        // read image and provide as "heximage(...)"
        byte[] image = new WebResourceReader().readFileIntoByteArray("/images/pictures/ph0.jpg");
        m_hexImageDrawCommand = "heximage(" +
                                "10,10," +
                                ValueManager.encodeHexString(image) +
                                ",lefttop);" +
                                "heximage(" +
                                "250,10,30,30," +
                                ValueManager.encodeHexString(image) +
                                ",lefttop);";
    }

    @Override
    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demodrawarea.jsp"; }
    @Override
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoDrawArea}"; }

    public String getHexImageDrawCommand() { return m_hexImageDrawCommand; }
    public void setHexImageDrawCommand(String value) { this.m_hexImageDrawCommand = value; }

}

Sound

Use the SOUND component for adding sound features to your page. The SOUND component on the one hand references a .wav file. On the other hand it provides a trigger which needs to be activated when the sound should be played.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" >
<t:sound id="g_2" sound="#{d.DemoSound.sound}" trigger="#{d.DemoSound.trigger}" />
</t:beanprocessing>
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_3" objectbinding="#{d.DemoSound}">
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:label id="g_5" text="Sound" width="120" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_6" group="SOUNDS" refvalue="/sounds/beep.wav" text="Beep" value="#{d.DemoSound.sound}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:coldistance id="g_8" width="120" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_9" group="SOUNDS" refvalue="/sounds/chainsaw.wav" text="Chain Saw" value="#{d.DemoSound.sound}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:coldistance id="g_20" width="120" />
<t:radiobutton id="g_21" group="SOUNDS" refvalue="/sounds/got_a_message.wav" text="Got a Message!" value="#{d.DemoSound.sound}" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_22" height="10" />
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:button id="g_24" actionListener="#{d.DemoSound.onPlaySound}" text="Play Sound" width="100" />
<t:coldistance id="g_25" width="20" />
<t:label id="g_26" text="#{d.DemoSound.sound}" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.managedbean.IDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoSound}")

public class DemoSound 
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    protected String m_sound = "/sounds/beep.wav";
    protected Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoSound(IDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("sound");
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }
    public void setTrigger(Trigger value) { m_trigger = value; }

    public String getSound() { return m_sound; }
    public void setSound(String value) { m_sound = value; }
    
    public void onPlaySound(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }
}

(Beta) Screen Grabber

The SCREENGRABBER component is placed into a PANE. When being triggered it grabs the screen pixels, builds a PNG byte representation and sends this representation to the server side.

You can influence the screen grabbing by several attributes:

(.) GRABTYPE: by default, the pane, in which the SCREENGRABBER is located, is grabbed. But you can also define to grab the whole window or the whole screen.

Please note: in the RISC-HTML client we use the framework "html2canvas" which is available here: https://github.com/niklasvh/html2canvas

This framework draws a DOM tree into some canvas, which then is transferred into an image file. Although it's astonishing how well this framework works in most of situations, you have to know that the imgage result may not always be 100% the same as what you see in your browser. Please check your scenario prior to applying this framework as part of the SCREENGRABBER component.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:pane id="g_3" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:label id="g_5" text="Grab Type" width="100" />
<t:combobox id="g_6" value="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.grabType}" width="100" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_7" text="Pane" value="pane" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_8" text="(Popup) Dialog" value="dialog" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_9" text="Window" value="window" />
</t:combobox>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:coldistance id="g_11" width="100" />
<t:button id="g_12" actionListener="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.onGrabArea}" text="Grab...!" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_13" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:pane id="g_15" border="#00000030" width="100%" >
<t:screengrabber id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.onReceiveGrabbedArea}" grabtype="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.grabType}" trigger="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.grabTrigger}" />
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_18" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" text="Grabbed area" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:label id="g_20" text="Some label" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_21" >
<t:field id="g_22" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:button id="g_24" image="/images/icons_16/ok_16x16.png" imageheight="16" imagewidth="16" text="Some button" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_25" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_26" objectbinding="#{tobedfined}" sbvisibleamount="5" width="100%" >
<t:gridcol id="g_27" text="Some" width="100%" />
<t:gridcol id="g_28" text="Grid" width="100%" />
</t:fixgrid>
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_29" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:label id="g_31" text="Grabbed image" width="100" />
<t:heximage id="g_32" height="100%;150" hexdata="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber.grabbedImage}" width="100%;150" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventSendImage;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedBean;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoScreenGrabber}")

public class DemoScreenGrabber
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    protected boolean m_viaDialog = true;
    public boolean getViaDialog() { return m_viaDialog; }
    public void setViaDialog(boolean value) { m_viaDialog = value; }

    protected String m_grabType = "pane";
    public String getGrabType() { return m_grabType; }
    public void setGrabType(String value) { m_grabType = value; }

    protected int m_height = 100;
    public int getHeight() { return m_height; }
    public void setHeight(int value) { m_height = value; }

    protected int m_width = 100;
    public int getWidth() { return m_width; }
    public void setWidth(int value) { m_width = value; }

    protected String m_grabbedImage;
    protected Trigger m_grabTrigger = new Trigger();
    
    public DemoScreenGrabber(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        initRefComponent("screengrabber");
    }

    public String getGrabbedImage() { return m_grabbedImage; }
    public void setGrabbedImage(String value) { m_grabbedImage = value; }

    public Trigger getGrabTrigger() { return m_grabTrigger; }

    public void onReceiveGrabbedArea(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventSendImage)
        {
            BaseActionEventSendImage e = (BaseActionEventSendImage)event;
            m_grabbedImage = e.getImageBytesAsHexString();
        }
    }

    public void onGrabArea(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_grabTrigger.trigger();
    }

}

Media Player (Java Client only)

With the MEDIAPLAYER component you can play media files such as MP4 movies.

Please check the exact media formats that are suppored within the Java documentation (https://docs.oracle.com/javafx/2/media/overview.htm).

The component sends a notification to the server side if some important status change happens inside the component. Currently the component sends a message "ENDED" if the user has seen the fully video. You can as consequence make sure that a user must see a certain video to the end (e.g. if containing security instructions).

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" text="URL" width="100" />
<t:combobox id="g_4" flush="true" value="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.mediaURL}" width="400" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_5" text="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/test1.MP4" value="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/test1.MP4" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_6" text="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/test2.MP4" value="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/test2.MP4" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_7" text="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/invalidurl.MP4" value="http://www.CaptainCasa.online/videos/invalidurl.MP4" />
</t:combobox>
</t:row>
<t:rowline id="g_8" />
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:mediaplayer id="g_11" actionListener="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.onMediaPlayerAction}" height="100%" pausetrigger="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.triggerPause}" playtrigger="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.triggerPlay}" stoptrigger="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.triggerStop}" url="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.mediaURL}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:coldistance id="g_13" width="100" />
<t:label id="g_14" font="size:10" text="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.mediaURL}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowline id="g_15" />
<t:row id="g_16" coldistance="5" >
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="95" />
<t:button id="g_18" actionListener="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.onTriggerPlayAction}" text="Play" />
<t:button id="g_19" actionListener="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.onTriggerPauseAction}" text="Pause" />
<t:button id="g_20" actionListener="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer.onTriggerStopAction}" text="Stop" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:rowstatusbar id="g_21" />
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventMediaPlayer;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoMediaPlayer}")

public class DemoMediaPlayer
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    String m_mediaURL;

    Trigger m_triggerStop = new Trigger();
    Trigger m_triggerPause = new Trigger();
    Trigger m_triggerPlay = new Trigger();
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoMediaPlayer(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demomediaplayer.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoMediaPlayer}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getMediaURL() { return m_mediaURL; }
    public void setMediaURL(String value) { this.m_mediaURL = value; }
    
    public void onMediaPlayerAction(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventMediaPlayer)
        {
            BaseActionEventMediaPlayer e = (BaseActionEventMediaPlayer)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Received message from Media Player: " + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    public Trigger getTriggerStop() { return m_triggerStop; }
    public Trigger getTriggerPause() { return m_triggerPause; }
    public Trigger getTriggerPlay() { return m_triggerPlay; }

    public void onTriggerStopAction(ActionEvent event) { m_triggerStop.trigger(); }
    public void onTriggerPauseAction(ActionEvent event) { m_triggerPause.trigger(); }
    public void onTriggerPlayAction(ActionEvent event) { m_triggerPlay.trigger(); }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Animated change of size

By setting attribute ANIMATECHANGEOFSIZE you can animate a change of the WIDTH and/or the HEIGHT of the component.

Please note: this attribute is only available within the FX client.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" objectbinding="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize}">
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Toggling between 2 pixel size definitions" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:pane id="g_5" animatechangeofsize="true" background="#00000010" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.paneWidth}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_8" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:label id="g_10" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_11" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:label id="g_13" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_14" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:button id="g_16" actionListener="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.onTogglePaneWidth}" text="Toggle pane width" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:label id="g_18" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Toggling between 2 percentage size definitions" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:pane id="g_20" animatechangeofsize="true" background="#00000010" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.paneWidthPerc}" >
<t:row id="g_21" >
<t:label id="g_22" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_23" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_24" >
<t:label id="g_25" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_26" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_27" >
<t:label id="g_28" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_29" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:button id="g_31" actionListener="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.onTogglePaneWidthPerc}" text="Toggle pane width" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_32" >
<t:label id="g_33" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Toggling between percentage and pixel size" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_34" >
<t:pane id="g_35" animatechangeofsize="true" background="#00000010" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" width="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.paneWidthPercPixel}" >
<t:row id="g_36" >
<t:label id="g_37" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_38" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_39" >
<t:label id="g_40" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_41" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_42" >
<t:label id="g_43" text="Some label" width="100" />
<t:field id="g_44" text="Some field" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_45" >
<t:button id="g_46" actionListener="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize.onTogglePaneWidthPercPixel}" text="Toggle pane width" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize}")

public class DemoAnimateChangeOfSize
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public void onTogglePaneWidthPercPixel(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if ("240".equals(m_paneWidthPercPixel))
            m_paneWidthPercPixel = "100%";
        else
            m_paneWidthPercPixel = "240";
    }

    String m_paneWidthPercPixel = "240";
    public String getPaneWidthPercPixel() { return m_paneWidthPercPixel; }
    public void setPaneWidthPercPixel(String value) { this.m_paneWidthPercPixel = value; }

    public void onTogglePaneWidthPerc(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if ("50%".equals(m_paneWidthPerc))
            m_paneWidthPerc = "100%";
        else
            m_paneWidthPerc = "50%";
    }

    String m_paneWidthPerc = "50%";
    public String getPaneWidthPerc() { return m_paneWidthPerc; }
    public void setPaneWidthPerc(String value) { this.m_paneWidthPerc = value; }

    public void onTogglePaneWidth(ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (m_paneWidth == 240)
            m_paneWidth = 390;
        else
            m_paneWidth = 240;
    }

    int m_paneWidth = 240;
    public int getPaneWidth() { return m_paneWidth; }
    public void setPaneWidth(int value) { this.m_paneWidth = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private IListener m_listener;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoAnimateChangeOfSize(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoanimatechangeofsize.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoAnimateChangeOfSize}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Initialization of the bean. Add any parameter that is required within your scenario. */
    public void prepare(IListener listener)
    {
        m_listener = listener;
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Content "flying in"

Basic demo

The FLYINCONTENTAREA component animates an update of some screen content: the updated content is "flying in" from a dedicated position.

In the demo there are 4 components with the ids "AAA", "BBB", "CCC", "DDD". By pressing the button...

1. the content of the inner area is updated (by a counter)
2. the FLYINCONTENTAREA-TRIGGER is invoked so that the animation starts

The FLYINCONTENTAREA provides an attribute STARTPOINT. There are two possibilities to defined the start point:

1. by referencing the center of a component by using the component's id ("component(...id...)"). This is the way the start point is defined in this demo.
2. by directly referencing an absolute coordinage ("point(x,y)")

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2}" >
<t:row id="g_6" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:coldistance id="g_16" width="100%" />
<t:combobox id="g_14" labeltext="Fly in from" value="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2.fromId}" width="150" >
<t:comboboxitem id="g_15" text="AAA" value="AAA" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_29" text="BBB" value="BBB" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_30" text="CCC" value="CCC" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_31" text="DDD" value="DDD" />
</t:combobox>
<t:button id="g_2" actionListener="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2.onFlyInAction}" text="Fly in" width="100+" />
<t:coldistance id="g_33" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="AAA" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_34" coldistance="50" >
<t:pane id="g_17" height="100%" >
<t:rowdistance id="AAA" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:label id="g_13" stylevariant="ccinfogreen" text="AAA" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_11" height="100%" />
<t:row id="g_27" >
<t:label id="BBB" stylevariant="ccinfogreen" text="BBB" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="AAA" height="50" />
</t:pane>
<t:flyincontentarea id="g_24" height="100%" startpoint="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2.fylInStartPoint}" trigger="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2.trigger}" width="100%" >
<t:box id="g_10" height="100%" stylevariant="ccexposed" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_25" >
<t:label id="g_12" align="center" font="size:200" height="100%" text="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2.text}" valign="middle" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:flyincontentarea>
<t:pane id="g_18" height="100%" >
<t:rowdistance id="AAA" height="50" />
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:label id="CCC" stylevariant="ccinfogreen" text="CCC" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_21" height="100%" />
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:label id="DDD" stylevariant="ccinfogreen" text="DDD" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="AAA" height="50" />
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2}")

public class DemoFlyInContentArea2
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener extends Serializable
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    String m_fromId = "AAA";
    int m_counter = 1;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoFlyInContentArea2(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoflyincontentarea2.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea2}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }

    public String getFromId() { return m_fromId; }
    public void setFromId(String value) { this.m_fromId = value; }

    public String getText() { return m_counter+""; }

    public void onFlyInAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_counter++;
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    public String getFylInStartPoint() 
    { 
        return "component("+m_fromId+")"; 
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Scenario "Wizzard / Workflow"

Press the buttons one the left one after the other and view the animation.

Whenever you update the content of the FLYINCONTENTAREA then you may invoke a trigger.

As consequence the updated content of the area "flies" into its position by some animation.

The point to start the animation from can be defined by the definition in attribute STARTPOINT. There are two notations supported currently:

1. component(...id...) - from the center of the component
2. point(x,y) - from an absolute coordinate

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1}" >
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_37" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorBlue@&#39;]}" border="left:1;right:0;top:1;bottom:1;color:#C0C0C0" height="100%" >
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_38" height="100%" x="0" y="0" >
<t:paintarea id="g_39" height="100%" width="210" >
<t:paintarealineitem id="g_40" arrowto="1" bounds="50%;10%;0;80%" linecolor="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@baseColor@&#39;]}" linesize="4" />
</t:paintarea>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_41" height="100%" x="0" y="0" zindex="2" >
<t:pane id="g_42" height="100%" padding="left:30;right:30" rowdistance="40" >
<t:rowdistance id="g_43" height="100%" />
<t:row id="g_44" >
<t:button id="HELLOWORLD" actionListener="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.onHelloWorld}" height="80" shadow="hoffset:3;voffset:3;blur:3;color:#C0C0C0" text="1. Hello World!" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_45" >
<t:button id="MINISPREAD" actionListener="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.onMiniSpread}" height="80" reference="MINISPREAD" shadow="hoffset:3;voffset:3;blur:3;color:#C0C0C0" text="2. Mini Spreadsheet" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_46" >
<t:button id="BUDGET" actionListener="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.onBudget}" height="80" reference="BUDGET" shadow="hoffset:3;voffset:3;blur:3;color:#C0C0C0" text="3. Budget" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_47" height="100%" />
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
<t:flyincontentarea id="g_35" height="100%" startpoint="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.startPoint}" trigger="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.trigger}" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_18" background="#FFC0C0" border="#C0C0C0" >
<t:rowpagebeaninclude id="g_11" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1.contentBean}" shownullcontent="true" />
</t:pane>
</t:flyincontentarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1}")

public class DemoFlyInContentArea1
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    String m_startPoint;
    IPageBean m_contentBean;
    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    
    Map<Class,IPageBean> m_beans = new HashMap<Class,IPageBean>(); 
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoFlyInContentArea1(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        {
            DemoHelloWorld bean = new DemoHelloWorld(workpageDispatcher);
            bean.setDocuRendered(false);
            m_beans.put(bean.getClass(),bean);
        }
        {
            DemoBudget bean = new DemoBudget(workpageDispatcher);
            bean.setDocuRendered(false);
            m_beans.put(bean.getClass(),bean);
        }
        {
            DemoMinispread bean = new DemoMinispread(workpageDispatcher);
            bean.setDocuRendered(false);
            m_beans.put(bean.getClass(),bean);
        }
        onHelloWorld(null);
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoflyincontentarea1.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoFlyInContentArea1}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getStartPoint() { return m_startPoint; }
    public IPageBean getContentBean() { return m_contentBean; }

    public void onBudget(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_contentBean = m_beans.get(DemoBudget.class);
        m_startPoint = "component(BUDGET)"; // Id of button
    }

    public void onMiniSpread(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_contentBean = m_beans.get(DemoMinispread.class);
        m_startPoint = "component(MINISPREAD)"; // Id of button
    }

    public void onHelloWorld(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_contentBean = m_beans.get(DemoHelloWorld.class);
        m_startPoint = "component(HELLOWORLD)"; // Id of button
    }

    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Master detail - with moving detail

This is an example how to create some interactive Master-Detail-view: simple selections in the grid trigger an update of a "preview"-area which is positioned on the right bottom or right top - depending on the current selection in the grid.

When "executing" (double clicking or hitting the return key) then the preview area is opened to cover the whole grid area.

Please check the keyboard behavior: when rushing with cursor up/down through the grid then the preview is updated - when hitting the return key, the detail area is fully sized, once again continuing with the cursor keys it is reduced again.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_8" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_10" >
<t:pane id="g_7" >
<t:row id="g_13" >
<tpbc:datagridview2 id="g_9" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.dataGrid}" shownullcontent="true" >
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_15" propertyName="firstName" title="Vorname" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_24" propertyName="lastName" title="Nachname" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_26" propertyName="weight" title="Gewicht" width="80" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_28" propertyName="birthDay" title="Geburtsdatum" width="120" />
</tpbc:datagridview2>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareabaseitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_11" boundsanchor="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailAnchor}" height="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailHeight}" width="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailWidth}" x="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailX}" y="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailY}" zindex="5" >
<t:box id="g_12" border="left:2;right:2;top:2;bottom:2;color:#00000018" padding="0" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:scalepane id="g_14" height="100%" scale="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailScale}" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_22" >
<t:rowpagebeaninclude id="g_17" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing.detailPage}" shownullcontent="true" />
</t:pane>
</t:scalepane>
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.datagridview2.CCDataGridView2;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

import workplace.logic.Person;
import workplace.logic.RandomLogic;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing}")

public class DemoMasterDetailWithSizing
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    CCDataGridView2<Person> m_dataGrid = new CCDataGridView2(Person.class);
    public CCDataGridView2 getDataGrid() { return m_dataGrid; }
    DemoMasterDetailWithSizingDetail m_detailPage = new DemoMasterDetailWithSizingDetail();

    boolean m_detailIsShrinked = true;
    double m_detailScale = 0.6d;
    Trigger m_detailAnimationTrigger = new Trigger();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoMasterDetailWithSizing(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        fillGrid();
    }


    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demomasterdetailwithsizing.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoMasterDetailWithSizing}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoMasterDetailWithSizingDetail getDetailPage() { return m_detailPage; }
    
    public double getDetailScale() { return m_detailIsShrinked ? 0.6d:1d; }
    public String getDetailHeight() { return m_detailIsShrinked ? "350":"100%-100"; }
    public String getDetailWidth() { return m_detailIsShrinked ? "300":"100%-100"; }
    public String getDetailY() 
    { 
        if (isSelectionInBottomArea())
            return m_detailIsShrinked ? "100%-30":"100%-50";
        else
            return m_detailIsShrinked ? "30":"100%-50";
    }
    public String getDetailX() { return m_detailIsShrinked ? "100%-30":"100%-50"; }
    public String getDetailAnchor() 
    { 
        if (isSelectionInBottomArea())
            return m_detailIsShrinked ? "rightbottom":"rightbottom";
        else
            return m_detailIsShrinked ? "righttop":"rightbottom";
    }

    public Trigger getDetailAnimationTrigger() { return m_detailAnimationTrigger; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void fillGrid()
    {
        List<Person> ps = new ArrayList<Person>();
        for (int i=0; i<100; i++)
            ps.add(RandomLogic.createPerson());
        m_dataGrid.prepare(ps,new CCDataGridView2.DefaultListener<Person>()
        {
            @Override
            public void reactOnGridSelect(Person object)
            { 
                m_detailPage.prepare(object,null);
                m_detailAnimationTrigger.trigger();
                m_detailIsShrinked = true;
            }
            @Override
            public void reactOnGridExecute(Person object)
            {
                m_detailPage.prepare(object,null);
                m_detailIsShrinked = false;
            }
        });
        m_dataGrid.getGrid().selectAndFocusItem(m_dataGrid.getGrid().getItems().get(0));
    }
    
    private boolean isSelectionInBottomArea()
    {
        try
        {
            Object o = m_dataGrid.getGrid().getSelectedItem();
            int index = m_dataGrid.getGrid().getItems().indexOf(o);
            int relIndex = index - m_dataGrid.getGrid().getSbvalue();
            int sbVisibleAmount = m_dataGrid.getGrid().getClientvisibleamount();
            if (relIndex < sbVisibleAmount / 2)
                return true;
        }
        catch (Throwable t)
        {
        }
        return false;
    }

}

Auto-hiding content

The component SIZEANIMATIONAREA that is shown with an initial size and then is resized to its long term size after some duration.

The initial size is defined by attributes FROMWIDTH and FROMHEIGHT. The long term size is defined by attribute TOWIDTH and TOHEIGHT. - If you do not define a value then the size is calculated automatically by its content. You can define any type of sized (pixel sizes, percentage sizes, ...). By using the attribute DURATION you define the duration until the initial size is replaced by the long term size.

The components provides an attribute TRIGGER: when triggering the component then the size is again switched to the initial size for the defined duration.

A typical use case is shown in the demo: some content is shown which then is completely or in parts optically removed.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_13" >
<t:button id="g_2" actionListener="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.onShowFromSizeAction}" text="Show full size" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_3" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_11" height="100%" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Embedded in classical container" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_32" >
<t:label id="g_5" text="Some content on top..." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:sizeanimationarea id="g_7" duration="2000" toheight="0" towidth="0" trigger="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.trigger}" >
<t:pane id="g_9" background="#FFE0E0" padding="10" >
<t:row id="g_53" >
<t:label id="g_54" foreground="#800000" stylevariant="ccbig" text="This is some message that disappears after 2000 ms." />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:sizeanimationarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_34" >
<t:label id="g_35" text="Some content on bottom..." />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_37" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_57" height="200%" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Embedded in overlay area" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_16" background="#F0F0F0" border="#00000030" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_30" >
<t:fixgrid id="g_8" height="100%" objectbinding="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.grid}" width="100%" >
<t:gridcol id="g_75" text="First name" width="100%;100" >
<t:label id="g_77" text=".{firstName}" />
</t:gridcol>
<t:gridcol id="g_78" text="Last name" width="100%;100" >
<t:label id="g_79" text=".{lastName}" />
</t:gridcol>
</t:fixgrid>
</t:overlayareabaseitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_17" boundsanchor="centerbottom" x="50%" y="100%" zindex="2" >
<t:pane id="g_19" background="#FFFFFF" border="left:1;right:1;top:1;bottom:0;color:#00000030" padding="left:20;right:20;top:5;bottom:5" >
<t:row id="g_20" >
<t:label id="g_21" text="Some title which is always shown" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:coldistance id="g_42" width="100%" />
<t:sizeanimationarea id="g_18" duration="2000" toheight="0" trigger="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.trigger}" >
<t:label id="g_25" stylevariant="ccbig" text="This is some message!" />
</t:sizeanimationarea>
<t:coldistance id="g_44" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_46" boundsanchor="rightmiddle" x="100%" y="50%" zindex="2" >
<t:sizeanimationarea id="g_48" duration="3000" towidth="0" trigger="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.trigger}" >
<t:pane id="g_49" background="#FFFFFF" border="left:1;right:0;top:1;bottom:1;color:#00000030" padding="left:5;right:5;top:5;bottom:5" >
<t:row id="g_50" >
<t:image id="g_51" image="/images/pictures/ph0.jpg" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:sizeanimationarea>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_59" boundsanchor="leftmiddle" x="0" y="50%" zindex="2" >
<t:pane id="g_64" >
<t:row id="g_65" >
<t:sizeanimationarea id="g_60" duration="3000" towidth="0" trigger="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.triggerPostIt}" >
<t:pane id="g_61" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorYellow@&#39;]}" border="left:0;right:1;top:1;bottom:1;color:#00000030" padding="10" >
<t:row id="g_62" >
<t:textpane id="g_66" height="30" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Some info" width="200" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_72" >
<t:textpane id="g_73" height="100" text="This is some text content - which is used as &#34;postit&#34; paper..." width="200" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:sizeanimationarea>
<t:pane id="g_68" background="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@backgroundColorYellow@&#39;]}" border="left:0;right:1;top:1;bottom:1;color:#00000030" padding="top:5;bottom:5" rounding="0;10;10;0" >
<t:row id="g_69" >
<t:icon id="g_70" actionListener="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1.onShowPostItAction}" focusable="false" height="24" image="/images.iconssvg.arrowright_16x16._00000080.16x16.ccsvg" width="24" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

import workplace.logic.RandomLogic;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1}")

public class DemoSizeAnimationArea1
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class GridItem extends FIXGRIDItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        String i_lastName;
        String i_firstName;
        public String getLastName() { return i_lastName; }
        public void setLastName(String value) { this.i_lastName = value; }
        public String getFirstName() { return i_firstName; }
        public void setFirstName(String value) { this.i_firstName = value; }
        public void onRowSelect()
        {
        }
        public void onRowExecute()
        {
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> m_grid = new FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem>();
    
    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    Trigger m_triggerPostIt = new Trigger();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoSizeAnimationArea1(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        fillGrid();
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demosizeanimationarea1.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoSizeAnimationArea1}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public FIXGRIDListBinding<GridItem> getGrid() { return m_grid; }

    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }
    public Trigger getTriggerPostIt() { return m_triggerPostIt; }
    
    public void onShowFromSizeAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    public void onShowPostItAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_triggerPostIt.trigger();
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void fillGrid()
    {
        for (int i=0; i<50; i++)
        {
            GridItem gi = new GridItem();
            m_grid.getItems().add(gi);
            gi.setFirstName(RandomLogic.getFirstName());
            gi.setLastName(RandomLogic.getLastName());
        }
    }

}

3D Animations

Rotating content - simple example

The ROTATECONTENTAREA is a container that can rotate its content - so that the content of the container is still visible, but only requires some reduced screen space.

All controls within the container are fully use-able - also when being rotated.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:label id="g_7" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Anchor on left side,different angles" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" coldistance="20" >
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_2" rotateanchor="left" rotateangle="30" >
<t:box id="g_3" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:field id="g_5" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:field id="g_11" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_12" >
<t:field id="g_13" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:field id="g_15" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_44" rotateanchor="left" rotateangle="45" >
<t:box id="g_45" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_46" >
<t:field id="g_47" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_48" >
<t:field id="g_49" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_50" >
<t:field id="g_51" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_52" >
<t:field id="g_53" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_55" rotateanchor="left" rotateangle="60" >
<t:box id="g_56" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_57" >
<t:field id="g_58" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_59" >
<t:field id="g_60" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_61" >
<t:field id="g_62" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_63" >
<t:field id="g_64" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:label id="g_20" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Anchor on right side, different angles" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_21" coldistance="20" >
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_22" rotateanchor="right" rotateangle="30" >
<t:box id="g_23" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_24" >
<t:field id="g_25" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_26" >
<t:field id="g_27" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_28" >
<t:field id="g_29" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_30" >
<t:field id="g_31" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_33" rotateanchor="right" rotateangle="45" >
<t:box id="g_34" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_35" >
<t:field id="g_36" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_37" >
<t:field id="g_38" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_39" >
<t:field id="g_40" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_41" >
<t:field id="g_42" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_66" rotateanchor="right" rotateangle="60" >
<t:box id="g_67" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_68" >
<t:field id="g_69" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_70" >
<t:field id="g_71" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_72" >
<t:field id="g_73" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_74" >
<t:field id="g_75" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_77" >
<t:label id="g_78" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Server side binding" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_80" coldistance="20" >
<t:button id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2.onToggleAction}" text="Toggle" width="100+" />
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_81" actionListener="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2.onToggleAction}" rotateanchor="left" rotateangle="30" rotated="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2.rotated}" withrotateicon="false" >
<t:box id="g_82" padding="10" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" stylevariant="ccexposed" >
<t:row id="g_83" >
<t:field id="g_84" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_85" >
<t:field id="g_86" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_87" >
<t:field id="g_88" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_89" >
<t:field id="g_90" labeltext="Some field" width="100%;300" />
</t:row>
</t:box>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2}")

public class DemoRotateContentArea2
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public void onToggleAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_rotated = !m_rotated;
    }

    boolean m_rotated = true;
    public boolean getRotated() { return m_rotated; }
    public void setRotated(boolean value) { this.m_rotated = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener extends Serializable
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private IListener m_listener;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoRotateContentArea2(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demorotatecontentarea2.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoRotateContentArea2}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Initialization of the bean. Add any parameter that is required within your scenario. */
    public void prepare(IListener listener)
    {
        m_listener = listener;
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Rotating content - List-detail-scenario

This demo shows how to use the ROTATECONTENTAREA for a typical list-detail scenario:

While navigating through the grid the focus of the user is on the left side - so the right side is rotated.

Once the user double clickes an item on the left, the optical focus will be moved to the right side and the left part will be rotated.

Please note: in this demo all parts of the screen are implemented within one layout - you normally would separate the list part and the detail part into own page beans.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea}" >
<t:row id="g_6" coldistance="20" >
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_16" flush="true" height="100%" rotateanchor="right" rotateangle="15" rotated="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.rotatedLeft}" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_10" height="100%" width="100%;600" >
<t:row id="g_21" >
<tpbc:datagridview2 id="g_5" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.grid}" shownullcontent="true" >
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_27" propertyName="title" title="Title" width="100%" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_23" propertyName="firstName" title="First name" width="100%" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_25" propertyName="lastName" title="Last name" width="100%" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_59" propertyName="department" title="Department" width="100%" />
</tpbc:datagridview2>
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
<t:rotatecontentarea id="g_19" height="100%" rotateangle="15" rotated="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.rotatedRight}" width="100%" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_8" height="100%" rowdistance="20" width="100%;500" >
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:image id="g_15" align="left" height="150" image="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.image}" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_29" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="General data" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_9" >
<t:field id="g_31" labeltext="Title" text="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.title}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_43" >
<t:field id="g_44" labeltext="First name" text="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.firstName}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_33" >
<t:field id="g_34" labeltext="Last name" text="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.lastName}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_36" >
<t:tabbedpane id="g_61" width="100%" >
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_18" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Body measures" >
<t:row id="g_38" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_39" format="int" labeltext="Weight" value="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.weight}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_46" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_47" format="int" labeltext="Height" value="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.height}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_17" text="Certificates" />
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_63" text="Mail" />
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_49" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_50" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Company data" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_51" >
<t:field id="g_52" labeltext="Department" text="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.department}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_54" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_55" height="100%;300" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Comment" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_56" >
<t:textarea id="g_57" height="100%" labeltext="Comment" text="#{d.DemoRotateContentArea.selectedPerson.comment}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:rotatecontentarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.datagridview2.CCDataGridView2;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

import workplace.logic.Person;
import workplace.logic.RandomLogic;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemorotatecontentareaUI}")

public class DemoRotateContentArea
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    CCDataGridView2<Person> m_grid = new CCDataGridView2<Person>(Person.class);
    boolean m_rotatedLeft = false;
    boolean m_rotatedRight = true;

    List<Person> m_persons;
    Person m_selectedPerson;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoRotateContentArea(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);
        m_persons = createGridContent();
        m_grid.prepare(m_persons,new CCDataGridView2.DefaultListener<Person>()
        {
            @Override
            public void reactOnGridSelect(Person object)
            {
                m_selectedPerson = object;
                m_rotatedLeft = false;
                m_rotatedRight = true;
            }
            @Override
            public void reactOnGridExecute(Person object)
            {
                m_rotatedLeft = true;
                m_rotatedRight = false;
            }
        });
        m_grid.getGrid().selectItem(0);
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demorotatecontentarea.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemorotatecontentareaUI}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public CCDataGridView2 getGrid() { return m_grid; }
    public Person getSelectedPerson() { return m_selectedPerson; } 
    public boolean getRotatedLeft() { return m_rotatedLeft; }
    public void setRotatedLeft(boolean value) { this.m_rotatedLeft = value; }
    public boolean getRotatedRight() { return m_rotatedRight; }
    public void setRotatedRight(boolean value) { this.m_rotatedRight = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private List<Person> createGridContent()
    {
        List<Person> ps = new ArrayList<Person>();
        for (int i=0; i<100; i++)
            ps.add(RandomLogic.createPerson());
        return ps;
    }

}

Cube rotation - simple example

The DEMOCUBEROTATOR is a powerful but very simple to use animation component:

When triggered then the current content is rotated into a certain direction - and is replaced with the updated content of the component.

This means: you do not have to deal with two content areas - the one to be rotated out, the one to be rotated in! You just work with one content area. The client side component will automatically clone the last version of the content area and will then use this clone to perform the "rotate-out" - and it will use the updated version of the "one" content area to perform the "rotate-in".

In the example the content of the component is exchanged with each click on a rotation-button - by selecting one page bean out of a list of page beans.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotator}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotator}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:label id="g_8" text="Rotate the are below by pressing one of the buttons:" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" coldistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:button id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.onRotateAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" reference="up" text="Up" width="100+" />
<t:button id="g_20" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.onRotateAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" reference="down" text="Down" width="100+" />
<t:button id="g_22" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.onRotateAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" reference="left" text="Left" width="100+" />
<t:button id="g_23" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.onRotateAction}" doubleclickenabled="true" reference="right" text="Right" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_9" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:cuberotator id="g_2" height="100%" rotationdirection="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.direction}" rotationtrigger="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.trigger}" width="100%" >
<t:pane id="g_3" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultcoldistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:rowpagebeaninclude id="g_25" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotator.contentBean}" shownullcontent="true" />
</t:pane>
</t:cuberotator>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.BaseActionEvent;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.pagebean.IPageBean;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCubeRotator}")

public class DemoCubeRotator
    extends PageBean
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    List<IPageBean> m_pageBeans = new ArrayList<IPageBean>();
    int m_index = 0;
    String m_direction;
    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoCubeRotator(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        m_pageBeans.add(new DemoHelloWorld(workpageDispatcher));
        m_pageBeans.add(new DemoMinispread(workpageDispatcher));
        m_pageBeans.add(new DemoBudget(workpageDispatcher));
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/democuberotator.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoCubeRotator}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public IPageBean getContentBean() 
    { 
        return m_pageBeans.get(m_index % m_pageBeans.size()); 
    }

    public void onRotateAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_direction = ((BaseActionEvent)event).getSourceReference();
        m_trigger.trigger();
        m_index++;
    }

    public String getDirection() { return m_direction; }
    public void setDirection(String value) { this.m_direction = value; }

    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Cube rotation - Filter-list-detail-scenario

This demo shows how to use the component CUBEROTATOR for providing a "reporting cube":

On the top side you define the filter criteria, the left side shows the list of found items - and the right side shows a selected item.

Rotation are either implicitly triggered - e.g. by button "Show List" - or explicitly triggered by the cube buttons on the bottom right.

Please note:

1. this is a graphical demo only - there are no serious functions behind the screens!
2. all parts of the screen are included in the layout - normally you would better separate each sub-page (filter, list, detail) in a separate page.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_2" height="100%" width="100%" >
<t:overlayareabaseitem id="g_3" >
<t:cuberotator id="g_105" height="100%" rotationdirection="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.rotationDirection}" rotationtrigger="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.rotationTrigger}" width="100%" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_106" background="#d4e3ec" comment="TOP" height="100%" padding="10" rendered="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.renderedTop}" rowdistance="30" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_107" >
<t:label id="g_108" font="size:30" foreground="#00000080" stylevariant="ccbig" text="FILTER FOR PERSONS" texttransform="uppercase" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_109" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_110" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Free search" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_111" >
<t:field id="g_112" labeltext="Search" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_113" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_114" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Person attributes" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_115" >
<t:field id="g_116" labeltext="First name" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_117" >
<t:field id="g_118" labeltext="Last name" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_119" >
<t:calendarfield id="g_120" labeltext="Birthday - from" width="100%" />
<t:calendarfield id="g_121" labeltext="Birthday - to" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_122" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_123" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Organization" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_124" >
<t:combobox id="g_125" labeltext="Cost center" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_126" >
<t:combobox id="g_127" labeltext="Department" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_128" >
<t:button id="g_129" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.onShowListAction}" text="Show List" width="200+" />
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
<t:scrollpane id="g_130" background="#c5e0b3" comment="LEFT" height="100%" padding="10" rendered="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.renderedLeft}" rowdistance="30" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_131" >
<t:label id="g_132" font="size:30" foreground="#00000080" stylevariant="ccbig" text="LIST OF PERSONS" texttransform="uppercase" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_133" >
<t:label id="g_134" text="Double click item for opening details." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_135" >
<tpbc:datagridview2 id="g_136" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.grdiView}" shownullcontent="true" >
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_137" propertyName="firstName" title="First name" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_138" propertyName="firstName" title="First name" width="100%" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_139" propertyName="lastName" title="Last name" width="100%" />
<tpbc:datagridview2column id="g_140" propertyName="department" title="Department" width="100%" />
</tpbc:datagridview2>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
<t:scrollpane id="g_141" background="#FFC0C0" comment="RIGHT" height="100%" padding="10" rendered="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.renderedRight}" rowdistance="30" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_142" >
<t:label id="g_143" font="size:30" foreground="#00000080" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Details of person" texttransform="uppercase" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_144" >
<t:scrollpane id="g_145" height="100%" rowdistance="20" width="100%;500" >
<t:row id="g_146" >
<t:image id="g_147" align="left" height="150" image="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.image}" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_148" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_149" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="General data" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_150" >
<t:field id="g_151" labeltext="Title" text="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.title}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_152" >
<t:field id="g_153" labeltext="First name" text="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.firstName}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_154" >
<t:field id="g_155" labeltext="Last name" text="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.lastName}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_156" >
<t:tabbedpane id="g_157" width="100%" >
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_158" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Body measures" >
<t:row id="g_159" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_160" format="int" labeltext="Weight" value="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.weight}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_161" >
<t:formattedfield id="g_162" format="int" labeltext="Height" value="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.height}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_163" text="Certificates" />
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_164" text="Mail" />
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_165" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_166" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Company data" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_167" >
<t:field id="g_168" labeltext="Department" text="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.department}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_169" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_170" height="100%;300" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Comment" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_171" >
<t:textarea id="g_172" height="100%" labeltext="Comment" text="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.selectedPerson.comment}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:row>
</t:scrollpane>
</t:cuberotator>
</t:overlayareabaseitem>
<tpbc:moveablearea id="g_97" >
<tpbc:moveableareacontent id="g_98" >
<t:row id="g_99" >
<t:overlayarea id="g_100" >
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_89" x="0" y="0" zindex="2" >
<t:pane id="g_90" padding="5" >
<t:captureanimator id="g_11" animationtype="fogdark" trigger="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.cubeImage}" />
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:image id="g_103" image="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.cubeImage}" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareaitem>
<t:overlayareaitem id="g_37" x="0" y="0" zindex="3" >
<t:pane id="g_42" border="#00000018" height="161" width="135" >
<t:row id="g_91" >
<t:button id="g_92" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.onTopAction}" contentareafilled="false" focusable="false" height="70" width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_45" >
<t:button id="g_64" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.onLeftAction}" contentareafilled="false" focusable="false" height="100%" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_35" actionListener="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists.onRightAction}" contentareafilled="false" focusable="false" height="100%" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:overlayareaitem>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</tpbc:moveableareacontent>
</tpbc:moveablearea>
</t:overlayarea>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Random;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.datagridview2.CCDataGridView2;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

import workplace.logic.Person;
import workplace.logic.RandomLogic;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCubeRotatorForLists}")

public class DemoCubeRotatorForLists
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    final String IMAGE_TOP = "/images/pictures/cubeTop.png"; 
    final String IMAGE_LEFT = "/images/pictures/cubeLeft.png"; 
    final String IMAGE_RIGHT = "/images/pictures/cubeRight.png"; 
    
    final int STATUS_FILTER = 0;
    final int STATUS_LIST = 1;
    final int STATUS_DETAIL = 2;
    
    CCDataGridView2<Person> m_grdiView = new CCDataGridView2<Person>();
    Person m_selectedPerson;
