<t:comboboxitem id="g_53" value="H.StackedArea" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_54" value="V.StackedArea" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_49" value="Pie" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_51" value="3DPie" />
<t:comboboxitem id="g_59" value="Waterfall" />
</t:combobox>
<t:coldistance id="g_33" width="50%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_34" height="15" />
<t:row id="g_42" >
<t:pane id="g_43" height="100%;300" padding="0" rowdistance="0" width="100%;400" >
<t:sizetransfer id="g_44" actionListener="#{d.DemoSvg2.onSizeChangeAction}" flush="true" sizevalue="#{d.DemoSvg2.clientSize}" />
<t:row id="g_35" >
<t:svgviewer id="g_36" actionListener="#{d.DemoSvg2.onSvgElementSelection}" height="100%" svg="#{d.DemoSvg2.svg}" svgheight="#{d.DemoSvg2.svgHeight}" svgwidth="#{d.DemoSvg2.svgWidth}" width="100%" withelementselection="true" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_37" height="5" />
</t:pane>
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
<t:tabbedpanetab id="g_38" padding="10" text="SVG Text" >
<t:row id="g_39" >
<t:textarea id="g_40" height="100%" text="#{d.DemoSvg2.svg}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:tabbedpanetab>
</t:tabbedpane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.awt.Color;
import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.io.Writer;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

import org.apache.batik.dom.GenericDOMImplementation;
import org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGGraphics2D;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventSvgElementSelection;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDItem;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDListBinding;
import org.eclnt.util.log.CLog;
import org.eclnt.util.valuemgmt.ValueManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.jfree.chart.ChartFactory;
import org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart;
import org.jfree.chart.StandardChartTheme;
import org.jfree.chart.plot.PlotOrientation;
import org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDataset;
import org.jfree.util.TableOrder;
import org.w3c.dom.DOMImplementation;
import org.w3c.dom.Document;

public class DemoSvg2
    extends PageBean
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------    

    public class MyRow extends FIXGRIDItem
    {
        String m_product;
        double m_revenueNorth;
        double m_revenueSouth;
        public String getProduct()
        {
            return m_product;
        }
        public void setProduct(String product)
        {
            m_product = product;
        }
        public double getRevenueNorth()
        {
            return m_revenueNorth;
        }
        public void setRevenueNorth(double revenueNorth)
        {
            m_revenueNorth = revenueNorth;
        }
        public double getRevenueSouth()
        {
            return m_revenueSouth;
        }
        public void setRevenueSouth(double revenueSouth)
        {
            m_revenueSouth = revenueSouth;
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    final static String NORTH = "North";
    final static String SOUTH = "South";
    final static String HARDWARE = "Hardware";
    final static String SOFTWARE = "Software";
    final static String SERVICES = "Services";
    
    FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> m_rows = new FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow>();
    String m_svg;
    String m_chartType = "H.Bar";
    int m_clientWidth = -1;
    int m_clientHeight = -1;
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public DemoSvg2(IWorkpageDispatcher dispatcher)
    {
        super(dispatcher);
        initRefComponent("svgviewer");
        MyRow row;
        row = new MyRow(); row.setProduct(HARDWARE); row.setRevenueNorth(1000); row.setRevenueSouth(1200); m_rows.getItems().add(row);
        row = new MyRow(); row.setProduct(SOFTWARE); row.setRevenueNorth(800); row.setRevenueSouth(1000); m_rows.getItems().add(row);
        row = new MyRow(); row.setProduct(SERVICES); row.setRevenueNorth(1800); row.setRevenueSouth(2000); m_rows.getItems().add(row);
        generateChart();
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    public FIXGRIDListBinding<MyRow> getRows() { return m_rows; }

    public void setSvg(String value) { m_svg = value; }
    public String getSvg() { return m_svg; }
    
    public void setChartType(String value) { m_chartType = value; }
    public String getChartType() { return m_chartType; }
    
    public void onUpdateChart(ActionEvent ae)
    {
        generateChart();
    }
    
    public void onCreateNewRow(ActionEvent ae)
    {
        MyRow row = new MyRow();
        row.setProduct("new");
        m_rows.getItems().add(row);
    }
    
    public String getClientSize() { return m_clientWidth + ";" + m_clientHeight; }
    public void setClientSize(String value)
    {
        int[] sizes = ValueManager.decodeStraighIntCSV(value);
        m_clientWidth = sizes[0];
        m_clientHeight = sizes[1];
    }
    
    public void onSizeChangeAction(ActionEvent event)
    {
        generateChart();
    }
    public int getSvgWidth() { return m_clientWidth; }
    public int getSvgHeight() { return m_clientHeight; }
    
    public void onSvgElementSelection(ActionEvent event)
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventSvgElementSelection)
        {
            BaseActionEventSvgElementSelection e = (BaseActionEventSvgElementSelection)event;
            Statusbar.outputSuccessWithPopup(e.getParams()[0]);
        }
    }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private void generateChart()
    {
        // do not create chart if not sized yet
        if (m_clientHeight < 0)
            return;
        try
        {
            DefaultCategoryDataset ds = new DefaultCategoryDataset();
            for (int i=0; i<m_rows.getItems().size(); i++)
            {
                MyRow row = m_rows.getItems().get(i);
                ds.setValue(row.getRevenueNorth(),NORTH,row.getProduct());
                ds.setValue(row.getRevenueSouth(),SOUTH,row.getProduct());
            }
            // define chart theme without default light grey background...
            StandardChartTheme theme = new StandardChartTheme("JFree");
            theme.setChartBackgroundPaint(Color.white);
            theme.setPlotBackgroundPaint(Color.white);
            ChartFactory.setChartTheme(theme);
            // nopw create chart
            JFreeChart chart = null;
            if (m_chartType.equals("H.Bar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createBarChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,true);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.Bar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createBarChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.StackedBar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createStackedBarChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,true);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.StackedBar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createStackedBarChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.3DBar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createBarChart3D("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.3DBar"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createBarChart3D("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.Line"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createLineChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.Line"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createLineChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.3DLine"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createLineChart3D("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.3DLine"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createLineChart3D("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.Area"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createAreaChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.Area"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createAreaChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("Pie"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createMultiplePieChart("Sales by Product and Region",ds,TableOrder.BY_COLUMN,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("3DPie"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createMultiplePieChart3D("Sales by Product and Region",ds,TableOrder.BY_COLUMN,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("H.StackedArea"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createStackedAreaChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("V.StackedArea"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createStackedAreaChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else if (m_chartType.equals("Waterfall"))
                chart = ChartFactory.createWaterfallChart("Sales by Product and Region","Region","Product Revenue (Mio EUR)",ds,PlotOrientation.VERTICAL,true,true,false);
            else
                throw new Error("This char type is not known: " + m_chartType);
            // draw chart to SVG
            DOMImplementation domImpl = GenericDOMImplementation.getDOMImplementation();
            Document document = domImpl.createDocument (null, "svg", null);
            SVGGraphics2D svgGenerator = new SVGGraphics2D(document);
            chart.draw(svgGenerator, new java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double(0,0,m_clientWidth,m_clientHeight));
            ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
            Writer outsvg = new OutputStreamWriter(bos,"UTF-8");
            svgGenerator.stream(outsvg,true);             
            m_svg = new String(bos.toByteArray(),"UTF-8");
//            // replace
//            m_svg = m_svg.replace(">"+NORTH," cc_id=\"NORTH\" >"+NORTH);
//            m_svg = m_svg.replace(">"+SOUTH," cc_id=\"SOUTH\" >"+SOUTH);
//            m_svg = m_svg.replace(">"+HARDWARE," cc_id=\"HADRWARE\" >"+HARDWARE);
//            m_svg = m_svg.replace(">"+SOFTWARE," cc_id=\"SOFTWARE\" >"+SOFTWARE);
//            m_svg = m_svg.replace(">"+SERVICES," cc_id=\"SERVICES\" >"+SERVICES);
        }
        catch (Throwable t)
        {
            CLog.L.log(CLog.LL_ERR,"",t);
            Statusbar.outputError("Problem: " + t.toString(),ValueManager.getStackstraceString(t));
        }
    }
    
}

Mobile Periphery

Camera / take photo

The CAMERA component shows what is currently is recorded by the web camera. By pressing the "snap"-button, the current image is sent to the server side in its original camera resolution.

The CAMERA component requires some explicit activation by the user for security reasons. It is NOT available on Internet Explorer 10/11.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoCamera}" rowdistance="10" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:camera id="g_3" actionListener="#{d.DemoCamera.onCameraAction}" devicesorting="environment" height="100%" width="100%" trigger="#{d.DemoCamera.trigger}" withsnapicon="#{d.DemoCamera.withSnapIcon}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_5" text="Capturing" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:checkbox id="g_7" flush="true" selected="#{d.DemoCamera.withSnapIcon}" text="With snap icon" />
<t:coldistance id="g_8" width="100%" />
<t:button id="g_9" actionListener="#{d.DemoCamera.onTriggerSnapAction}" text="Take photo via button" width="100+" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_10" >
<t:coldistance id="g_11" width="50%" />
<t:label id="g_12" text="Captured image" />
<t:coldistance id="g_13" width="50%" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:coldistance id="g_15" width="50%" />
<t:image id="g_16" height="100" image="#{d.DemoCamera.capturedImageURL}" width="100" />
<t:coldistance id="g_17" width="50%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventCameraSnap;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.util.Trigger;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.util.tempfile.TempFileManager;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoCamera}")

public class DemoCamera
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    boolean m_withSnapIcon = true;
    public boolean getWithSnapIcon() { return m_withSnapIcon; }
    public void setWithSnapIcon(boolean value) { this.m_withSnapIcon = value; }

    public void onTriggerSnapAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        m_trigger.trigger();
    }

    Trigger m_trigger = new Trigger();
    public Trigger getTrigger() { return m_trigger; }

    String m_capturedImageURL = null;
    
    public DemoCamera(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/democamera.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoCamera}"; }

    public String getCapturedImageURL() { return m_capturedImageURL; }

    public void onCameraAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventCameraSnap)
        {
            BaseActionEventCameraSnap e = (BaseActionEventCameraSnap)event;
            byte[] bytes = e.getPNGImageBytes();
            m_capturedImageURL = TempFileManager.saveTempFile("capturedImage.png",bytes);
        }
    }
}

QR Code Scanner

The component QRCODESCANNERJSQR uses the JSQR library for scanning barcodes.

Please find details and terms of usage on page https://github.com/cozmo/jsQR

The component is integrated as independent IFRAME so that the JSQR framework is running in some own, independent environment.

Please pay attention: the component requires access to your client's camera. The browser can only access the camera when starting the page with "https://"! (Exception: working in localhost-environment.)

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:label id="g_3" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Place a QR Code in front of your camera..." />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:qrcodescannerjsqr id="g_5" actionListener="#{d.DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS.onQRCodeAction}" height="300" scandelay="1000" width="400" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:textarea id="g_7" enabled="false" height="100%" text="#{d.DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS.protocol}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Date;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventQRCodeScan;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS}")

public class DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private IListener m_listener;
    String m_protocol = "Protocol:\n";
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demoqrcodescannerjqrs.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoQRCodeScannerJQRS}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getProtocol() { return m_protocol; }
    public void setProtocol(String value) { this.m_protocol = value; }

    public void onQRCodeAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventQRCodeScan)
        {
            BaseActionEventQRCodeScan e = (BaseActionEventQRCodeScan)event;
            m_protocol += "QRCode was scanned: " + e.getQRCodeAsUTF8String() + ", " + new Date().toString() + "\n";
        }
    }

}

Geo Location

The component GEOLOCATION transfers the current GPS position of the device to the server side. Whenever the GPS location changes a corresponding signal is sent to the server side.

With the attribute SCANDELAY you can limit the frequency of sending updated positions: if e.g. the value is set to 10000 (10 seconds) then there will be a maximum frequency of one message every 10 seconds.

The component only sends updates! It does not regularly trigger the server - but only if some data change happened.<

The user needs to allow the access to the location information when using this component, otherwise some error message will be sent to server side.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" >
<t:geolocation id="g_2" actionListener="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.onGeoLocationUpdate}" scandelay="5000" />
</t:beanprocessing>
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_3" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" objectbinding="#{d.DemoGeoLocation}">
<t:row id="g_4" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_5" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" text="GPS Sensor Information" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_6" coldistance="10" >
<t:pane id="g_7" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue['@defaultrowdistance@']}" >
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:label id="g_9" text="Accuracy" width="100" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_10" align="right" enabled="false" format="double" value="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.accuracy}" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_11" >
<t:label id="g_12" text="Longitude" width="100" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_13" align="right" enabled="false" format="double" formatmask="dec7" value="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.longitude}" width="150" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_14" >
<t:label id="g_15" text="Latitude" width="100" />
<t:formattedfield id="g_16" align="right" enabled="false" format="double" formatmask="dec7" value="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.latitude}" width="150" />
</t:row>
</t:pane>
<t:textarea id="g_17" enabled="false" height="100%" text="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.protocol}" width="100%" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_18" >
<t:osmviewer id="g_19" height="100%" latitude="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.latitude}" longitude="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.longitude}" osmzoom="14" width="100%" >
<t:osmviewerwaypoint id="g_20" hideinfopopup="true" latitude="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.latitude}" longitude="#{d.DemoGeoLocation.longitude}" text="Here I am!" />
</t:osmviewer>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Date;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.events.BaseActionEventGeoLocationUpdate;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoGeoLocation}")

public class DemoGeoLocation
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_protocol = "Protocol:\n";
    public String getProtocol() { return m_protocol; }
    public void setProtocol(String value) { this.m_protocol = value; }

    public void onGeoLocationUpdate(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        if (event instanceof BaseActionEventGeoLocationUpdate)
        {
            BaseActionEventGeoLocationUpdate e = (BaseActionEventGeoLocationUpdate)event;
            m_protocol += "Event: " + e.getStatus() + " at " + new Date().toString() + "\n";
            m_accuracy = e.getAccuracy(); 
            m_longitude = e.getLongitude(); 
            m_latitude = e.getLatitude(); 
        }
    }

    double m_accuracy;
    public double getAccuracy() { return m_accuracy; }
    public void setAccuracy(double value) { this.m_accuracy = value; }

    double m_latitude;
    public double getLatitude() { return m_latitude; }
    public void setLatitude(double value) { this.m_latitude = value; }

    double m_longitude;
    public double getLongitude() { return m_longitude; }
    public void setLongitude(double value) { this.m_longitude = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Listener to the user of the page bean. */
    public interface IListener
    {
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    private IListener m_listener;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoGeoLocation(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demogeolocation.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoGeoLocation}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    /* Initialization of the bean. Add any parameter that is required within your scenario. */
    public void prepare(IListener listener)
    {
        m_listener = listener;
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Full screen mode

The FULLSCREENBUTTON is a normal button that is not associated with some actionListener event processing on server side - but which directly request the whole screen to be opened in full screen mode.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_1" objectbinding="#{d.DemoFullScreenButton}">
<t:row id="g_2" >
<t:fullscreenbutton id="g_3" text="Full screen!" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
<t:pageaddons id="g_pa"/>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;
import org.eclnt.workplace.WorkpageDispatchedPageBean;

import javax.faces.event.ActionEvent;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoFullScreenButton}")

public class DemoFullScreenButton
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    public DemoFullScreenButton(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demofullscreenbutton.jsp"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoFullScreenButton}"; }
}

Touch / Tile tree (PBC)

The page bean component "CCTreeByTiles" renders a normal FIXGRIDTreeBinding-instance as tree that is made out of tiles.

The first line of the component shows the tree node hierarchy that is currently opened, the line(s) below shows the node of the currently selected level.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles}" >
<t:row id="g_6" >
<t:pagebeancomponent id="g_8" pagebeanbinding="#{d.DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles.treeUI}" pagebeanclass="org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCTreeByTiles" pagebeaninitdata="tileBorder:0;lineColor:#00000030;tileBackgroundFolderNode:#00000018" shownullcontent="true" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.util.Random;

import org.eclnt.ccaddons.pbc.CCTreeByTiles;
import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDTreeBinding;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.elements.impl.FIXGRIDTreeItem;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles}")

public class DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public class TreeNode extends FIXGRIDTreeItem implements java.io.Serializable
    {
        boolean i_childrenRead = false;
        public TreeNode(FIXGRIDTreeItem parentNode)
        {
            super(parentNode);
        }
        /*
         * This method is NOT called as part of the tile tree processing. 
         */
        public void onRowSelect()
        {
        }
        /*
         * This method is called when clicking onto an end node of the tile tree. 
         */
        public void onRowExecute()
        {
            Statusbar.outputSuccess("Row execute called with item: " + getText());
        }
        public void onToggle()
        {
            // In this example: dynamic loading of child nodes according to user
            // navigation within the tree
            if (i_childrenRead == false)
            {
                i_childrenRead = true;
                String textPrefix = "";
                for (int j=0; j<(getLevelInt()+1); j++)
                    textPrefix += "Sub ";
                int maxi = new Random().nextInt(10) + 1;
                for (int i=0; i<maxi; i++)
                {
                    TreeNode tn = new TreeNode(this);
                    tn.setText(textPrefix + "folder " + i);
                    tn.setStatus(TreeNode.STATUS_CLOSED);
                    tn.setImage("/images.iconssvg.folder_16x16._ffc000.16x16.ccsvg");
                }
                maxi = new Random().nextInt(15) + 1;
                for (int i=0; i<maxi; i++)
                {
                    TreeNode tn = new TreeNode(this);
                    tn.setText(textPrefix + "node " + i);
                    tn.setStatus(TreeNode.STATUS_ENDNODE);
                    tn.setImage("/images.iconssvg.endnode_16x16._808080.16x16.ccsvg");
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    CCTreeByTiles m_treeUI = new CCTreeByTiles();
    FIXGRIDTreeBinding<TreeNode> m_tree = new FIXGRIDTreeBinding<TreeNode>();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
        buildTree();
        m_treeUI.prepare(m_tree,new CCTreeByTiles.DefaultListener()
        {
        });
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demopbccctreebytiles.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoPBCCCTreeByTiles}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public CCTreeByTiles getTreeUI() { return m_treeUI; }
    
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    
    private void buildTree()
    {
        for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
        {
            TreeNode tn = new TreeNode(m_tree.getRootNode());
            tn.setText("Top folder " + i);
            tn.setStatus(TreeNode.STATUS_CLOSED);
            tn.setImage("/images.iconssvg.folder_16x16._ffc000.16x16.ccsvg");
        }
    }

}

Date and time input

The controls TOUCHDATE and TOUCHTIME are page bean component controls that are part of the eclnt_pbc package.

They are used to input a date or a time in a touch screen environment. The little green arrow icons are used for quicker navigation.

The server side binding can be a LocalDate, a Date, a Long or a String (containing a long value).

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_7" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_8" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Date input" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:label id="g_5" text="Default input of date" width="150" />
<t:calendarfield id="g_2" flush="true" timezone="LOCAL" value="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.myDate}" width="120" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_15" >
<t:label id="g_10" text="Touch input of date" width="150" />
<tpbc:touchdate id="g_13" actionListener="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.onTouchDateAction}" timezone="LOCAL" value="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.myDate}" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_17" >
<t:foldablepane id="g_18" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" text="Time input" width="100%" >
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:label id="g_20" text="Default input of time" width="150" />
<t:calendarfield id="g_21" flush="true" format="time" timezone="LOCAL" value="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.myTime}" width="120" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_22" >
<t:label id="g_23" text="Touch input of time" width="150" />
<tpbc:touchtime id="g_24" actionListener="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.onTouchTimeAction}" timezone="LOCAL" value="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl.myTime}" withseconds="true" />
</t:row>
</t:foldablepane>
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.time.LocalTime;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.jsfserver.defaultscreens.Statusbar;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl}")

public class DemoTouchDateTimeControl
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    LocalDate m_myDate = LocalDate.now();
    LocalTime m_myTime = LocalTime.now();

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoTouchDateTimeControl(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demotouchdatetimecontrol.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoTouchDateTimeControl}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public LocalDate getMyDate() { return m_myDate; }
    public void setMyDate(LocalDate value) { this.m_myDate = value; }

    public LocalTime getMyTime() { return m_myTime; }
    public void setMyTime(LocalTime value) { this.m_myTime = value; }

    public void onTouchTimeAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputMessage("Time was changed by touch input: " + m_myTime.toString());
    }

    public void onTouchDateAction(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent event) 
    {
        Statusbar.outputMessage("Date was changed by touch input: " + m_myDate.toString());
    }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}

Phone - desktiop integration

The component TPBC:MOBILELINK links the desktop user interface to the mobile! After clicking the corresponding icon a dialog will pop up to set up the link between desktop and mobile.

You then can directly input the data by using your mobile. For text components you may e.g. use the voice recognition of your mobile and such are able to input desktop text fields by talking into your mobile.

Same with images: you can take photos on your mobile which are directly integrated into your application processing - without down/uploading data.

This is the XML layout definition:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<t:layoutdefinition xmlns:t="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/t" xmlns:tpbc="http://www.CaptainCasa.com/controllibrary/tpbc" >
<t:beanprocessing id="g_1" beanbinding="#{d.DemoMobileLink01}" />
<t:rowdemobodypane id="g_4" objectbinding="#{d.DemoMobileLink01}" rowdistance="#{ccstylevalue[&#39;@defaultrowdistance@&#39;]}" >
<t:row id="g_5" >
<t:textpane id="g_6" text="Press the mobile icon on the right of the components in order to start the mobile link." width="100%" />
</t:row>
<t:rowdistance id="g_7" height="20" />
<t:row id="g_3" >
<t:label id="g_13" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Input of text via mobile, e.g. by voice" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_19" >
<t:textarea id="g_2" height="80" labeltextalwaysshown="true" rounding="0" text="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.text}" width="100%" />
<tpbc:mobilelinkicon id="g_14" mobilemode="TEXT" rowalignmenty="top" shownullcontent="true" value="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.text}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_31" >
<t:label id="g_32" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Record a signature" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_27" >
<t:heximage id="g_28" height="100%;80" hexdata="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.heximageSignature}" width="100%" />
<tpbc:mobilelinkicon id="g_29" mobilemode="SIGNATURE" rowalignmenty="top" shownullcontent="true" value="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.heximageSignature}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_21" >
<t:label id="g_22" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Scan QR-Code via mobile" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_23" >
<t:field id="g_24" labeltextalwaysshown="true" text="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.qrCode}" width="100%" />
<tpbc:mobilelinkicon id="g_25" mobilemode="QRCODE" shownullcontent="true" value="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.qrCode}" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_16" >
<t:label id="g_17" stylevariant="ccbig" text="Take and import photo from mobile" />
</t:row>
<t:row id="g_8" >
<t:heximage id="g_9" height="100%;150" hexdata="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.heximage}" width="100%" />
<tpbc:mobilelinkicon id="g_11" mobilemode="IMAGE" rowalignmenty="top" shownullcontent="true" value="#{d.DemoMobileLink01.heximage}" />
</t:row>
</t:rowdemobodypane>
</t:layoutdefinition>

This is the Java code:

package workplace;

import java.io.Serializable;

import org.eclnt.editor.annotations.CCGenClass;
import org.eclnt.workplace.IWorkpageDispatcher;

@CCGenClass (expressionBase="#{d.DemoMobileLink01}")

public class DemoMobileLink01
    extends PageBean 
    implements Serializable
{
    String m_heximageSignature;
    public String getHeximageSignature() { return m_heximageSignature; }
    public void setHeximageSignature(String value) { this.m_heximageSignature = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // inner classes
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // members
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    String m_heximage;
    String m_text;
    String m_qrCode;

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // constructors & initialization
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public DemoMobileLink01(IWorkpageDispatcher workpageDispatcher)
    {
        super(workpageDispatcher);        
    }

    public String getPageName() { return "/workplace/demomobilelink01.xml"; }
    public String getRootExpressionUsedInPage() { return "#{d.DemoMobileLink01}"; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // public usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------

    public String getHeximage() { return m_heximage; }
    public void setHeximage(String value) { this.m_heximage = value; }

    public String getText() { return m_text; }
    public void setText(String value) { this.m_text = value; }

    public String getQrCode() { return m_qrCode; }
    public void setQrCode(String value) { this.m_qrCode = value; }

    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // private usage
    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
}
